story:
UPDATE VIDEO



We created the worlds first high-amp compact solar energy and heat solar system. Our prototype has reached all of our expectations. 


(image from Indiegogo launch party)





Money raised will be used to begin the manufacturing process. Our goal is to limit any corporate funding that may put the integrity of our project at risk. 

Our solar Heat AND Power system is FOR the people BY the people. Please help us change the world with an easy decision.  Support our innovative solution and make it possible!



Every contribution impacts our success.

FOUR years of R&D have resulted in 3 patent pendings and global Industrial Design Registrations of Crystal Green Energy’s SOLAR combined heat and power (CHP) system. We’ve created The Solar Optic Module. The Solar Optic Module has high amperage and low voltage for real power for your real life!

HOW?

Briefly summarizing our highly efficient low profile compact Solar Optic Module system...it has:

  • Precision dual axis Sun tracking
  • 98% reflective materials
  • Compact 1x1.1 metre modules
  • +40% efficient latest tech solar cells
  • Solar energy homogenizing optics (pat.pending)
  • Energy storage & thermal output

Targeting self-sustainability,Crystal Green Energy’s Solar Optic Modules have evolved generations beyond today’s technology in capturing our Sun’s full energy potential and beyond.

Our goal is to provide clean energy for the World. Help us get this precious resource into the hands of the people who desperately need it. Real generosity and support from real individuals and businesses will make a dramatic impact.

Your motivation for support could be saving the Earth, investing in your children’s future or just wanting our technology to succeed... Help us to achieve our $100,000 fundraising goal. Your generosity will make a difference by allowing us to continue our R&D advancements for renewable heat and power solutions and make this World a better place to live in...for you and your loved ones!

Remember that every donation makes a positive change, regardless of size.
Help Us...Help Yourself...Help The World.

Thank YOU for your support and encouragement.

Gilles Leduc and James Delsaut
Co-founders of Crystal Green Energy Corporation

For more info on our Solar Optic Modules visit our website at:

www.CrystalGreenEnergy.com

story:
Oktosol is an entirely new and innovative solar energy collection system from Styria, Austria. It is the first solar energy collection system that can both protect and clean itself. Due to this unique aspect, it can be used in all sunny regions of the world, even in desert areas with sandstorms.

With a mirror surface area of 30m², Oktosol produces 25KWp of heat energy. In its standard version, Oktosol is designed to operate at a temperature of up to 200°C and at a system pressure of 25bar.

What makes Oktosol unique?

While in a closed position, the surface area of Oktosol that is exposed to wind is cut in half. The solar collectors on the side of the mirrors hold each other and are therefore very stable. In its standard version, Oktosol can easily withstand a maximum wind speed of 150 km/h. The safety factor built into Oktosol’s design is 2, meaning that Oktosol can very likely withstand even dynamic pressure and higher wind speeds.

Due to Oktosol’s unique concentrator and vacuum technologies, high operating temperatures do not result in a loss of efficiency, meaning the area of application is increased immensely. The high temperature heat can also be converted into electricity over evaporation processes.

Oktosol’s ability to both protect and clean itself result in greater durability and longevity over standard solar energy collection systems. Additionally Oktosol utilizes a biaxial tracking system, which will raise energy output by 50% resulting in a higher daily output. Due to these aspects, an increased cost-benefit ratio over existing systems will be realized by the customer. Large facilities can be economically operated due to the automated cleaning system, which will always provide 100% clean mirrors with little or no associated labor costs. 

State of Development

Currently, the first prototype has been built and tested, confirming successful operation and a power output of 25 KWp.

A second prototype has been completely designed and simply needs budget for construction and additional testing. 

Usage of the Crowd Funds

Initially, the funding will be used towards the testing phase of the second prototype. This will both allow for confirmation of expected manufacturing costs, and a test phase of a more refined design, including the newly designed automated cleaning system. 

Why We Chose Crowdfunding for Our Project

Crowdfunding will enable our existing business to take the next step forward in development of our solar energy collector and we will be in a much stronger position for financing the Serial Production.


FAQs

When will the delivery of Okotosol start?

The delivery of Oktosol should start in late summer to early fall 2016.

How much will it cost?

Oktosol’s market entrance price will be just under € 13.000.

What is Oktosol?

Oktosol is a biaxial, sun tracking solar energy collection system with eight mirror-concentrators. Due to its tracking system, automatic protection system, and cleaning system, it can even be used in regions with extreme environmental conditions that ordinary solar energy systems cannot, such as steppes and san deserts.

How much room does Oktosol need?

Oktosol is 5 meters tall and rotates in a radius of 5 meters.  It can be installed in an area that is only 2 square meters.

For a large collection field of multiple units, an area of 250m² per collector unit is needed for calculating in order to avoid shading. For an overall thermal performance of 1MW, a field would need to be one hectare (=40 Oktosol).

Can the area of collector fields still be used agriculturally? 

Simply put, yes. Due to the fact that there is room needed to avoid shading and the units only take up a small area. Also, ideally cables required will be installed underground. An advantage to this is that 30% less light will touch the ground which will beneficial in an area where too much sunlight and heat can be a problem. The automatic cleaning system can also serve a dual purpose as an irrigation system.

What can I use the heat for?  

The heat can be used for indoor climate control (both heating and cooling), water heating, and cooking. Converting high temperature heat into electricity through evaporation is a possibility as well. Heat extraction at 75 to 100°C will allow for a two stage usage: high temperature for electricity production and the lesser heat “waste” for heating. Also, coupling this technology with a seawater desalinization plant is a viable application.

Is Oktosol also suited for pure electricity production?

It would be feasible to connect a steam-powered device that could turn imported heat into electricity. It would product a minimum of 100kWp-terminal (=4 Oktosol). The system therefore has to release the heat of the condensation to the surrounding area. According to the temperature of the heated release (45-75°C), an electric performance of a 100 kWp-TH construction of 16 kWp-EL (at 75°C condensation) to 20 kWp-EL (at 45°C condensation) is approachable.

Are further developmental versions of Oktosol planned?

The product is already in advanced stages of design and is very efficient. There is a possibility to advance the potential electric output however. As of now, all PV concentrator-absorbers can be integrated into our systems without difficulty and can use the protection and cleaning system, as there is already a connection to the cooling system.

Will there be a smaller collector version?

Yes, there are currently plans for the Quattrosol, which will be smaller but implement the same design of four identical concentrator units.

What if we are never able to move into production?

The vouchers do not have an expiration date and will be redeemable when we start to deliver products. If we are not able to meet our production requirements, the money given to for Oktosol vouchers from 150-2500 Euros will be returned to the donor with a discount of 5%.

Does it make sense to invest in solar energy?

“I’d put my money on the sun and solar energy. What a source of power! I hope we don’t have to wait until oil and coal run out before we tackle that.”

(Thomas Edison told his friends Henry Ford and Harvey Firestone, 1931)

“The integration of alternative energy systems around Oktosol allows us to achieve a self-sufficient energy supply with renewable energies and in the end it secures a living environment aside a blackout.”

(Oliver Haditsch & Dipl.-Ing. Martin Hadlauer)

story:
Why we are doing this

Alternate Energy Sources - Electric Power and Yerba Mate. 

Copas, Inc. plans to offer organic Yerba Mate in the U.S. through retail storefronts called Copas Yerba Mate Cafes. We are starting out with a Copas Switch Kart. A way to “Think Globally Act Locally” 

The Copas Switch Kart is to be used to serve Yerba Mate to people wherever we can find them. We are starting out in Sonoma County, CA (North Bay) and will move additional Karts to the other Bay Area Counties. Our first one is targeted for our locals in the North Bay and we will be based out of Petaluma, CA. This relocatable kart helps show an alternative form of energy used to transport and an alternative form of energy for ones self. Yerba Mate is a common stimulant beverage, which is consumed on a daily basis in South America, is a unique tea whose taste and benefits are just becoming known in North America and Europe. According to some, it can offer the health benefits of green tea, the energy boost of coffee, without the jitters and crash, and even the euphoria of dark chocolate. Yerba Mate is rich in anti-oxidants, amino acids, minerals and vitamins. 

Copas (Portuguese for cup), Inc. plans to offer organic, fair traded, sustainable products, including organic Yerba Mate, organic locally grown food, and organic beverages, including organic beer and wine named Copas Yerba Mate Cafe. 
Help us get started with these cool Karts. One could be in your neighborhood soon.



What We Need  

We need to raise $10,000.00 more to finish building the Copas Switch Kart. 
The costs for building one of these karts is $20,000.00. 

We have already received half of the money, which paid the down-payment on the Kart and they have already started building it. PLEASE help us raise the rest. We are starting  with this ALL ELECTRIC  relocate-able cart to show an alternate use of electric power for travel and an alternative energy source for oneself. Copas Switch Karts are used to lower the carbon foot print, offer an alternative source for energy, add sales dollars, awareness, marketing and used for testing possible store front locations. 

What You Get

PERKS - What you get.

These are the perks you get for helping us make this become a completed reality.

$10 GOOD KARMA

  • Good Karma for Supporting a Cool, Local and grass root business.
  • Thank you posting on our Facebook page.

  • Coupon for 2 Free cups of Fresh Brewed Yerba Mate.

$50 FREE CUP OF YERBA MATE
  • Good Karma for Supporting a Cool, Local and grass root business.
  • Free CUP Fresh Brewed Yerba Mate with every visit.
$100 COPAS Switch Kart LOGO T- SHIRT 
  • Good Karma for Supporting a Cool, Local and grass root business.
  • PLUS - Free CUP Fresh Brewed Yerba Mate with every visit.
  • A cool t-shirt with Copas Switch Kart logo and 5% discount every time you visit our Kart or come in to the cafe and are wearing it.
$250 WALL OF FAME SUPPORTER 
  • Good Karma for Supporting a Cool, Local and grass root business.
  • PLUS - Free CUP Fresh Brewed Yerba Mate with every visit.
  • 10% discount every time you visit our Kart or come in to the café.
  • Your name on our backer wall listed on our web site and Facebook page.
$500 2 FOR 1 EVENT SUPPORTER
  • Good Karma for Supporting a Cool, Local and grass root business
  • PLUS - Free CUP Fresh Brewed Yerba Mate with every visit.
  • 2 for 1 tickets to events at the Copas Yerba Mate Cafes as they open in your area, such as Comedy Shows and Musical Performances.
  • 10% discount every time you visit our Kart or come in to the café. 
  • Your name on our backer wall listed on our web site and Facebook page.
  • A $500.00 Discount on any complete Switch Vehicle.
$1000 BIGGIE SUPPORTER
  • Good Karma for Supporting a Cool,  business.
  • Free CUP Fresh Brewed Yerba Mate with every visit.
  • 10% discount every time you visit our Kart or Cafe.
  • Your name on our backer wall listed on our web site and Facebook page.
  • 2 for 1 tickets to events at the Copas Yerba Mate Cafes such as Comedy Shows and Musical Performances.
  • We will arrange rides and even an opportunity to drive our All Electric Copas Switch Kart at one of our many upcoming events.
  • A $1000.00 Discount on any complete Switch Vehicle.

What Is Yerba Mate

Watch the short video if you have questions about what Yerba Mate is:

Facts on Yerba Mate Click on link

The Impact
Atmosphere

Help us lower the carbon foot print required with other mobile beverage Karts. Think Globally - Act Locally. This is more than just a catchy phrase for Copas; it is a way of living. The mission of Copas, Inc. is to offer all its guests organic Yerba Mate, other South American beverages, bulk dry organic Yerba Mate, related organic retail items, entertainment and social and business meeting space.

Marketing Strategy

The Company envisions establishing a unique brand of cafes that offer organic Yerba Mate,  additional hot, cold drinks with organic food items. All while interacting with and supporting local communities while benefiting the global community through the creation of community hubs where Yerba Mate as well as coffee consumers can enjoy genuine social interaction.

story:
Stone Buddha Models For The Kakemono Posters

Meet Our Kakemono Scrolling Posters

We have 87 different Kakemono scrolling posters. All are prints from my original iconic Buddha stone sculptures. Images of the meditating Buddha have become a universally recognized icon for meditation, serenity and spirituality. 

The Colorful series of 36 Kakemono style prints of my sculptures are unique and unlike anything else available. Our beautiful Kakemono scrolling posters are now available in two sizes: large (23” x 44”) and small (8” x 16”).

Photos of my original hand-sculpted-in-stone Buddhas are offered in the ancient Kakemono scrolling art style. Our 18 Antique style Kakemono scrolling posters are all characterized by the cracking, fading and weathered look of ancient oil paintings. The sepia-colored patina adds to this effect.

Our five Chinese Calligraphy Kakemono scrolling posters are artful treasures and perfect for your home, office or that secluded space you retreat to after a difficult day. Give the gift of peace and serenity to that special and spiritual someone that is difficult to buy for. 

The mini-sized (8" x 16") Kakemono posters fit those small spaces like alcoves or next to doors and windows. They can be grouped in multiples in both horizontal and vertical spaces. The two-piece hardwood top and bottom dowels can be easily removed to allow for staining, painting or fabric coverings to match your personal décor. Blue painted dowels on this one. 

Kakemono scrolling posters capture the spiritual and mystical characteristics of the Asian culture. Your poster will arrive with finely finished natural grain hardwood dowels. Beautiful as is. Brass eye screws are included for hanging. 

Keeping focused in a peaceful and meditative state is enhanced by the simple Buddha image. Chinese Calligraphy in a single oriental character can portray the essence of a sentence. Create a space that is conducive to your peace of mind. These dowels are stained with a dark wood color. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Our Flexible goal of $8,000 will be the minimum needed to expand our current operation by purchasing inventory to stock two new fulfillment centers.

Interest and sales continue to grow in spite of high shipping costs to Europe and Canada ($40+ for a $30 Kakemono poster). By using the Fulfillment by Amazon (FBA) in Europe and Canada for warehousing and delivery, our shipping costs are greatly reduced. We will use the same sales techniques for these new stores that we are now using in our successful USA Amazon store.

$14,000 in contributions would allow us to purchase our inventory at highly discounted prices, increasing profits substantially. $20,000 is our real goal as it would  provide for the development of our Shopify, eBay and Etsy  stores. Sales have been made on all three, but some professional marketing, promotional and developmental assistance is needed.

All of our USA stores (Amazon, Shopify, eBay and Etsy) now use Prime Logistics, located in Florence, Kentucky, for warehousing and delivery. We will continue with this for all four stores for USA customers.

A very unique perk is an anthropological tour. My background and extensive knowledge of Southeast Asia and its ancient Khmer  historical sanctuaries will allow you the private tour of a lifetime. From the time you arrive until your departure you will be in my capable hands. 

Special Early Bird Offer

LIMITED BEST-FRIEND LEVEL

Each $1200 contributor will be rewarded with a one-week, Thailand anthropological tour. A selection of ancient Khmer stone masterpiece sites can include UNESCO World Heritage sites and other less known examples. Includes 3-4 star hotels, meals, local transportation, fees and my expert personal guide service.

The first ten $1,200 contributors will receive an extra (3) days at the beach on the tropical island of Koh Chang, Thailand.

Itineraries are scheduled according to your and my availability. If you have a special request for additional sites that you would like to visit, please inform me and I'll do my best to schedule it into your personal itinerary. Spouses or a friend you wish to accompany you will be charged an additional $1,200. Holiday tours must be scheduled between estimated close of campaign in June 2017 and June 2018. International airfare not included. 

See Holiday site locations in below video

 

I’ve conducted dozens of medical and anthropological tours over the past 12 years. To help in establishing my credibility and to give you confidence in my abilities and expertise, you can view  the following links:

http://www.emeraldtriangletours.com

https://www.khmer-road-sculpture.com

 

 Impact

I was fortunate to enter into a product development project with the Zhangjiagang Printing and Advertising Co. Ltd. (Plant facilities shown above). We worked together for two years experimenting with different fiber fabric cloths and natural inks. The company saw the commercial value in this venture and, with both a considerable cost and time investment, we developed a process to meet with the high standards of Kakemono scrolling art. I have an exclusive contract for this proprietary product.

Established in 2012, Zhangjiagang City Printing Advertising Co., Ltd., is the largest digital printing factory in Zhangjiagang, Suzhou province. It specializes in banners, stickers, display products, flag manufacturing, digital printing service, UV flatbed printing, display product and other relevant advertising products.

In order to sell manufactured products on the Etsy sales venue, you must have the Etsy Manufacturers Approval designation. This coveted certification requires strict adherence to environmental, health, employee and ISO regulations. I’m proud to say that I was instrumental in their receiving the first Chinese company certification in the printing category.

 

Risks & Challenges

Any entrepreneurial pursuit is fraught with unexpected developments. I’ve learned that hard work and perseverance can get you through most anything. This project has been in development for more than ten years counting the process of hand-sculpting stone Buddhas and is now starting to come to fruition with daily sales.

I’ve learned many new skills since the start of this project. Photoshopping my works in a home décor environment was a major breakthrough. With 80-plus products and each necessitating up to 10 different in-situ photographs on four separate sales venue sites, I had to take hundreds of photographs. These were also used as my daily content posts on the social media sites.

The photoshopping type of daily content posts has become less effective. Video submissions are the future. With the help of my associate, Mr. Junaid Roy, we have become quite proficient at producing our own videos. Please view at the link below to my Khmer Road Sculpture, YouTube Channel. You will see that we have produced more than 65 videos ourselves, the latest ones rivaling the work of professional videographers.  

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCz3oHvxmVU-1zf...

Shipping and Storage

All of our posters come delivered in a strong, attractive black cardboard tube. It provides shipping protection to assure that your poster arrives undamaged. It can also serve as a storage tube. In Asian cultures, the Kakemono scrolling posters were stored and often changed to display on holidays, various seasons and auspicious occasions.

My posters are 100% guaranteed. If not satisfied with your purchase, please return it to Prime Logistics, 7500 Empire Drive, Florence, Kentucky 41042. You are responsible only for return postage.  

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like our products, then please share with your friends and on the Indiegogo social media share tools. Reviews can be very helpful in directing people to our website. 

Donor contributors can take pride in doing their part in maintaining these historical sites for posterity.

Our Story

I have a long history of artistic endeavors since my early youth, beginning with custom car pin-striping and sign painting. I received a national scholarship from the Rotary Club to attend Chouinards Art Institute in Los Angeles, California. 

Later I pursued a career in law enforcement, proceeding through the ranks. I’m a graduate of the 93rd session of the FBI National Academy, ending my career as Chief of Police after 20 years of service. 

On a holiday visit to Angkor Wat in Cambodia, I became enchanted with the ancient Khmer civilizations stone carvings and architectural masterpieces. The style and grace of their sculptures inspired the artist in me.

After more than a decade of sculpting Buddhas and seeing the desecration and looting of these spiritual sanctuaries while conducting anthropological tours, I decided to recreate those sculptures through the medium of Kakemono style scrolling posters. 

All of my Kakemono scrolling posters are born from my original hand-carved sculptures. Antique, Colorful and Calligraphy styles all capture the spiritual and meditative qualities of Asia.

Khmer Road Sculpture was partly formed in order to bring attention to the plight of these World Heritage historical Khmer stone masterpieces. I believed that by replicating these iconic Buddha images in the Kakemono art form, I could bring some worldwide awareness to the problem. 

 

Kakemono Scrolling Posters Impact

Ever-increasing numbers of people are turning to a more meditative and spiritual lifestyle. Yoga, natural foods, organic farming and herbal cures are all more generally accepted. This is particularly true of the millennial generation. 

Buddha has become a symbol for spirituality. His calm, peaceful presence can assist in creating a meditative state. Meditaters worldwide can now enhance their sanctums with this inspiring wall art. Decorate your home, office or secluded place that you retreat to after a difficult day with these artful treasures.

 

 

Meet the Khmer Road Sculpture Team
story_txt:
Stone Buddha Models For The Kakemono PostersMeet Our Kakemono Scrolling PostersWe have 87 different Kakemono scrolling posters. All are prints from my original iconic Buddha stone sculptures. Images of the meditating Buddha have become a universally recognized icon for meditation, serenity and spirituality. The Colorful series of 36 Kakemono style prints of my sculptures are unique and unlike anything else available. Our beautiful Kakemono scrolling posters are now available in two sizes: large (23” x 44”) and small (8” x 16”).Photos of my original hand-sculpted-in-stone Buddhas are offered in the ancient Kakemono scrolling art style. Our 18 Antique style Kakemono scrolling posters are all characterized by the cracking, fading and weathered look of ancient oil paintings. The sepia-colored patina adds to this effect.Our five Chinese Calligraphy Kakemono scrolling posters are artful treasures and perfect for your home, office or that secluded space you retreat to after a difficult day. Give the gift of peace and serenity to that special and spiritual someone that is difficult to buy for. The mini-sized (8" x 16") Kakemono posters fit those small spaces like alcoves or next to doors and windows. They can be grouped in multiples in both horizontal and vertical spaces. The two-piece hardwood top and bottom dowels can be easily removed to allow for staining, painting or fabric coverings to match your personal décor. Blue painted dowels on this one. Kakemono scrolling posters capture the spiritual and mystical characteristics of the Asian culture. Your poster will arrive with finely finished natural grain hardwood dowels. Beautiful as is. Brass eye screws are included for hanging. Keeping focused in a peaceful and meditative state is enhanced by the simple Buddha image. Chinese Calligraphy in a single oriental character can portray the essence of a sentence. Create a space that is conducive to your peace of mind. These dowels are stained with a dark wood color.  What We Need & What You GetOur Flexible goal of $8,000 will be the minimum needed to expand our current operation by purchasing inventory to stock two new fulfillment centers.Interest and sales continue to grow in spite of high shipping costs to Europe and Canada ($40+ for a $30 Kakemono poster). By using the Fulfillment by Amazon (FBA) in Europe and Canada for warehousing and delivery, our shipping costs are greatly reduced. We will use the same sales techniques for these new stores that we are now using in our successful USA Amazon store.$14,000 in contributions would allow us to purchase our inventory at highly discounted prices, increasing profits substantially. $20,000 is our real goal as it would  provide for the development of our Shopify, eBay and Etsy  stores. Sales have been made on all three, but some professional marketing, promotional and developmental assistance is needed.All of our USA stores (Amazon, Shopify, eBay and Etsy) now use Prime Logistics, located in Florence, Kentucky, for warehousing and delivery. We will continue with this for all four stores for USA customers.A very unique perk is an anthropological tour. My background and extensive knowledge of Southeast Asia and its ancient Khmer  historical sanctuaries will allow you the private tour of a lifetime. From the time you arrive until your departure you will be in my capable hands. Special Early Bird OfferLIMITED BEST-FRIEND LEVELEach $1200 contributor will be rewarded with a one-week, Thailand anthropological tour. A selection of ancient Khmer stone masterpiece sites can include UNESCO World Heritage sites and other less known examples. Includes 3-4 star hotels, meals, local transportation, fees and my expert personal guide service.The first ten $1,200 contributors will receive an extra (3) days at the beach on the tropical island of Koh Chang, Thailand.Itineraries are scheduled according to your and my availability. If you have a special request for additional sites that you would like to visit, please inform me and I'll do my best to schedule it into your personal itinerary. Spouses or a friend you wish to accompany you will be charged an additional $1,200. Holiday tours must be scheduled between estimated close of campaign in June 2017 and June 2018. International airfare not included. See Holiday site locations in below video

story:
Story

We are two friends from Vienna , and our kids play together regularly,  when our families meet. Board games where a huge part of our childhood, we loved spending hours and hours playing them. So it was only natural that we couldn't wait for our children to be old enough to experience this. However nowadays kids are used to faster, and easier access to games, and fun activities.

That is why we came up with a solution to make board games more interesting for everyone.

OmegaOne Details

  • Android Based System
  • Full HD Touchscreen Panel - Scratch and Water Resistant
  • Eye-Protect-Sensor - Keeps Your Eyes Safe by Adjusting Display Brightness
  • Built-in Battery - Up to 6 Hours of Gameplay
  • Built-in Stereo Speakers
  • 32 GB Storage Space - Enough for Hundreds of Boardgames
  • WiFi, Bluetooth (Facebook Connectivity + Google Play for Downloading Games)

 

Color Options

 

Why OmegaOne?

There are so many reasons to choose our device. Compared to the classic board games you can set up a game in just under 30 seconds. Gameplay is a lot faster and smoother, however gaming sessions might take considerable amount of time to finish.

With our technology, you are able to save your game progress, and continue at any time you like. 

 

 

 

Advantages

  • 100% Safe for Children
  • Saves a lot of Space
  • Virtually Unlimited Number of Games
  • Quick Save & Load
  • Scratch & Water Resistant

OmegaOne ​does not contain small parts that children could swallow, so it's suitable for kids over 2+ years of age. We planned this product with a built-in eye protect sensor to keep you, and your family members eyes safe during games. We also wanted to ensure that OmegaOne works the same after many years of use, just the day when you received it. The added extra protection layer, and the spill resistant frame will keep the device safe.

 

Family time: Sitting down with family with no interruptions may feel like an impossible thing in your home, as everyone has different schedules which pushes them to opposite directions. But playing games with your kids, or with your friends, is a perfect way to spend time together and build learning skills at the same time. Playing a board game after a family dinner is an excellent way to get closer to your family, while strengthening your family bond.

Share Your Great Family Moments with the World via Facebook

 

Risk & Challenges

There are always ups and downs in any venture and while delays can happen, we will update you with the progress. This is our second campaign for this product. With your support, we will able to work with the right people because our aim in the end is to deliver the highest quality and functionality possible.

 

Thank You!

We greatly appreciate, if you help us to raise awareness by sharing, liking or tweeting this campaign to your friends.

story:
Story

We are living in an indoor society that is much different from the world we lived in hundreds of years ago where we would spend much more of our time outside. Even our children are spending way more time inside than outside. We are working inside for 20 to 40 hours a week and after a day of work, we again spend our time inside. Many people only see the sky when they walk from their houses to their cars.

Problem

Most people have a structural shortage of daylight, sunlight and vitamin D. This causes all kinds of health problems that can result into serious illnesses. Many people are having trouble sleeping, are anxious and stressed in this high demanding and fast-paced world.

__________________________________________________________________

Over a billion people worldwide are vitamin D deficient because of the indoor lifestyle and sun avoidance behaviours

___________________________________________________________________

Solution

There are numerous health benefits considering daylight, sunlight and vitamin D. Think about improving your energy, focus, concentration and productivity. Also improving the strength of your bones, teeth, immune system and anti-cancer effects. In overall improving your health and well-being.

______________________________________________________

You can live a longer, healthier and more energetic life

______________________________________________________

 

 

The Helios Smart Ring


The Helios smart ring has a personal daylight, sunlight and vitamin D coach. You can track how much vitamin D you are consuming every day. This is the first vitamin D tracker in the world. We all have busy lives and there is not enough time in the day. With the Helios ring, you can see how much daylight you need on a daily basis and how long you have to spend outside to reach that minimum amount of light. The sunlight coach shows how long you can stay outside safely and provides personal sun protection. You never get a sunburn again!

____________________________________________

Personal sun protection around your finger

____________________________________________

 

 

 

Unique

The Helios smart ring is a stylish, unique wearable device focusing on sunlight, daylight, and vitamin D. Most wearables focus on calorie intake and losing weight, looking on the inside while we focus on the outside.

           This is the world’s first personal vitamin D tracker!

 

____________________________________________________________________

The perfect combination between the benefits of the sun and UV protection!

_____________________________________________________________________

 

Looking at our indoor society where most people have a structural shortage of daylight, sunlight and vitamin D we created an all-new way of looking at your health and how you can improve it. We want to motivate people to go more often outside and have a better life.

We all know that eating healthy and exercising is important for your health and we want to add sunlight and daylight on that list. 

 

____________________________________________________________________

Our dream is to help people live a longer, healthier and more energetic life!

____________________________________________________________________

 

 

 

There are numerous health benefits considering sunlight, daylight and vitamin D. You can improve your immune system, improve the strength of your bones, teeth and muscles. Vitamin D has also very strong anti-cancer effects. With daylight, you can improve the quality of your sleep, improve your focus, mood, productivity, energy and your overall health and well-being.

 

 

 

  • People with a shortage of vitamin D
  • People that care about their health and want to improve their life
  • People that never want to be sunburned again whether you live in country with a fierce sun or you go on a holiday for 2 weeks or when you go backpacking for 6 months  
  • People that work most of the time indoors 
  • People who are looking for a ring with more functionalities  
  • People that feel gloomy when the weather is grey
  • People that experience SAD and want to feel more energized  
  • People who are looking for a fun, original and useful present
  • Research institutions that want to perform advanced medical studies on vitamin D, sunlight and daylight consumption

 


The Helios ring is a unique, multi-functional smart device with a minimalistic and futuristic design. A stylish combination of jewelry and technology that can improve your life.

 

____________________________________________________

You are going to love the Helios ring on your finger!

____________________________________________________

 

The Helios ring is a very comfortable smart device to wear. You hardly notice that you have a ring on your finger. The Helios ring is made from anti-allergic, scratch free polymer material. The Helios ring is waterproof. You can wash your hands with this ring on your finger. 

 

 

 

  • A Helios smart ring in black or white
  • A wireless charging station in the same color as the ring
  • A micro USB - USB (A) cable
  • One-year warranty period

 

 

 

 

The Helios ring is connected with your phone where you can see the necessary data and receive notifications about vitamin D, sunlight and daylight.

 

 

The Helios smart ring is equipped with a high accuracy UV index sensor and an ambient Light Sensor that continuous tracks and measures the strength of the sun and the strength of light and calculates your vitamin D intake considering your personal profile and skin type.

The ring sends all the measurements to the Helios app. We developed special algorithms for accurate measurements that converts data in a user-friendly application.

We want to create a smart device that's very easy to use. You only have to wear the ring to receive notifications about vitamin D, sunlight and daylight and in the dashboard you can follow your progress. With a very user friendly app we want to motivate people to absorb as much vitamin D as necessary, stay protected against UV radiation and receive the minimum amount of daylight every day.


 

The Helios smart ring is compatible with iOS and Android

 

Skin type

      
After you made a profile, you have to select your skin type. This is very important for accurate personal measurements! There are six different skin types that have a different reaction on vitamin D and protection against UV radiation. You can find more information about skin types on our website where you can download a PDF with all the information you need to know.  

 

 

 

Dashboard

 

You can see your progress per day, week, month and year.

 

 

The Sunlight Coach
The sunlight coach shows per week, month and year how many hours you have spent safely in the sun and how many hours were unsafe.

Vitamin D coach 
The vitamin D coach shows per week, month and year how much vitamin D you are consuming. You can always see how many units of vitamin D you consumed in total and how many units you still need for that minimum yearly goal. 

Daylight coach 
The daylight coach shows how many days you reached your minimum amount of daylight and how many days you didn’t reach your minimum amount. You have a clear insight in your daylight consumption. You can draw conclusions to go outside more after and complete days with enough daylight.

Conclusion
You have a great insight in your relation with vitamin D, sunlight, and daylight. You can draw conclusions from the year overviews, like: which months are best for vitamin D consumption, or that you have spend too much time unsafe in the sun, or that you have too many days without the minimum amount of daylight.
 

We provide 12 (US) ring sizes. It's very important to order the right ring size and that you have a ring that fits perfect around your finger. If you already know your ring size, you can select the ring size when you click on the perk.

We have on our website a ring size chart that can help you figure out what size you have. Visit our website e-senses.com/shop/ where you can download the ring size chart.

 

 

Note that these are just plans that we want to implement when we reach our funding and that we don't guarantee that we are going to build these updates. 

We are very much open for conversation about this and you can always spark up the conversation about what you think it's important to improve our product. The user comes first! 

Social media shares

We want to implement the option that you can share your status on social media. You can share how much vitamin D you consumed. You can share your time that you spend safely in the sun. You can share the amount of days where reached the minimum amount of daylight. This way we want to make people more aware of their time spend inside and motivate people to go more outside often.

Compare your stats with other people

we want to create a system where you can log in to the website where you can see your statistics and compare yourself with other users. We want a top 10 or a top 100 list with users that consume the most vitamin D, are most safe in the safe or have the most days with the required amount of daylight. In addition, we want to compare countries and maybe cities with all the users. We are very excited about this. What countries consume the most vitamin D? Which people spend their time safe or unsafe in the sun the most? Which country goes outside the most?

Motivation Rewards

We want to implement a rewarding system for extra motivation. When you reach different goals, you receive rewards. When you hit your yearly goal you will receive (and this is just an example) the Helios king reward. When you have  reached 100 days of the minimum amount of daylight, you will receive (again an example) the 100-daylight reward. You can share these rewards on social media or with friends.

 

 

We are very excited about this product and we think it's a great addition to the wearable market and also a unique and authenticate way looking at our way of life and improving your health.

We hope that you are excited too and that you see benefit from the Helios smart ring.

In order to survive and deliver this product to your doorstep, we need your help!

We are looking forward to your feedback. With your insights, we can create a better product for you in the future. Our mission is to make people more aware of all the benefits that sunlight and daylight can bring them in an easy and fun way.

You can help us by ordering a Helios ring in advance. Make advantage of our discounts proposition and be the first person who wearing and using this ring.

Other ways to help:

Can you help us promote the Helios Ring in your country? Can you advise us the right approach? Can you introduce us to the right people? Are you in preventive healthcare and do you want to use the Helios ring for medical studies?

Are you famous and do you want to be an example to other people by wearing the Helios Ring?

Let us know!

We thank you!

 

 

The creation of the Helios smart ring was possible by using latest disruptive technologies and highest degree of miniaturized solutions. The Helios smart ring is a creation of a brilliant multidisciplinary team of Dutch designers and engineers of Holst centre, HYB, Aeson, de Kat and Promea. Building on each others ideas and unexpected insights leads us to advanced, less homogenized thinking and meaningful work; allows us to create solutions we could not do before. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our team went through several generations of prototypes until we were satisfied with the usability, comfortability and wear ability of the Helios smart ring. Together with our experienced partners, we are looking forward for testing of reliability and durability phase, fine-tuning the software and user experience, making tools for the industrialization phase. The Helios smart ring is created in the Netherlands and will be manufactured in the Netherlands to ensure a premium production quality.

 

 

 

 

 

_____________________________________________________________________________

We need your help community of Indiegogo to finalize the prototype and begin mass production

_____________________________________________________________________________

In exchange for your support, you will be one of the first people on the planet who will wear the beautiful and intelligent Helios smart ring, which will coach you in a responsible matter concerning sun and daylight exposure to enjoy the enormous health benefits in a natural way.

 

 

 

 

Please note that there may be additional duties, fees or taxes raised by the authorities in your country. You may need to take care of them yourself when receiving the shipment.

No shipping to the following countries due to US embargo: Iran, Sudan, Syria, North Korea

 

 

Thank you very much for you support and belief in our team and product!

 

Risks & Challenges

Manufacturing a physical product can be a tough journey. One of the most important factors is the relationship with the supplier. Luckily, we have a trusting relationship with a high-quality manufacturer founded on transparency and open communication. 
Even with working prototypes in our hands that have passed quality inspections and contracts in place with our manufacturer ready to go, there is always a possibility of something going unplanned. Because of this, we have added buffers in our timeline to embrace the unexpected and allow us to deliver your product on time.
Our goal is to deliver a high quality product on the market, and we will work non-stop to deliver the product on time and be transparent from start to finish.

Unique
The Helios smart ring is a stylish, unique wearable device focusing on sunlight, daylight, and vitamin D. Most wearables focus on calorie intake and losing weight, looking on the inside while we focus on the outside.
           This is the world’s first personal vitamin D tracker!
 

____________________________________________________________________
The perfect combination between the benefits of the sun and UV protection!
_____________________________________________________________________
 
Looking at our indoor society where most people have a structural shortage of daylight, sunlight and vitamin D we created an all-new way of looking at your health and how you can improve it. We want to motivate people to go more often outside and have a better life.
We all know that eating healthy and exercising is important for your health and we want to add sunlight and daylight on that list. 

 
____________________________________________________________________
Our dream is to help people live a longer, healthier and more energetic life!
____________________________________________________________________
 
 

 
There are numerous health benefits considering sunlight, daylight and vitamin D. You can improve your immune system, improve the strength of your bones, teeth and muscles. Vitamin D has also very strong anti-cancer effects. With daylight, you can improve the quality of your sleep, improve your focus, mood, productivity, energy and your overall health and well-being.

 
 


 

People with a shortage of vitamin D
People that care about their health and want to improve their life
People that never want to be sunburned again whether you live in country with a fierce sun or you go on a holiday for 2 weeks or when you go backpacking for 6 months  
People that work most of the time indoors 
People who are looking for a ring with more functionalities  
People that feel gloomy when the weather is grey
People that experience SAD and want to feel more energized  
People who are looking for a fun, original and useful present
Research institutions that want to perform advanced medical studies on vitamin D, sunlight and daylight consumption

 
The Helios ring is a unique, multi-functional smart device with a minimalistic and futuristic design. A stylish combination of jewelry and technology that can improve your life.
 

____________________________________________________
You are going to love the Helios ring on your finger!
____________________________________________________
 
The Helios ring is a very comfortable smart device to wear. You hardly notice that you have a ring on your finger. The Helios ring is made from anti-allergic, scratch free polymer material. The Helios ring is waterproof. You can wash your hands with this ring on your finger. 

  
 

A Helios smart ring in black or white
A wireless charging station in the same color as the ring
A micro USB - USB (A) cable
One-year warranty period

 

 

 

 
The Helios ring is connected with your phone where you can see the necessary data and receive notifications about vitamin D, sunlight and daylight.
 

 
The Helios smart ring is equipped with a high accuracy UV index sensor and an ambient Light Sensor that continuous tracks and measures the strength of the sun and the strength of light and calculates your vitamin D intake considering your personal profile and skin type.
The ring sends all the measurements to the Helios app. We developed special algorithms for accurate measurements that converts data in a user-friendly application.
We want to create a smart device that's very easy to use. You only have to wear the ring to receive notifications about vitamin D, sunlight and daylight and in the dashboard you can follow your progress. With a very user friendly app we want to motivate people to absorb as much vitamin D as necessary, stay protected against UV radiation and receive the minimum amount of daylight every day.

 


The Helios smart ring is compatible with iOS and Android
 
Skin type
      After you made a profile, you have to select your skin type. This is very important for accurate personal measurements! There are six different skin types that have a different reaction on vitamin D and protection against UV radiation. You can find more information about skin types on our website where you can download a PDF with all the information you need to know.  
 

 

 
Dashboard

 

You can see your progress per day, week, month and year.
 

 
The Sunlight CoachThe sunlight coach shows per week, month and year how many hours you have spent safely in the sun and how many hours were unsafe.
Vitamin D coach The vitamin D coach shows per week, month and year how much vitamin D you are consuming. You can always see how many units of vitamin D you consumed in total and how many units you still need for that minimum yearly goal. Daylight coach The daylight coach shows how many days you reached your minimum amount of daylight and how many days you didn’t reach your minimum amount. You have a clear insight in your daylight consumption. You can draw conclusions to go outside more after and complete days with enough daylight.ConclusionYou have a great insight in your relation with vitamin D, sunlight, and daylight. You can draw conclusions from the year overviews, like: which months are best for vitamin D consumption, or that you have spend too much time unsafe in the sun, or that you have too many days without the minimum amount of daylight. 

We provide 12 (US) ring sizes. It's very important to order the right ring size and that you have a ring that fits perfect around your finger. If you already know your ring size, you can select the ring size when you click on the perk.We have on our website a ring size chart that can help you figure out what size you have. Visit our website e-senses.com/shop/ where you can download the ring size chart.

 

 
Note that these are just plans that we want to implement when we reach our funding and that we don't guarantee that we are going to build these updates. We are very much open for conversation about this and you can always spark up the conversation about what you think it's important to improve our product. The user comes first! Social media sharesWe want to implement the option that you can share your status on social media. You can share how much vitamin D you consumed. You can share your time that you spend safely in the sun. You can share the amount of days where reached the minimum amount of daylight. This way we want to make people more aware of their time spend inside and motivate people to go more outside often.Compare your stats with other peoplewe want to create a system where you can log in to the website where you can see your statistics and compare yourself with other users. We want a top 10 or a top 100 list with users that consume the most vitamin D, are most safe in the safe or have the most days with the required amount of daylight. In addition, we want to compare countries and maybe cities with all the users. We are very excited about this. What countries consume the most vitamin D? Which people spend their time safe or unsafe in the sun the most? Which country goes outside the most?Motivation RewardsWe want to implement a rewarding system for extra motivation. When you reach different goals, you receive rewards. When you hit your yearly goal you will receive (and this is just an example) the Helios king reward. When you have  reached 100 days of the minimum amount of daylight, you will receive (again an example) the 100-daylight reward. You can share these rewards on social media or with friends.
 

 
We are very excited about this product and we think it's a great addition to the wearable market and also a unique and authenticate way looking at our way of life and improving your health.
We hope that you are excited too and that you see benefit from the Helios smart ring.
In order to survive and deliver this product to your doorstep, we need your help!
We are looking forward to your feedback. With your insights, we can create a better product for you in the future. Our mission is to make people more aware of all the benefits that sunlight and daylight can bring them in an easy and fun way.
You can help us by ordering a Helios ring in advance. Make advantage of our discounts proposition and be the first person who wearing and using this ring.
Other ways to help:
Can you help us promote the Helios Ring in your country? Can you advise us the right approach? Can you introduce us to the right people? Are you in preventive healthcare and do you want to use the Helios ring for medical studies?
Are you famous and do you want to be an example to other people by wearing the Helios Ring?
Let us know!
We thank you!
 

 
The creation of the Helios smart ring was possible by using latest disruptive technologies and highest degree of miniaturized solutions. The Helios smart ring is a creation of a brilliant multidisciplinary team of Dutch designers and engineers of Holst centre, HYB, Aeson, de Kat and Promea. Building on each others ideas and unexpected insights leads us to advanced, less homogenized thinking and meaningful work; allows us to create solutions we could not do before. 
 

 

 

 
 

 

Our team went through several generations of prototypes until we were satisfied with the usability, comfortability and wear ability of the Helios smart ring. Together with our experienced partners, we are looking forward for testing of reliability and durability phase, fine-tuning the software and user experience, making tools for the industrialization phase. The Helios smart ring is created in the Netherlands and will be manufactured in the Netherlands to ensure a premium production quality.
 
 
 
 
 
_____________________________________________________________________________
We need your help community of Indiegogo to finalize the prototype and begin mass production
_____________________________________________________________________________
In exchange for your support, you will be one of the first people on the planet who will wear the beautiful and intelligent Helios smart ring, which will coach you in a responsible matter concerning sun and daylight exposure to enjoy the enormous health benefits in a natural way.
 

 

 



 
Please note that there may be additional duties, fees or taxes raised by the authorities in your country. You may need to take care of them yourself when receiving the shipment.
No shipping to the following countries due to US embargo: Iran, Sudan, Syria, North Korea
 

 
Thank you very much for you support and belief in our team and product!
 

Risks & Challenges
Manufacturing a physical product can be a tough journey. One of the most important factors is the relationship with the supplier. Luckily, we have a trusting relationship with a high-quality manufacturer founded on transparency and open communication. Even with working prototypes in our hands that have passed quality inspections and contracts in place with our manufacturer ready to go, there is always a possibility of something going unplanned. Because of this, we have added buffers in our timeline to embrace the unexpected and allow us to deliver your product on time.Our goal is to deliver a high quality product on the market, and we will work non-stop to deliver the product on time and be transparent from start to finish.

story:
Ever wondered how clean a wipe with disinfectants really gets your household items? Spoiler alert it’s not 99.9% 

Not all products that kill 99.9% of bacteria and viruses are created equal.

Traditional disinfectants usually take up to 10 minutes of wiping or soaking every nook and cranny to even get close to this. With Vyrex, you can get to every nook and cranny with a simple flip of a switch. 

Vyrex Clear isn’t just a better way to clean your products, its the BEST way.

Clean smarter not harder, back Vyrex Clear today!

 

Germs are everywhere, and that means they’re on our phones, our keys, our sunglasses — anything we bring out into the world with us. 

Now more than ever, it’s clear that viruses and bacteria have the potential to quickly and substantially alter our daily lives. Knowing how prevalent and powerful these bacteria and viruses can be — and how easily they can travel into our homes — makes it very tempting to feel unsafe, and to feel like a truly clean household is impossible. 

 But luckily, Vyrex Clear makes achieving a medical-grade level of clean for your daily items incredibly easy, all while staying 100% safe and environmentally friendly. Vyrex Clear combines UV-a and UV-c light to kill 99.9% of viruses and bacteria — 3x faster than the industry standard.

All your devices and items need to reach a medical-grade level of clean is 3 minutes inside the Vyrex Clear. 

 

 

 

In the struggle to keep our lives and homes clean and safe, it’s important to clean our everyday items. This can be challenging, however. It’s easy to forget to do so — plus, traditional cleaning methods like alcohol wipes or sprays can harm or damage sensitive electronics.

That’s where Vyrex Clear comes in. By placing your items inside the Vyrex Clear, not only do they receive a medical-grade cleaning, but they do so without any risk of damages to their electronics.

The cleaning process is completely safe for your devices and is more effective than alcohol sprays or disinfectant wipes. With 5 UV lamps positioned throughout the device (as well as its reflective dome cover), the Vyrex Clear cleans 100% of your item.

 

 

Combine that level of coverage with the Vyrex Clear’s internal rotating tray, and every angle of your device gets a deeper clean than any wipe or spray can provide — all while using environmentally-friendly low voltage technology.

 

 

And since it’s made with 100% recycled materials, the Vyrex Clear proves that clean and green can and should happen at the same time.

 

 
Vyrex Clear harnesses the power of both UV-a and UV-c light. By combining user-grade and medical-grade UV sanitation, the Vyrex Clear cleans your items on a deeper, more thorough level than sprays, wipes, or other surface-use disinfectants. 

 

The tray of the Vyrex Clear rotates underneath 5 UV-a and UV-c lamps. By exposing every nook and cranny of your items to these lamps, your devices emerge with 99.9% of viruses and bacteria completely destroyed.

 

In the natural world, UV-c light is blocked by the Earth’s atmosphere. This is good for us, since it keeps us humans safe from harm. However, by using UV-c light within the safely sealed Vyrex Clear, the light is able to break down bacterial DNA and clean your items without exposing you or your household to harmful UV rays.

 

 

In addition to keeping thel UV light contained, the Vyrex Clear’s lamps are mercury and ozone free. This means any item you place inside is deep cleaned using only UV light — no harmful materials or chemicals to be found.

And the cleaning process doesn’t end with your phone. Large enough to hold and clean the items you need in your daily life, the Vyrex Clean’s five UV lamps combine to provide 120 degrees of deep cleaning for household items like tools, toothbrushes, pacifiers, and remote controls. 

 

 

 

With the power of Qi wireless charging, the Vyrex Clear blends usefulness and practicality into one sleek design. Not only do you get to charge your phone — you also get to disinfect it at the same time. 

 

With its powerful 15-watt Qi charger, the Vyrex Clear can wirelessly charge a myriad of wireless-capable phones. Wake up every morning knowing your device is fully charged and fully cleaned.

 

 

A new type of clean

Bacteria may be small, but the impact they can have on our lives can’t be overstated. With the Vyrex Clear, cleanliness (and peace of mind) is only three minutes away.

 

 

Having experience developing products, we have learned the ways to fail. But more so, the questions to ask before taking a risk. The Vyrex Clear has come a long way since its concept, But it didn't come easy. We have overcome many difficulties and have pushed through.

 

We have strong confidence in our manufacturing processes and the product in itself. We don't see much risk in the future, but given the current state of the world, we understand you can't always predict the future.

We have a secure plan in place to ensure the product and delivery of each Vyrex Clear goes smoothly, but with anything, there can be bumps and delays. But with confidence, we will push through to stay on the production schedule we have committed.

story:
Hello. This is Boxscoop.

 

The litter box is a real struggle, for all of us. This system will change that but before we explain the intricacies, we would like to tell you how it came to be. From a young age I have been passionate on design, efficiency and simplicity. When I grew up I became an Engineer. Michelle and I are both passionate on fairness and respect for all creatures. The disconnect between integrating the litter box into the household and having it ethical for our cats drove us crazy.

 

From the start of 2017 through to Oct. 2018 we stood by helplessly watching my sister face an aggressive breast cancer; I coped by spending copious amounts of time fixated on designing a better litter box. We approached it from a completely different angle demanding the utmost efficiency with zero compromise. The vision was to create the perfect synergy between human AND cat needs.

James + Michelle

 

First, we need to meow this out.

 

Boxscoop has modern aesthetics and because your eyes cannot catch the corners (there are none) it appears smaller than it is. It's an illusion... it's not meant for 25 lb cats but it is bigger than a standard litter box and far more ergonomic to the way cats move. 

 

 

 

A Zero Compromise Solution.

 

Boxscoop is chore free to maintain, raises next to zero dust, and is designed from cat behavior studies for cat comfort... plus, it's modern and looks nothing like a litter box.

 

 

We released our first model in July 2018 and the feedback was incredible. We recorded every detail and consistently analyzed for improvements. Success to us is making the most number of lives better. We brought the first model to market ourselves; we can do infinitely better together with you.

 

 

 

 

We've now shipped 6000+ Boxscoops!

 

Minimalist design

 

When dealing with pee and poo, the fewer components and seams the better. The container, scoop and cover are all precision made. Ridges and contours are elegantly carved into the surface to allow it to slice through the litter like this. The design looks simple because we over-engineered for simplicity. Creating this sized container with precision in one piece requires a machine capable of pressing the equivalent weight of 330 cars!


The cover on 2.0 is designed to securely fit without any clips, because who wants to fumble with clips every time they go to clean the litter box! It's actually so secure it's essentially dog proof!

 

 

 

5 days and 2.7 minutes total spent on the litter box, including removing/replacing the cover and tossing the waste in another room— and that's daily cleaning with a 14-15lb cat. This is real life with Boxscoop.

 

 

 

A standard clay litter in a standard litter box with one large cat costs ~US$ 220 per year. Boxscoop is extremely litter efficient and saves hundreds in litter costs:

*Annual costs calculated are approximations based on one large cat (12-15lbs). For full experiment and results, please see our blog post: The cost of cat litter

 

 

From surveys, 52% of our backers use clay litter and Boxscoop is ~35% more litter efficient than a standard litter box with clay litter. From the 6000 we've shipped in 2019, that translates to at least 500,000lbs less clay litter being consumed per year. That's a big deal, and with every new Boxscoop 2.0 shipped, the number will keep increasing.

 

 

We engineered features into the design to perform even better with alternative clumping litters like corn, grass, walnut, wheat and more. These litters are lighter, healthier for cats, biodegradable and they stay fresher longer, saving you money while saving the environment and your cats health.

This is Boxscoop with a Walnut based litter:

 

 

 

Grass litter compliments almost all other clumping litters, especially clay. It's typically odor and dust free and it clumps and absorbs odors and moisture amazingly well.

If you have a clay litter you love, mixing 30-50% of a grass litter in with the clay will keep the litter fresher and extend its life. It also lightens heavy clays and makes them even easier to scoop!

 

*Dr. Elsey Ultra and other similar coarse grain clay litters are sludgy and require more scooping force in Boxscoop. If you'd like to use a coarse grain clay, we highly recommend mixing in 30-50% of a grass or walnut litter.

 

This is Dr.Elsey's Ultra with 50% Grass litter added:

 

 

 

Boxscoop components are 100% recyclable— and we package without the use of plastic.

We're also currently developing a toss container that will seamless attach to Boxscoop so you can scoop, toss and compostable bag quickly! The toss container holds and dispenses rolls of compostable doggie waste bags.

This accessory will be available for your Boxscoop in April 2020, and as a Boxscoop backer you can pre-order it directly from our site at 67% discount.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Cats have 200 million odor-sensitive cells and it’s our mission to make daily cleaning easy, so your cats have one of their most basic and overlooked needs fulfilled—a clean comfortable place to do their business.

Do you have 20-30 seconds a day? Thirty seconds is ¼ the time it takes to brush your teeth and the scoop will run through all the litter getting those little nasties out; it's a rewarding feeling and your cats will thank you with extra purrs

Boxscoop 2.0 is recommended for cats up to around 15lbs that are agile and can easily jump up on to a couch. The scoop can also be stored outside, or Boxscoop can be used with the cover off for cats that want a bit of extra room.

 

Boxscoop Curve XL is available on our website for cats up to 20-21lbs. If you are interested in Curve XL click the link below:

Boxscoop Curve XL

Cat weight:

 

 

 

 

Inside Boxscoop cats can freely turn and the open top gives them visibility to everything around them. They feel safe, secure and always have the option to pounce out if something makes them uneasy.

 

*Photos from our original model. Boxscoop 2.0 is even more open on top.

 

 

80% of cats take to Boxscoop like "ducks to water" the other 20% require more time. The design works both with and without the cover; this way the skeptic cats can adjust at their own pace. 

Purrwood forest uses them both ways throughout their no kill sanctuary. 

 

 

 

It's time to say goodbye smelliness...

 

The beauty of having no corners or seams makes sanitizing the whole litter box so easy and rewarding.

 

For an extra deep clean you can let the scoop and container sit in a vinegar/water solution.

 

 

...and hello to Boxsoop

 

You can have your very own Boxscoop 2.0... you just have to help us create it for you!

 

 

 

This was our timeline from 2019. We successfully produced 6000 Boxscoop 2.0s in 2019 and fulfilled Shipment #1 and #2 on time! We've now finished production for our March 2020!

 

 

Hey, this all just kinda happened.

 

Boxscoop began with Arthur, a Bengal that started her life being mistaken for a boy. Arthur loved to dig, she was a cat after all!! but she hated being enclosed; Michelle disliked the dinosaur litter box in our closet and I felt the design efficiencies of litter boxes were absurd. 

 

On Feb. 21, 2017 I wrote this:

In July 2018, we released the original Boxscoop. It received incredible feedback but it also could be far improved. It was our first attempt and we funded it ourselves. It was an exciting time we felt we were making a real difference! Then on October 6th, while running around chasing a feather Arthur collapsed. She was only 2.5 years old and completely had our hearts... She had a genetic heart condition called HCM and just like that little Arthur was gone... and then 15 hours later my sister took her last breaths as well. 

 

The easy thing to do would be quit Boxscoop... but this was inspired by Arthur, and encouraged by Kristy. They planted the seed and we are beyond inspired to take Boxscoop to the next level.

James + Michelle
story_txt:
We are sold out on Indiegogo but Boxscoop 2.0 and Curve XL are available at theboxscoop.com

This accessory will be available for your Boxscoop in April 2020, and as a Boxscoop backer you can pre-order it directly from our site at 67% discount.
 
 

 
 



 
 

 
Cats have 200 million odor-sensitive cells and it’s our mission to make daily cleaning easy, so your cats have one of their most basic and overlooked needs fulfilled—a clean comfortable place to do their business.
Do you have 20-30 seconds a day? Thirty seconds is ¼ the time it takes to brush your teeth and the scoop will run through all the litter getting those little nasties out; it's a rewarding feeling and your cats will thank you with extra purrs
Boxscoop 2.0 is recommended for cats up to around 15lbs that are agile and can easily jump up on to a couch. The scoop can also be stored outside, or Boxscoop can be used with the cover off for cats that want a bit of extra room.
 
Boxscoop Curve XL is available on our website for cats up to 20-21lbs. If you are interested in Curve XL click the link below:
Boxscoop Curve XL Cat weight:
 

 

 


 
Inside Boxscoop cats can freely turn and the open top gives them visibility to everything around them. They feel safe, secure and always have the option to pounce out if something makes them uneasy.
 

*Photos from our original model. Boxscoop 2.0 is even more open on top.
 

 
80% of cats take to Boxscoop like "ducks to water" the other 20% require more time. The design works both with and without the cover; this way the skeptic cats can adjust at their own pace. 
Purrwood forest uses them both ways throughout their no kill sanctuary. 
 

 
 

 
 
It's time to say goodbye smelliness...
 
The beauty of having no corners or seams makes sanitizing the whole litter box so easy and rewarding.
   
For an extra deep clean you can let the scoop and container sit in a vinegar/water solution.   
 
...and hello to Boxsoop
 
You can have your very own Boxscoop 2.0... you just have to help us create it for you!
 

 

 
This was our timeline from 2019. We successfully produced 6000 Boxscoop 2.0s in 2019 and fulfilled Shipment #1 and #2 on time! We've now finished production for our March 2020!
 

 
Hey, this all just kinda happened.
 

 
Boxscoop began with Arthur, a Bengal that started her life being mistaken for a boy. Arthur loved to dig, she was a cat after all!! but she hated being enclosed; Michelle disliked the dinosaur litter box in our closet and I felt the design efficiencies of litter boxes were absurd. 
 
On Feb. 21, 2017 I wrote this:

 
In July 2018, we released the original Boxscoop. It received incredible feedback but it also could be far improved. It was our first attempt and we funded it ourselves. It was an exciting time we felt we were making a real difference! Then on October 6th, while running around chasing a feather Arthur collapsed. She was only 2.5 years old and completely had our hearts... She had a genetic heart condition called HCM and just like that little Arthur was gone... and then 15 hours later my sister took her last breaths as well. 
 
The easy thing to do would be quit Boxscoop... but this was inspired by Arthur, and encouraged by Kristy. They planted the seed and we are beyond inspired to take Boxscoop to the next level.
James + Michelle

story:
Tired of crawling after your charging cable?

Let me guess.
Almost everytime you want to charge your mobile phone or iPad, you'll be looking for the cable on the floor beside your bed, sofa or desk.
After it's charged, you plug it out, let it go and it slips back on the floor.

No one likes to get down on the ground just to find a lost cable, or deal with the frustration of needing to move furniture just to get a slipped cable from behind the item.

How many times you knocked your head by picking up cables from under the table!

Let this never happen again with magmount!

 


Look what magmount is for


Without magmount your cable will fall on the floor


and with magmount, you can easily hold it in place.
Also see how easy magmount is attached.





The easiest solution

magmount works very simple and easy.

There are two parts.
The cable clip and the baseplate.In both parts a magnet is integrated.

The opening, where the charging cable is clamped in, is 4mm/0,16in in diameter for thicker USB cables like micro-USB. The easy to install adapter is 3mm/0,12in in diameter and perfect for thinner cables like the iPhone Lightning or audio cables. This size is just right that the clip won't slip down the cable or squeeze it too hard.

The magnets are very strong to hold your cable in place and weak enough for an easy release.

At the bottom of the baseplate is an adhesive foampad attached, for a secure attachment on any surface.It prevents ripping it off by the cable clip magnet.
Place it anywhere you want, just by sticking it to your favorite spot.





Other cable brackets doesn't have a magnet.
Placing and releasing the cable is very tricky and stressy.Everytime you want to get your cable, you have to rip on it and bend it. This will definately cause an damage in the long way.



Extraordinary?

Choose out of 10 different colors.




So stylish and so useful

After two months of design, testing and prototyping we can't wait to get magmount to you.

Our prototypes are in use every day.It's almost impossible without.
You won't believe how much easier magmount will make charging.

Magmount makes your desk much neater.
No big charging station or super long cables anymore.



What's the plan?

Our next steps are collecting funds to produce the molds and check the quality of the product.We wan't that everything is just right and everbody feels satisfied.
At this moment only the prototypes exists.They are totally functional but don't have the final design.
Then we can order all different parts.
After receiving them, we'll start the assembling, which is done by hand to be sure every magmount is without faults.Quality is very important for us.
Magmount is wrapped twice, so it can be shipped in a safe way without breaking or scratching.


Thats how magmount is wrapped.


Timeline


Some of our prototypes




Your funds

Your funds are needed for:

  1. Producing the molds 
  2. The packaging and assembling
  3. Shipping
  4. Taxes and fees 


About us...

We are a little group of three and want to start a business for designers and thinkers who want to realize their visions.

Two of us quitted their old job to do what we really like.Bring the ideas from mind to reality.And don't waste just talking about it.Even if this will be a harder job. But you like what you do, when you do what you like!

With experience in electronics, engineering, sale and tech, we have a good base to start.

For the future, we have a lot of other incredible ideas, and use magmount as the start.

Once we have the possibilities, we also want to help other people, who don't know how to start or let their ideas come true.




We need you!

Thank you so much for checking out this campaign!

We want to make life easier with cool stuff.

Like it on Facebook and share it where you can

Tell all your friends about magmount and help make life easier!

Please contact us if you have any question. Don't miss updates and follow this campaign!

contact: indieglobe@online.de

story:
Awesome Perk Now Available

Every Dollar makes a differance.


Our Story

Like all ventures in life, mine started with an idea.  Inspired by the limited space in my beautiful 2 year old daughter's bedroom, I started looking for space saving furniture with superior build quality, at a good price. What I found was disappointing at first, but then I realized that there is a huge market for this in South Africa.  The loft beds that we can get, is either badly build, or overpriced.  Well build beds start from $1100 up to a staggering $2000. 
After a considerable amount of research, I found that I can produce an excellent product, and show a profit for only $900
With very strong wood, and strategically placed fasteners, the product can comfortably carry 160Kg or 350lb, which comes in handy when Mommy needs to share the bed to get the little one to fall asleep. 
After 4 Months of juggling a day job, household, kids, a husband, and designing of the product part-time, I'm finally ready to launch my first product at my new startup, DinkySpaces. 
From the get-go, I aimed to have my first product ready for production by October'15, and I am almost there.  I have taken the plunge and booked a stand for the last week in August to promote the product at a local well-known Expo in South Africa. 
This is where I ask you for a little support.  As with any start-up business, some funding is required to get everything up and running.  Please would you be so kind as to back me in this venture?  
The Money would be located as follows:
  • 1st Product Build $800
  • Packaging Design $200
  • Overheads $600
  • Expenditures $300
  • Transport Hire(Logistics) $100
  • Product Marketing expenses $1200
Anything above and beyond will go towards setting up an in-house production facility.  With a couple of years working in a production environment, and experience in business management, I believe I can grow a successful business.
