story:
Short Summary

My name is Peter, I was born and grew up on Mfangano Island in Kenya. My wife's name is Jane and we've worked with orphans for over five years now.  Providing for them is something we are deeply passionate about. We currently feed 50 orphans on the island and want to build housing for them.

I was a teacher for sometime, where I learned the importance of a stable home life, and its impact on educational development. That is the reason we decided to start the orphanage. Lots of the kids we care for either didn't have parents or had abusive ones affected by alcoholism or HIV/AIDS. Currently they are staying with different volunteers in temporary housing, and while that is better than what they had before, they still are in a very difficult situation, having nowhere to call home. 

On the positive side small donations can go a long way in helping the orphans have a place to call home. Since Kenya is a poor country we can do a lot with a little. Please read more about what we are doing and consider donating today.

What We Need & What You Get

The amount we are asking for is what we would need to the building built. Here is the break down of cost.

I dormitory (8.5 x 17 meters) = 750,000 Kenya shillings = $9,375 U.S. Dollars
2 toilets = 250,000 Kenya shillings = $3,125 U.S. Dollars
1 dinning hall = 600,000 Kenya shillings = $7,500 U.S. Dollars
1 kitchen = 200,000 Kenya shillings = $2,500 U.S. Dollars


**These prices don't include the second dormitory we plan on building, chairs, tables or shelves for the orphans to put their things. We can manage without these things for a time, and simply want a roof for the kids**

The Impact

For five years know we've been feeding and providing clothes for these orphans. We started with 300,000 Kenya shillings ($3,750 dollars) a year and now in year five we've been able to grow that number to 2,000,000 shillings ($25,000 dollars) demonstrating that we can successfully use the money we receive and provide even more. Although, we've been able to grow the money supply we've also had a large influx of orphans as well, due to HIV and can only afford to feed and cloth them right now. With your help they will finally have a permanent place to sleep.

Risks & Challenges

This project isn't going to be easy. I am currently renting out my own home to get additional funds to help build the project and to allow me to manage it.

Some of the challenges we could face are:
1. Not getting enough to start the building, in which case we will save the money for a year and if after that time we haven't raised enough we will use it for food for the children.
2. Getting approval from local government and tribe leaders.
3. Change in prices of building materials.

We expect to be able to overcome any challenges that may arise due to our great network of volunteers around the world. Currently we have a professional engineer, IT workers, a community worker, a doctor, and other professionals who are willing to spend their own money to come out for the construction of the project because they believe in the cause, and will be of great help to us when facing any challenges. 

Also, I've been living on the island my whole life and have a good relationship with the community and have participated in building the local school so I know about how the process will go. Not to mention this is my passion.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please share this campaign with your friends, we would love to talk to anyone who just wants to learn more. Blast emails, phone calls with friends, are all very appreciated!
  • Use the social media share tools on the side to share on your social media.

story:
What is Tempro?

Tempro is a miniature wide dynamic range multi-purpose smart thermometer; a gadget with scientific grade temperature readings. The unique cross-calibration sensing technique removes any possible device to device or operating system variations and hence enables its use with both IOS and Android based mobile devices.

What does differentiate Tempro from the competing non-smart or smart temperature sensor technologies?

There is not a single answer to this question!

Tempro is a precise sensor technology for a wide temperature range

Tempro is not a limited range or limited application device. Unlike many in the market, Tempro is a multi-purpose device thanks to its ability to conduct measurements across wide range of temperatures. Most thermometers are designed for a specific purpose; say body temperature, and hence can only provide accurate readings around a specific range. Tempro on the other hand, goes head to head in accuracy with scientific thermo-coupled thermometers in more than 100 degrees range. Check out some hot, cold and nominal wide-range temperature measurements side by side with a high accuracy dual-probe thermometer

Accuracy comparison of Tempro with a scientific grade thermometer


Tempro is smart and universal 


Tempro works with IOS and Android phones or tablets with Android versions 4.3 and above. Thanks to many accuracy enhancement techniques in hardware and software, it maintains high level of sensitivity regardless of the device it is attached to. Since it interfaces through standard 3.5mm audio jack, the same device can be used in multiple tablets or phones. You can log a measurement history or plot temperature graphs in the background of your phone or tablet. You can save graphs and it can trigger an alarm if the user defined temperature limits are exceeded. Alarm feature on your mobile device can as well send text messages or emails to a remote user.

Tempro is small 

The device is miniature and hence very convenient to carry.

Tempro does not require a battery 

Tempro does not require a separate battery to operate; due to its passive nature it can live with trickle of current from the audio jack which makes it environmentally responsible device. It is built from all RoHS compliant components; heart of the design, the sensor being manufactured in California.

Tempro is versatile

One can use Tempro for any application that his or her imagination can come up with; use it to measure temperature of literally anything! Do not forget to attach a Tempro to your backpack or keychain for your next wild-life trip or camp-ground adventure!

Practical Usages of Tempro JCK

Stick a Tempro-JCK to your backpack and just plug Tempro to your mobile device when you needed to track the temperature during your adventures. Not only feel the warm spring day in your adventure trip but also store it in your mobile device using your Tempro. Tempro makes the cool peaks even cooler, save your experience to your mobile device with a Tempro.

You can carry Tempro in your keychain! Tempro-JCK has a keychain loop to attach it to a keychain.

You can Have a tight temperature control at your barn, just drop a mobile device with Tempro and keep the chickens happy!

Add a Tempro to your list of everyday gadgets and measure the temperature accurately when needed.

Set a mobile device with Tempro in your greenhouse and enjoy a peace of mind! let Tempro notify you when it chills!

Risks and challenges

Hardware is almost finished. We are still developing the IOS and Android apps. The apps are almost ready too. We are just testing them thoroughly to make sure that we provide the best usable app for this device. It will be ready in 1-2 weeks.

story:
Moonwort Studio - Our Work

Our creative work seeks new ways for people to experience and learn about nature, especially our wonderfully diverse native plants. Among Moonwort Studio projects that bring the beauty of native plants into view are planted terrariums, courtyard gardens and related kinds of model ecosystem displays.

Our design work is informed by visits to natural ecosystems. Providing opportunity for close study of wild plants, animals and places, these trips offer creative inspiration and natural history content for our projects. As enjoyable as it is to visit our neighboring forests, prairies and wetlands, we have been dismayed to find some areas badly degraded by established invasive weeds, such as common buckthorn, or quickly succumbing to invasive newcomers, such as garlic mustard. The spread of non-native, invasive weeds has profound, reverberating effects. As native plants under pressure from invasives fail to reproduce and fade away, the food and shelter they provide for wild animals also disappear from the landscape.

Cricket Precision Weeding Tool

Hand-pulling is a favorite method for removing invasive plants, but it can actually encourage their spread. With each invasive plant that is pulled out by the roots, a patch of soil is disturbed and exposed. Invasive plant seeds buried in the soil are also brought to the surface where they can germinate with exposure to light. Other weeding methods can discourage desirable native plants (mowing) or pollute the environment (herbicides).

The Cricket Precision Weeding Tool addresses these issues with a sharp cutting edge that slices through the invasive plant crown and causes minimal soil disturbance. The Cricket steel blade (see design below) is attached to a lightweight hardwood handle with a long reach, so you can cut many invasive weeds with relatively easy work. While chopping the top of a plant might kill it right away, timely weeding with the Cricket will slow the spread of invasive plants so that native species can gain an advantage with growth, reproduction and establishment. 

Crowdfunding the Cricket

Your support will bring the Cricket Precision Weeding Tool project to scale with the steps in our first production run.

A local metalwork shop will use a CNC laser to cut the Cricket blades from high-carbon steel, while we will use a bench grinder to shape the cutting edges.  So that the blades will hold a sharp cutting edges during use, we will heat treat (+1,100°F) the steel blanks for hardness, then heat temper (400°F) for toughness. We will also apply safety red paint to high-quality hardwood tool handles. We will seat the Cricket blades in the handles, then seal the handle ferrule end with epoxy. The completed Cricket Precision Weeding tools will be nicely finished and a joy to use.

Among our Indiegogo perks is the complete Cricket Precision Weeding Tool shipped to backers and ready for use this spring. At another funding level backers will receive the Cricket blade only with instructions for attachment to a 60" ferruled hardwood handle. These handles are affordable and pretty easy to find for sale at home improvement stores. We appreciate any support and we will send packets of native (Eastern United States) seeds with planting instructions to backers pledging at the most basic level.
 
 

Our successful Indiegogo campaign will advance our first goal;  promotion of the Cricket Precision Weeding Tool as an improved way to encourage native plants and improve ecosystem health with removal of invasive weeds. We will build upon this momentum to make the Cricket Precision Weeding Tool more widely available to gardeners, land managers and conservation professionals.

Moving This Project Forward

The Cricket Precision Weeding Tool project presents some special challenges, but we have resolved the tool's design and manufacture process, so bringing the project to scale with a larger production run is our most essential new goal. We are eager to get the Cricket into the hands of native plant enthusiasts for use tackling invasive weeds this spring and summer.

Thank you!

Thank you for stopping by! We truly appreciate support at any backer level. Please share our project link with your friends who like gardening, native plants and wild habitats.
story_txt:
Moonwort Studio - Our Work
Our creative work seeks new ways for people to experience and learn about nature, especially our wonderfully diverse native plants. Among Moonwort Studio projects that bring the beauty of native plants into view are planted terrariums, courtyard gardens and related kinds of model ecosystem displays.

Our design work is informed by visits to natural ecosystems. Providing opportunity for close study of wild plants, animals and places, these trips offer creative inspiration and natural history content for our projects. As enjoyable as it is to visit our neighboring forests, prairies and wetlands, we have been dismayed to find some areas badly degraded by established invasive weeds, such as common buckthorn, or quickly succumbing to invasive newcomers, such as garlic mustard. The spread of non-native, invasive weeds has profound, reverberating effects. As native plants under pressure from invasives fail to reproduce and fade away, the food and shelter they provide for wild animals also disappear from the landscape.
Cricket Precision Weeding Tool 
Hand-pulling is a favorite method for removing invasive plants, but it can actually encourage their spread. With each invasive plant that is pulled out by the roots, a patch of soil is disturbed and exposed. Invasive plant seeds buried in the soil are also brought to the surface where they can germinate with exposure to light. Other weeding methods can discourage desirable native plants (mowing) or pollute the environment (herbicides).
The Cricket Precision Weeding Tool addresses these issues with a sharp cutting edge that slices through the invasive plant crown and causes minimal soil disturbance. The Cricket steel blade (see design below) is attached to a lightweight hardwood handle with a long reach, so you can cut many invasive weeds with relatively easy work. While chopping the top of a plant might kill it right away, timely weeding with the Cricket will slow the spread of invasive plants so that native species can gain an advantage with growth, reproduction and establishment. 

Crowdfunding the Cricket 
Your support will bring the Cricket Precision Weeding Tool project to scale with the steps in our first production run.
A local metalwork shop will use a CNC laser to cut the Cricket blades from high-carbon steel, while we will use a bench grinder to shape the cutting edges.  So that the blades will hold a sharp cutting edges during use, we will heat treat (+1,100°F) the steel blanks for hardness, then heat temper (400°F) for toughness. We will also apply safety red paint to high-quality hardwood tool handles. We will seat the Cricket blades in the handles, then seal the handle ferrule end with epoxy. The completed Cricket Precision Weeding tools will be nicely finished and a joy to use.

Among our Indiegogo perks is the complete Cricket Precision Weeding Tool shipped to backers and ready for use this spring. At another funding level backers will receive the Cricket blade only with instructions for attachment to a 60" ferruled hardwood handle. These handles are affordable and pretty easy to find for sale at home improvement stores. We appreciate any support and we will send packets of native (Eastern United States) seeds with planting instructions to backers pledging at the most basic level.  Our successful Indiegogo campaign will advance our first goal;  promotion of the Cricket Precision Weeding Tool as an improved way to encourage native plants and improve ecosystem health with removal of invasive weeds. We will build upon this momentum to make the Cricket Precision Weeding Tool more widely available to gardeners, land managers and conservation professionals.Moving This Project ForwardThe Cricket Precision Weeding Tool project presents some special challenges, but we have resolved the tool's design and manufacture process, so bringing the project to scale with a larger production run is our most essential new goal. We are eager to get the Cricket into the hands of native plant enthusiasts for use tackling invasive weeds this spring and summer.
Thank you!Thank you for stopping by! We truly appreciate support at any backer level. Please share our project link with your friends who like gardening, native plants and wild habitats.

story:
What's in it for you?

When you pre-order your KOPP now, you get to save BIG compared to the future market price. You save $50 with KOPP Tall and $70 with KOPP Venti.

Why flexible funding? What happens if we don't get funded?

We want to give you the opportunity to be among the first to own the KOPP. If you like it, you can own it even if we don't get the full funds we are asking for. We will make sure this comes to life in January 2016 as promised.

What makes Kopp different?

Kopp is a smart mug designed for the enthusiasts: people who like their favorite drink with them all the time, who want to be connected all the time and with huge storage memory enough to enjoy coffee and taking photos at the same time.

What does it do?

Kopp does three things: keep you favorite drink fresh, acts as your wifi hotspot with special US vpn access and serves as reliable storage for your files and media.

Why is Kopp so important?

Because it combines the main 3 important components of our modern daily lives in 1 beautiful gadget.

How does it work?

In addition to keeping your drink fresh and tasty, Kopp will be take data access from either a sim card you insert or a wireless access point nearby then connects you to your free US vpn account. All you have to do is turn your WIFI on from your smart phone. The memory storage works both wirelessly and thru a USB 3.0 cable. Kopp got you covered.

How do I recharge Kopp battery?

Using any power socket. Kopp comes equipped with a neat power cord to help you do that. You can also recharge using any USB cable.

How smart is Kopp?

Kopp is smart enough to know that you consumed your drink. It will blink to remind you of a refill. It also has indicators for power, storage and Wifi so you know whats happening by just a look.

Do you have more detailed feature information?

•  Stainless steel

•  Dimensions: Kopp Tall: 6.5" T x 2.5" W / Kopp Venti: 9" T x 3.5" W

• Capacity: 12 and 20 oz

•  Touch user interface

•  Fits almost anywhere

Do you plan to make accessories for Kopp?

Yes, we are already designing cool accessories to be added to the collection. You will be able to purchase them separately from our website.

Where can Kopp be shipped?

We will ship worldwide. Additional fees may apply for shipping outside the EU.

When will you be shipping Kopp?

We expect to ship Kopp by January 2016. 

What is the warranty for Kopp?

Kopp will include a one-year limited warranty.


Social Media:
Check out my profile on LinkedIn to learn more about my work and business. I am the creator of few cool apps such as TexyFi Messenger - the texting app with real-time translation feature and much more! Give it a try its on Google Play.

My social media pages: 
  • LinkedIn
    https://www.linkedin.com/in/aplusn

  • Facebook
        https://www.facebook.com/nplusa 

Still have more questions?
Send us an email to info@koppthemug.com or visit our website for future updates and products. The website address is: koppthemug.com

story:
You can now order a Netool today! go to https://www.netool.io

 

Meet Netool

 

 

 

 

 

The network diagnostic and discovery tool you have been waiting for

Netool is a diagnostic tool for testing and discovering information about any given network port on any switch, router or any other network device. Just plug Netool into a port and gain access to information that you have never had access to before.

Reduce labor by cutting out the amount of time it takes to trouble-shoot a misconfigured port and having the power to send and access info with a network engineer who does not need to physically be in the area.

Netool is designed to be simple to use and understand. It enables anyone to find network port information they would not have had before such as DHCP, switch port, switch host name, current VLAN, tagged VLANs and more. Netool also runs ping and other tests on the same port making trouble shooting easier.

Because Netool is software based, Netool's features list will keep growing,  giving you an endless number of options to troubleshoot and discover network based systems.

 

 

 

 


 

What Netool can discover

 
  • DHCP
  • LLDP/CDP information
  • Switch port / switch stack / switch management ip
  • Untagged VLAN ID
  • Tagged VLAN IDs
  • Duplicate IP address
  • Gateway ping test
  • Internet ping test
  • Custom ping test
  • Spanning-tree
  • Quality of service
  • We are always adding more functions and tests to Netool.OS
     
    Netool works with
    • Any switch, router, bridge or any other network device that has an Ethernet port
    • Switch info (including switch host-name, management IP, switch port) only works with devices that support protocols LLDP or CDP 
    • Tagged VLAN detection works with any switch that supports VLAN tagging 
     
    Netool shares with others
    • SMS/IMessage
    • Email
    • Evernote
    • Slack
    • Save to notes
    • Netool cloud
    • and many more
     
    Support client devices
    Smartphone or Tablet

     

    Desktop (Coming Soon)

    Cloud
     

    After launch we will be including one year of Netool.cloud In-app remote sharing  to all contributors. If our campaign hits a goal of $25,000 we will start development on our the rest of Netool.cloud's features.

     
    What can Netool.cloud do?

    Netool does not require the cloud to perform any task stated above, but here is some features that Netool.cloud will allow you to do.

     
    Remote control

    Netool lets you connect multiple devices to view test results and run tests.
    You can even send a link to share remote control via the local network or the cloud.


    Mapping 
    With our cloud system you will be able to automatically save your Netool discoveries to the cloud. You will then be able to label the discoveries, group them, share them and plot them on an upload floor plan.

    Plugins
    We will also work on building plugins for popular systems like Slack.


    What else can Netool do?
    Remote serial console to a switch or router from your phone or from the cloud.  (with included USB cable or optional serial console cable) (will launch after beta)

    A bridge/router from your smart device to the rj45 port that Netool is plugged into. (will launch after beta)

     

    Close up of Netool

     

     

     

     

    Technical Specs
    • 3400maH battery - all day run time
    • AP mode and Client WiFi mode - 802.11n
    • Ethernet to WiFi bridge
    • USB port for accessories
    • Micro USB port for charging
    • Packet detection:
      • CDP and LLDP
      • 802.1q or tagged VLAN
      • DHCP
      • LACP or port channel
      • Spanning Tree

    Netool WIFI in AP mode
    Connect multiple smart devices to a single Netool with WIFI mode AP.

     

    Netool WIFI in client mode

    Connect to Netool through your WIFI or the cloud.

     

     

    Netool.OS
    Netool runs a highly customized version of linux that we call Netool.OS. We built Netool.OS to be powerful, low energy consuming and upgradable over the air.

    Netool.OS checks for software updates every time Netool is plugged into a port that has an internet connection. When Netool.OS discovers that there is a update available, Netool App will notify you with a small discreet icon on the top right of the screen indicating that there is an update. You can also disable automatic updates via the settings menu.


     

    The App

     

    What is in the box?
    • 1 - Netool network analyzer
    • 1 - USB power cable
    • 1 - NEMA-1 AC power adapter
    • 1 - one foot Ethernet patch cable

     

     

     

    Where are we at in development?

     

    • Product hardware design - COMPLETE
    • Manufacturing sample testing - COMPLETE
    • Tooling - COMPLETE
    • IOS App - FINAL STAGES
    • Android App - in development
    • Windows software - in development
    • Mac software - in development
     
    Why we need your support
    We have been working on Netool for over a year and we are ready to go to production. We have beta units in house and the final software programming is being completed. We need your help to get Netool to the beta testers then to mass production.
     
    We promise to get you a Netool in a timely fashion and we are confident we can meet the estimated delivery dates for each perk. 
     
    Thanks for joining the team and for your support!

     

    UPDATE

    We got in the first batch of beta units!

     


     

    In the media

    it.toolbox.com - blog post

    Geek-Gadgets.com

    Japan.cnet.com

    Networkcanuck.com

story:
ABOUT THIS PROJECT

Regular cleaning brooms suffer from some combination of four unforgivable qualities....

#1 - They are good at falling over when leaning your broom.

#2 - They are good at making wall scuffs & crashing to the floor.

#3 - They are a safety hazard - trips, slips and falls.

#4 - Bending over to fetch a fallen broom, not always easy, specially for the elderly.

   

 

Introducing SWEEP & STAND: The first cleaning broom to squash all four unforgivable qualities with absolute authority. Here's what it does...it STANDS!  The 1st Self-Standing Broom, with simple to use design.

SHARE US!

 

 

 

 

            PRESS KIT  - DOWNLOAD HERE

 

  HOW DOES IT WORK?

 

 Single-Hand-Operation

1.  Simply PUSH UP on on the handle and spring loaded kickstands deploy at bottom.

    

 

2.  PUSH DOWN on handle to close the kickstand legs.

 

 

        Patented Design

 

 

 

 

 

 

        Sweep & Stand In-Action

 

 

 

 

 

 

        Backstory & Timeline

Sweep & Stand came to life one day after a conversation with my Niece the Nurse telling me a story of her day at the hospital and how simple trivial things like sweeping the floor left her elderly patient with a broken hip after tripping over a misplaced broom. 

After hearing this story, an idea sparked in my head unexpectedly and by using a simple winged corkscrew, curtain rod and old broom, I was able to make a working prototype in a few days.  It was a crude prototype but Macgyver may have approved. 

A Long Story Short...

Sweep & Stand idea was conjured in Feb 2014 and after spending an entire year with 3D Printers, I was able to submit my patent and worked with an injection molder expert to bring this to life, now I just need funding for the molds to mass produce.

 

        Meet the Inventor

My background, my name is R K Sirpal from Toronto, Canada.   I studied Computer Mathematics & Industrial Design in Ottawa, Canada at Carleton University.  I bootstrapped my company HumanHaus Inc in 2016 and continue to dream up ideas I love and would like to share with others.

I would love to bring this product to life for the masses & I'm thrilled you stopped by to check us out!!!

 

 

        Risks & Challenges

At HumanHaus, we gladly accept the challenge of making a traditional consumer product and making it better. Just because a product has been around for ages doesn’t mean it can’t be improved. We took something as simple as a broom and found a way to make it better. Sweep & Stand fits into your day-to-day life with more functionality than a traditional broom.

We’ve spent many months nailing down details such as manufacturing and shipping logistics, so if there is a bump in the road along the way, we’ll still be well equipped to move through the challenge and still get you your Sweep&Stand on time!

 

PRESS KIT

            DOWNLOAD MEDIA KIT - HERE

story:
Boring lamps, meet your match. Orilamp is the only Bluetooth-enabled modern lamp that has the ability to bend, fold and shape with your life. Pack it in your overnight bag, keep it at your desk or on your nightside table to gently wake you up by gradually making your room brighter and brighter before your alarm goes off. Orilamp is your best lighting companion.


IN THE MEDIA 




Fold it, stretch it, bring it wherever you go. Orilamp can be used in many ways.

  • Table Lamp

  • Accent Lamp

  • Alarm Lamp

  • Patio Lamp

  • Emergency Lamp



Compact and lightweight, we designed Orilamp to travel with you. Only weighing .75 lbs., Orilamp easily fits in a backpack, purse, overnight bag or discreetly on your desk.        


Our easy-to-use, free Orilamp application works with iOS and Android phones to bring you full control over your lighting. Here you’ll have the opportunity to dim or brighten your Orilamp, set an alarm to have Orilamp gently wake you up with gradual light and much more.


Never miss a sunrise again- sorta. Our Orilamp app can be programmed to gently wake you up, mimicking the gradual light of a sunrise. If you’re alarm is set to go off at 7:00am, Orilamp will begin getting brighter and brighter right before the alarm.

We give you the ability to wake up naturally, gently and get a fresh start to your day, every day.




Use our Orilamp application to easily adjust Orilamp’s brightness at your fingertips and get the right light setting for any occasion.


 

Use our application to monitor lamp battery life in real time. Turn on/off lights automatically using the timer functionality to save energy when you don’t use it.

 

Simple to Use - The light automatically turns on/off as you open or closes the cover. Triangle shaped magnets are built inside each corner of the wood cover, making Orilamp to self-close effortlessly and yet so easy to open as well.

Additionally, the light can also be turned on/off using the Orilamp app on your smartphone, eliminating the hassle of walking across the room to find a light switch.




Orilamp can be easily charged using a Micro-USB cable when it is plugged into a computer or a charging station. When fully charged, Orilamp lasts for an incredible 7 hours with constant use.



Top Quality Material – Orilamp is made with a combination of environmentally friendly materials. The cover is made of natural wood (FSC Certified), and the light is made with heat-resistant NOMEX paper (DUPONT) and LED lights.

Two Elegant Finishes - German Blonde Birch or American Black Walnut.

When Orilamp is outside ...


When Orilamp is at home ...

 





FAQ

Is Orilamp App available for both iOS and Android Phones? Yes. 

Is Orilamp App free to download? Yes, Orilamp app is free to all Orilamp users.

What is Orilamp's weight?  340g .  

What is Orilamp's size? 107 x 107 x 45(mm)  

What is the light's source/brightness? LED light equivalent to 70 Watt bulb.

What is  the difference between the two wood finishes? The wood material is different. One is German Blonde Birch and the other one is American Black Walnut.

How long is the battery life? 7 hours with constant use. 

How long does it take to charge Orilamp? A full charge takes about 60 minutes to complete.  

Can I purchase multiple magnetic straps? Yes, please simply add $10 for each additional one you would like to get. 

Do you ship worldwide? Yes, we ship to anywhere in the world. 

How much is shipping and handling? Shipping and handling, which includes shipping the items to our offices, packing and fulfilling orders will cost: $15 for each Orilamp order

When are the perks expected to ship? We will fulfill perks in the order they are received. We are aiming to process all fulfillment by June 2016. We will keep our backers informed of our expected delivery time frames as we get more information during production.

Where do I pay for shipping? Shipping costs are added in the additional contribution field when you back the campaign as well as in the perks (Shipping Add-On) if you missed it. 

Disclaimer: Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.
story_txt:
Boring lamps, meet your match. Orilamp is the only Bluetooth-enabled modern lamp that has the ability to bend, fold and shape with your life. Pack it in your overnight bag, keep it at your desk or on your nightside table to gently wake you up by gradually making your room brighter and brighter before your alarm goes off. Orilamp is your best lighting companion.IN THE MEDIA Fold it, stretch it, bring it wherever you go. Orilamp can be used in many ways. Table LampAccent LampAlarm LampPatio LampEmergency Lamp



Compact and lightweight, we designed Orilamp to travel with you. Only weighing .75 lbs., Orilamp easily fits in a backpack, purse, overnight bag or discreetly on your desk.        
Our easy-to-use, free Orilamp application works with iOS and Android phones to bring you full control over your lighting. Here you’ll have the opportunity to dim or brighten your Orilamp, set an alarm to have Orilamp gently wake you up with gradual light and much more.Never miss a sunrise again- sorta. Our Orilamp app can be programmed to gently wake you up, mimicking the gradual light of a sunrise. If you’re alarm is set to go off at 7:00am, Orilamp will begin getting brighter and brighter right before the alarm.We give you the ability to wake up naturally, gently and get a fresh start to your day, every day.
Use our Orilamp application to easily adjust Orilamp’s brightness at your fingertips and get the right light setting for any occasion.


 

Use our application to monitor lamp battery life in real time. Turn on/off lights automatically using the timer functionality to save energy when you don’t use it.
 

Simple to Use - The light automatically turns on/off as you open or closes the cover. Triangle shaped magnets are built inside each corner of the wood cover, making Orilamp to self-close effortlessly and yet so easy to open as well.
Additionally, the light can also be turned on/off using the Orilamp app on your smartphone, eliminating the hassle of walking across the room to find a light switch.





Orilamp can be easily charged using a Micro-USB cable when it is plugged into a computer or a charging station. When fully charged, Orilamp lasts for an incredible 7 hours with constant use.






 






Top Quality Material – Orilamp is made with a combination of environmentally friendly materials. The cover is made of natural wood (FSC Certified), and the light is made with heat-resistant NOMEX paper (DUPONT) and LED lights.

Two Elegant Finishes - German Blonde Birch or American Black Walnut.


When Orilamp is outside ...





When Orilamp is at home ...







 













FAQ


Is Orilamp App available for both iOS and Android Phones? Yes. 
Is Orilamp App free to download? Yes, Orilamp app is free to all Orilamp users.
What is Orilamp's weight?  340g .  
What is Orilamp's size? 107 x 107 x 45(mm)  
What is the light's source/brightness? LED light equivalent to 70 Watt bulb.
What is  the difference between the two wood finishes? The wood material is different. One is German Blonde Birch and the other one is American Black Walnut.
How long is the battery life? 7 hours with constant use. 
How long does it take to charge Orilamp? A full charge takes about 60 minutes to complete.  

Can I purchase multiple magnetic straps? Yes, please simply add $10 for each additional one you would like to get. 
Do you ship worldwide? Yes, we ship to anywhere in the world. 
How much is shipping and handling? Shipping and handling, which includes shipping the items to our offices, packing and fulfilling orders will cost: $15 for each Orilamp order
When are the perks expected to ship? We will fulfill perks in the order they are received. We are aiming to process all fulfillment by June 2016. We will keep our backers informed of our expected delivery time frames as we get more information during production.


Where do I pay for shipping? Shipping costs are added in the additional contribution field when you back the campaign as well as in the perks (Shipping Add-On) if you missed it. 
Disclaimer: Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.

story:
THE GOAL: raise capital to expand product range, invest in ecommerce & expand services

INVESTMENT: $65,000 

  • $30,000: luxury branded products for ecommerce sales
  • $20,000: establish ecommerce platform & multi-channel sales
  • $15,000: large-scales events production 

​THE PURPOSE

  1. Invest in luxury branded products and inventory to establish ecommerce sales presence to meet consumer demand - creating a profitable mass-produced HRH product range
  2. Expand services to include events as they're cash-generating, high profit opportunities -   HRH events have proved to be hugely popular with sell-out events and wait-lists
  3. Create B2B strategic alliances with exclusive brands, retail buyers, stores (dream list inc. Wedgwood, India Jane, Smythson) and establish cross-promotion, multi-platform, in-store and ecommerce high-margin sales opportunities

THE PERKS OF YOUR INVESTMENT

  • Gift baskets - your one-stop shop to meet all your gifting needs inc. birthdays, thank yous, house gifts, hostess gifts, Christmas/Happy Holidays  - massively reduced
  • Bulk buy Gift Certificates for bridal/baby showers, your employees, a personal treat - there are huge savings!
  • Bulk buy and pre-order luxury branded products - as exclusive as it gets

    THE IMPACT OF YOUR CONTRIBUTIONS

    • Your contribution matters and makes a bottom-line impact - share our journey of growth
    • Be an advocate - support a small business owner that wants to stay on the High Street, promote shopping locally and increase in-store square footage on-line
    • Get behind a campaign of a small retail business, despite numerous articles highlighting the death of retail on the High Street - send a strong message to say it’s alive and well, with the support of the community and on-line community coming together to help
    • Re-purpose historical pieces for modern day pieces (e.g. use decanters as water jugs)
    • Purchase collectible pieces at accessible price points and future heirlooms and save them from being de-valued or disposed of

    Why I'm passionate about HRH

    • After suffering a stroke at 40 due to a high stress corporate job which left me unable to speak for months, I came to Surfside to fully recover and gently encouraged my brain by learning the science of how to bake – it slowly brought me back to life and healed me
    • I used shopping as a release valve, dedicating years to scouring the country to source bespoke pieces that had been in families for generations, listening to their stories and fond memories, in addition to finding elusive pieces in numerous auction rooms
    • I’ve personally curated largely one of a kind pieces and can share the stories of each piece, giving a unique and authentic insight into British history, traditions and the monarchy
    • I love bringing an aesthetic beauty and sense of harmony into people’s homes, along with a history and heritage into home décor

        OUR MISSION IS TO HELP YOU FIND THE PIECES YOU LOVE FOR YOUR HOME

        HRH has curated a Collection of unique, luxury home décor pieces that you’ll covet most in your home.  Our pieces are iconic and compelling – they’ll speak to you.  Shop the perfect addition for the modern and contemporary home.

        We’d love to show you around - take a virtual tour of our store at http://www.herroyalhousehold.com/about-us/

        HRH PRODUCT RANGE

        • HRH’s inspired product range of home décor makes for statement pieces in your home, charming and unique gift and enticing homewares collectibles
        • HRH has a wealth of original and creative ideas to tempt and fascinate, it’s all about giving people bespoke home décor choices that you can’t find anywhere else featuring glassware, porcelainware, pillows/cushions and statement display pieces

        PRESS COVERAGE

        • June 2018: Where Magazine, Surfside Round-up

          https://www.facebook.com/michelle.payer.1/posts/10155264391512102

        • May 18, 18: CBS News, Royal Wedding Feature

          http://miami.cbslocal.com/video/category/spoken-word-wfortv/3866810-cbs4-news-bianca-peters-on-how-to-enjoy-the-royal-wedding-as-if-you-were-there/

          http://miami.cbslocal.com/2018/05/18/royal-wedding-watch-party-surfside/

        • May 18, 18: Channel 7 News, Royal Wedding Feature

          https://wsvn.com/news/local/south-floridians-celebrate-royal-wedding-with-watch-parties-brunches/

        • May 17, 18: NBC News, Royal Wedding Feature

          https://www.nbcmiami.com/on-air/as-seen-on/Royal-Wedding-Watch-Party-in-South-Florida_Miami-482975971.html

        • May 18, 18: Telemundo TV, Royal Wedding Feature

          https://www.telemundo51.com/entretenimiento/destacados/Los-amantes-en-Miami-de-la-realeza-celebran-boda-real_TLMD---Miami-483084121.html

        • May 17, 18: Miami New Times Food & Drink, Royal Wedding Article

          http://www.miaminewtimes.com/restaurants/prince-harry-and-meghan-markle-are-getting-married-where-to-celebrate-in-miami-10359650

        • May 18: Aventura Magazine, HRH in-depth feature (4 page spread)

          http://aventuramagazine.com/a-royal-affair-may-2018/

        • May 1, 18: Time Out Miami, Most Loved Awards – Won Most Loved Shop in Miami

          https://www.timeout.com/miami/things-to-do/love-miami-awards-winners-2018

        • April 10,18: Travel Channel, HRH feature

          https://www.travelchannel.com/interests/beaches/articles/surfside-is-a-chill-beach-town-in-hot-hot-hot-miami

        • April 3, 18: Indulge Miami, HRH Article (digital)

          http://www.miamiindulge.com/miami-interior-design/for-the-royal-wedding-or-any-day-her-royal-household-in-surfside-adds-a-uk-touch-to-home-decor-3409/

        • Dec 29, 17: Visit Surfside Blog – Welcome to Surfside

          https://www.visitsurfsidefl.com/blog/her-royal-household-keeps-things-proper/

        CAMPAIGN TEAM

        • Richard Jay-Alexander, Broadway Producer

        ​

        • Michelle Payer, Travel Journalist

        ​

        • Angela Heylin LVO, OBE:  "Lady B has created a distinctively different and very stylish brand in HRH - Her Royal Household.   This brand has a great future, both in-store and online.   I'm crowdfunding Lady B, whom I know is a wonderfully talented woman, to support her in growing the HRH business in Miami and beyond.   Join me!  Bera has real proven retail flair and creativity combined with a highly practical and realistic vision.   I know of Bera's immense energy, application and appetite for a challenge, from successful work we have done together in the past.   She deserves to succeed with HRH and will do so,  if enough of us give her the boost of some financial support right now."

        Other ways you can help

        • Please help me get the word out, share and make some noise about the HRH campaign!

        Follow our story on social media

        • Instagram: @HRH_Her_Royal_Household
        • Facebook: @HerRoyalHousehold
        • Twitter: @HerRoyalHouse
        • Google Business Page: Her Royal Household
        • www.HerRoyalHousehold.com

story:
What is it? Why build one? Why build this one?

Great questions, thanks for asking!

Wheelie Bins. You see them every day. You hate them and, looking at them now, they sure are pretty ugly. What to do?

The BinBox: We can wrap our pretty little PVC frame around ugly  wheelie bins so you only have to see them one day per week: on collection day.

 

So soon you can go from this view:

To the BinBox view:

Or to the BinBox view- with style!

 

The BinBox Features

 

High Gloss PVC Finish (White or Ivory)

Tongue & Groove Timber Effect

Optional Poster 

Product Life: 20 years

No Maintenance / No Paint

Weather-proof / Water-proof

Designed, developed, and made in Ireland

 

 

 

The BinBox Family

 

BinBox is the brainchild of a team from one family, but spread around the world! The top dog (David) came up with the BinBox concept, while Ellen, based in Lisbon, looks after Sales & Marketing. Ruth (back in Dublin) is the Graphic Design genius and Simon does the Social Media from Japan...so we cover ALL times zones and operate 24 hour cycles...We never stop!

 

 

Being the wisest ('cause he's the oldest!) David does all the product design, fabrication, engineering, purchasing etc., etc.. He has 25 years of experience in developing products for the construction industry, so he knows what is necessary to get a product like the BinBox to market. The other greenhorns are all college grads with lots of energy and enthusiasm, so they are going to do all the techie stuff while Mary is behind the scenes doing all the real work! 

Almost two years have passed from first concept to final design. A bit slow you might say, but product development is tiresome, difficult work. People often say "the simple things are the best" without ever understanding just how much time and effort it takes to create that simple product.

Yet there must be only one goal when creating the ideal product - a happy customer.

All else is subordinate and will follow on from a happy customer (things like profit, success, riches beyond our wildest dreams...)

 

Wheelie Bin Sizes

 

There are a huge range of Wheelie Bins on the market worldwide and initially we are supplying BinBox Kits to suit the most popular Wheelie Bins: up to 240 litre/52 gallon capacity (see typical dimensions below). 

If you have a mix of bin sizes in your garden, please email david@thebinbox.com or chat to us on our website and we will do our best to advise you. We will be supplying two different sizes of BinBox Kits but no need to worry about that when placing your order because we will contact you before delivery to make sure you are getting the most suitable BinBox Kit.

 

 

BinBox Dimensions

The BinBox is designed to be:

 

 

 Easy to ship (flat-pack)

 

 

Easy to assemble

 

Other Features

 

Light but tough 

Weather-proof / Water-proof (essential if living in Ireland and the U.K.)

 UV proof (aka sunshine for those living in Ireland)

20-year life (yes, we have certs to prove it!)

No maintenance and no painting (garden hose will do fine)

 

Why only a half panel in the back? Because you are going to be bashing a bin into the bottom of your BinBox for years to come! The top is missing so you can't do the same with the handle/lid. 

*Please Note: All models of the BinBox Kits which are displayed on the site are production prototypes and not the final version which will arrive on your doorstep in the New Year. Please forgive any imperfections you might observe   

 

 

Customising The BinBox with a Poster:

 You can see a small selection of posters below, but check out our website for more options. 

The poster is optional and you can purchase at any time. Becoming a backer will give you access to the Secret Perk Section (message us here once you've ordered your BinBox, and we'll send you the link!) and there you will see the posters priced as follows:

1. Single Bin Kit........€25.00

2. Double Bin Kit......€30.00

3. Triple Bin Kit........€40.00

Posters are printed on outdoor banner material, so they are also weatherproof.

If included with delivery of your BinBox- no postage charge for poster but....if you order from our website after the campaign ends, there will sadly have to be a postage charge.

 

 

 

 

Funding our Project

 

 

Meeting the demand of the global market takes ducats, moolah, dosh and sometimes just plain cash. Over the past year, we have built dozens of BinBox samples in order to test materials, manufacturing, durability, assembly, functionality and after all that - spent months just making the BinBox look good.

 

What We Need

The BinBox will be manufactured from a Dublin location so that we can ensure assembly and quality standards for our customers, so our IndieGogo campaign will provide funds for the following resources:

- Industrial Unit for manufacture, packaging and shipping of BinBox Kits in-house

- The manufacture of extruded PVC tooling for the final version of the BinBox

- Construction of assembly line facilities

- Bulk purchasing of stock so we can keep prices competitive for our customers

 

 

We have big dreams. We hope to partner with wheelie bin distributors, big box / DIY stores,  garden centres and landscape gardeners around the world in the coming year, so that BinBox is available at a local level in order to cut shipping costs for the customer.

 

The Impact

 

 

 

We regularly speak to landscape gardeners in particular, who are asked by customers to hide wheelie bins because they ruin the look of the garden. The market is currently served either by flimsy wooden structures or expensive kits which need yearly maintenance when exposed to the elements. The BinBox allows them to provide an attractive, simple, and cost-effective way to tuck wheelie bins out of sight

Urban councils now have a way of making streets cleaner and neater for citizens and tourists, thus avoiding sights like this...

                          

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

 

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Share the BinBox with your house-proud friends and family, landscape gardeners, garden centres and if you work in a Big Box/ DIY store- tell the BOSS about us!
  • Remember, buying through IndieGogo means access to massive discounts, so get 'em while they're hot!
  • Follow us on Facebook and Instagram :)

Share the BinBox with your house-proud friends and family, landscape gardeners, garden centres and if you work in a Big Box/ DIY store- tell the BOSS about us!

Remember, buying through IndieGogo means access to massive discounts, so get 'em while they're hot!
Follow us on Facebook and Instagram :)

story:
Boxscoop history and forward vision...

2017 through 2018 we were consumed with the idea of designing a litter box that actually helps cats and their humans.  In the start of 2018 we put everything we had into producing Boxscoop 1. The idea was to spend our capital making a great product instead of marketing an idea. Naively, we figured if you make a great product people will find it.

It doesn't work like that. In May 2018, with our first shipment of Boxscoops coming in, we launched a flexible goal on Indiegogo to find an audience. We were unknown, Boxscoop was still on the water being shipped, and we still managed to connect with 52 amazing backers. After the campaign ended we continued to sell on our website and the numbers grew exponentially. At the beginning it was 1 per week, then 1 per day, then 10 per day, and the final weekend we sold out in September we sold 300+ in 3 days. September 17, 2018 we were completely out of stock.

Where we are going now...

It was expensive producing the molds and producing and shipping the Boxscoops themselves. We were left with a ton of positive and amazing feedback but without profit to continue. To scale production and make changes that will take Boxscoop to a whole new level (never stop innovating) we need 10x more sophisticated molds. Near the end of 2018 we'll launch Boxscoop 2.0 on Kickstarter and as a community we'll take Boxscoop to an infinitely better level. www.theboxscoop.com

 

 

The first Boxscoop's ever for sale:

 

 

 

(updated June 29)

We just started shipping and already we are receiving very positive feedback! Check out our comments section as we're sure (hopefully) that more backers will want to give an update as they receive Boxscoop :) Below is a snapshot of some feedback:

 

 

One of our contributors sent us this and we had to post it :)

 

 

 

 

Four simulated urine clumps (one near the edge, one on the edge) and 18 simulated solid waste pieces. Clean from top to bottom and leveled in seconds.

 

 

 

 

 

but sometimes simple is actually more difficult to achieve. The scoop is solid stainless and intricately made. Each wire is different and individually precision bent, then placed into a mold, hand welded, and then each weld is ground smooth... It's a long process to manufacture but it's this design that allows us to slice through the litter while still trapping smaller chunks.

The container is a perfectly spherical bowl with cylindrical outside walls that have very low draft for a modern appearance. Boxscoop is expensive to manufacture and expensive to ship. Realistically our price either has to go up, or we have to stop producing it-- either way this is your chance to get a litter system that actually performs. Hopefully you join us and help us keep this dream alive so we can expand and together bring a better solution to the market.

 

 

(June 25, 2018)

Orders will ship in 1-3 business days. We invested everything to design and produce this first shipment. Order yours today and when you receive and love it, help us spread the word. We are a small company and once our stock sells out we won't have more until roughly 2019.

story:
"Ridiculously soft sheets." – Forbes®

 

Shipping immediately at SheetsGiggles.com!

 

Who or What is Sheets & Giggles™?

The world's first entirely pun-based enterprise, S&G is a new brand of sustainable bedding that focuses on driving as much value to our community as possible. That includes insanely soft, sustainable bedding made from eucalyptus trees; prices that poke a finger into big box retail's eye; treating our customers like actual human beings (we buy stuff, too); regular donations of bedding to homeless shelters; and occasionally free pizza for like, no reason.

During May 1 - June 15, S&G ran a 30-day preorder on Indiegogo to prove that there's a strong market demand for sustainable bedding (and to prove that the free market loves puns). We were over 1,000% funded, got strong reviews of our sheets by major outlets like Forbes and Real Simple, and became the largest crowdfunded Indiegogo ever for bedding!

We're now a real, live, wildly successful (ish) company, so order today at SheetsGiggles.com!

Below, you'll find remnants of our Indiegogo campaign from May 2018, which we keep here as a sort of living museum to how much fun we had when we launched.

 

S&G: As Seen On TV

 

Unmatched Comfort

Did you know that the best sheets in the world are made from eucalyptus trees?

 

Sheets & Giggles’ eucalyptus sheets are manufactured via a lyocell process (boring, but extremely eco-friendly). They have higher softness and smoothness ratings than cotton, breathe better, are less prone to fade even after repeated washing, and are sustainably grown and knit.

S&G’s sheets also manage and evaporate moisture (i.e., sweat) better than cotton, which promotes an anti-microbial environment that will help keep sheets fresh and clean. They're a hot sleeper's dream.

Even better news – we specifically designed our fitted sheets to have extra deep corners to easily and securely fit mattresses up to 20" thick, so you'll sink right into your bed.

This is the good stuff.

 

Stop Buying Sheets at Retail

Before starting S&G, our team worked with every major retailer out there. Based on our experiences (and all the hair we pulled out), we decided to... not do that again. Major plus for you – this keeps our prices 20-40% lower than what you’d pay in a store for this high quality, eco-friendly fabric.

Maybe you can put your savings into Bitcoin* and thank us in 10 years. Or hate us in 10 minutes.

*As a disclaimer, don't take investment advice from a bedding company.

 

Save The World, Not Just Your Wallet

S&G's sheets are sustainably made from renewable eucalyptus trees.

The More You Know ⭐

We use up to 95% less water than some cotton sheets, up to 30% less energy, and no insecticides or pesticides on our trees (as a crop, cotton uses an estimated 16% of the world's insecticides).

Plus, fun fact: for each sale on our Indiegogo, S&G will plant a tree somewhere in the U.S. that needs reforestation via our One-for-One partnership with One Tree Planted.

Additionally, 10M tons of textiles get thrown in U.S. landfills every year, sheets included. Once thrown away, our sheets actually biodegrade about 40% faster than a cotton set, though we hope you'll donate your old sets via our "Give 2 Sheets" program vs throwing them away (more details on that later).

 

Handy infographic to find out if S&G is right for you:

 

Cool New Sheet

As we hit the below stretch goals and take on more and more resources via preorders, we'll be able to unlock some insanely soft eucalyptus duvet covers and fluffy-ass eucalyptus comforters.

Specifically, we've been told that the comforter is like sleeping with Jason Momoa. (We were told that; we're not saying that.)

Edit: duvet covers and comforters are now both unlocked!

^Added May 4, 2018 (see our Update #2 for deets).

 

Color Options

Sheet sets & pillowcases are available in our own unique shades of White, Navy, Gray, Purple, and Bright Blue (as seen below).

Each set in every perk can be customized according to size or color at no extra cost.

 

Our Production Process

Based in India, our manufacturing partner is second to none when it comes to sustainable, socially responsible fabrics production. 

S&G's fabric is made out high quality eucalyptus wood pulp, a sustainable and renewable natural resource. We don't harvest wood from ancient or endangered forests; rather, our eucalyptus trees are grown on sustainably managed plantations around the world. Our manufacturer puts a major focus on on forest conservation and bio-diversity at their plantations.

The lyocell process used to turn eucalyptus bark into our insanely smooth sheets is considered to be one of the most eco-friendly means of fabric production in the world.

Unlike cotton, which uses an estimated 16 - 25% of the world's insecticides, no insecticides or pesticides are used in the growth of our crops. And unlike the chemically intensive process to make viscose from bamboo, lyocell production uses relatively few chemicals and has extremely little waste product.

We also use a closed loop manufacturing process (so the byproducts are reused in the process itself), which results in a near zero environmental impact.

 

Timeline

Take a screenshot of this and email it to easteregg@sheetsgiggles.com with your order number, and we'll upgrade your order with a free gift. (Don't tell anyone.) Easter Egg 2 of 4.

 

Risks & Challenges

S&G has three main hurdles ahead to become a profitable, long-term sustainable business:

  1. A strong preorder that allows us to ship and go to market on our own terms, focusing only on our customers' wants and needs, without taking on excess debt or venture financing. 
  2. Successful logistics in June and July so we can ship to preorder customers by August. To make sure manufacturing and shipping is on pace, we'll be visiting our factories in India in June (which sounds... hot).
  3. Turning enough profit to finance a reorder for Q1 2019 so we don't run out of inventory after any initial success.

These are company risks for us that we're working diligently on, but they aren't risks for you. Unlike Internet-connected products that need an app to function (connected toilets are the future), there's no downside for you if we go under: your sheets will still be as soft as ever. You just won't be able to win free pizza anymore if we don't exist as a business (which would be a real shame, tbh).

We write about our startup journey intermittently on our blog, and we'll keep you posted every step of the way.

 

Love Our Sheets Or Get Your Money Back

We’re so confident you’ll love your sheets, we're offering a 100% money-back guarantee for backers of our Indiegogo campaign.

No arbitrary time limit, no questions asked. We'll even pay for return shipping.

 

Free Stuff, Just Because

We hate pointless, wasteful plastic packaging. Our sheets come in a durable, attractively designed eucalyptus fabric knapsack that fits a yoga mat or a laptop. Take it with you when you occasionally leave your bedroom for the great outdoors (or more likely, for your job).

Also, every other week, we have random contests on Facebook and Instagram where we give our followers free pizza, Netflix, booze, coffee, and S&G VIP packages. We're doing this because we decided early on that we would treat our community the way we want other companies to treat us. Hope you like boxed wine.

Just a few of our recent #FreePizzaFriday winners

 

Talk Sheet

Please spread the word about S&G on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and anywhere else you'd like! Click to tweet!

All aboard the hype train

 

About Sheets & Giggles, LLC

 

How to Reach Us

 

FAQ Us, Right?

 

Sweet Dreams,

The S&G Team

SheetsGiggles.com | @SheetsGiggles | pillowtalk@sheetsgiggles.com

story:
BeerLamp is a real-time planning tool enabling friends to gather over a shared drink, discovering great bars and beers along the way. We intend for people to use our app to meet up with their friends – then put their phone away.

Our founder, a Navy pilot, recognized the challenge of connecting with friends scattered around the country and quickly realized that everyone - not just military members - looking to connect with friends or colleagues over a drink faces the problem of deciding who to invite, how to contact them, and coordinating a time and location to meet. 

Our team is passionate about great beer and having a great time with friends, and created BeerLamp to allow our users to get together with friends without the time and hassle of texting, emailing, or posting to social media. BeerLamp connects users in 2 ways:

1. Simply light your lamp to signal to your friends that you’re ready to imbibe. Anyone in a similar mindset can quickly join in and the plan is set.

2. Invite a select few or a group of friends to a location of your choosing. Each friend can accept or pass, no harm done. Those who are in can quickly coordinate and the night begins.

You can download the app today on the Apple App Store.  

Your contribution will help us continue adding new features to expand our app, reach and connect even more friends, explore more bars and brews, and create even more memorable nights!

story:
Smart Kitty - Automatic self cleaning litter box

 

 

Dear Supporters,

our goal was to create the best automatic self-cleaning litter box and make your life as a Cat Owner much easier by eliminating the smelly funk and daily hassle of litter box scooping.

 

This stinking problem pushed us to conceptual and hard work 

on solution of it. 

We created a reliable, comfortable and affordable Automatic self-cleaning litter box – our Smart Kitty.

 

Smart Kitty is adapted for all cats sizes and needs. To make it safe we have implemented sensors and our patented solutions.

Smart Kitty handle with waste of all sizes and scoops them to separated container, which stays closed while not used. It really works! It's efficient and requires only minimal attention.

Be sure that smell and your cat’s toilet things will not concern you anymore. 

Your cat will appreciate it very much. We are sure that you will LOVE IT too!

 

 

 

 

 
Smart Kitty - The Best Invention Ever 

Absolute MUST HAVE for Cat Lovers.

 

 

 

 

We have adapted Smart Kitty to all cats' sizes and needs. To make it safe we have implemented sensors and our patented solutions. Smart Kitty handle with waste of all sizes and scoops them to separated container, which stays closed while not used. 


This way you can be sure that smell and your cat’s toilet things will not concern you anymore. 

We have kept to a minimum your participation to operate the unit.

 

 

Smart Kitty starts working and makes its job only after your cat leaves it.

 

Since now, you don’t have to worry about emptying your cat's litter box when you leave town for few days nor you are going to take a weekend trip. 

You can be confident that Your cat will benefit from hygienically clean litter box.

 

The device is constructed of 3 independent modules, each of which can easily be removed.

Such a solution is convenient and very functional. It provides fast disassembly and makes easy cleaning. 

When you are back cleaning of Smart Kitty automatic litter box is now very simple. You just replace Replaceable Waste Bags.

 

 

It is so easy as changing a kitchen garbage bag every few days or weeks. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

A few minutes after use by cat litter box, automatic cleaning process starts. Raking system allows precise separation of impurities from the gravel.

After collecting litter container opens, and droppings are placed in a special closed container for excrements in the same time preventing the extraction of odors. This is done without losing the pure grit.
 

Inside the container there is interchangeable disposable molding, providing comfort and cleanliness of the device. 
 

The only action that will be done from cat owner, is to eject a filled container of excrement (depends of amounts of cats nor its sizes – every few days/week).

 

 

 

 

 

We followed two ideas: FUNCTIONALITY and DESIGN. 

From now litter-box can be a decoration for your home.

We wanted that Smart Kitty - automatic litter box will no longer be associated only with impurities and has not been pushed to the farthest corner of your apartment. 

From now Smart Kitty is an element of interior design thanks to its design and quality.
 

Here are available options of SMART KITTY for INDIEGOGO supporters:

 

 

 

 

With Smart Kitty you can easily personalize you favorite set:


- Lightweight Tent: 

 

 

 

avaiable colours:

 

 

 

 

- ILLUSTRATED tents:

"Never Enough of Kitties"

"Newspaper Tent"

 
"Kuril Style Tent"

 

We prepared a wide range of colors of fabrics to choose from.

Lite tent is made of the soft material and based on a very lightweight carbon fiber construction.

 

Advantages: easy to remove, able to clean the tent in a washing machine. 

 

 

- The colors of control panel

- The colors of rakes and sensor

For your comfort you will find enclosed 2 pcs. of rakes within Smart Kitty perk. One with 16 and second one with 18 prongs to be used with different kind of grit. 

You don’t need to clean each time after your cat uses Smart Kitty – it's automated.

 

You don’t need to check status, etc. on control panel. Every important information is real-time processed and send to your smartphone.

 

 

Moreover you are able to make your personal configuration and settings and specify a number of parameters, e.g.: 

 

- Delay - at what time of cat visit litter box activate the cleaning process 


- Set the number of repetitions for Clean function

 
- How many times Smart Kitty must repeat the process of cleaning

 
- The user will also be informed of the overflow box. This is important not only for convenience but also for the health of the cat


- Perform time frame of cleaning process e.g.  [10:00 to 17:00]. 
 

-Set exit rack to the base position
 

 

- Hanging rakes in place to enable their removal

 

- Setting notification of the need to buy molds in Shop with a  smartphone.

 

 

Time is precious.  Let’s gain some more of it for ourselves (and for more pleasant activities).


Smart Kitty will let you know itself when the time comes to replace scoop bag simply by sending information to your Smartphone.  
Application will be available for Android, iOS and Microsotf platform users for free.

 

 

 

 

That allows its effective management no matter where you are. 
Our goal was to create the most practical self-cleaning automatic litter box ever with hi-end design with the most comfortable and easy to use application. 

 

With Smart Kitty - Automatic self-cleaning litter box you only have to replace overfilled box (approx. every few days).

Smart Kitty can be provided with different color themes matching your own style. 

 

Take the chance of choosing the one you like and place Smart Kitty in your home or office whenever you wish to. 

 

Your cat will appreciate it very much. And we are sure that you will LOVE IT too!

 

 

 

 

Weight: 5 kg (10 lbs.) 

Power  supply and Voltage: 12V

OVERALL DIMENSIONS:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We have managed to design it and we are in just small step to produce it.

 

But… as the smelly funk is a rather an expensive business we need your support so that cats and their owners worldwide could enjoy advantages of our Smart Kitty - automatic self-cleaning litter box. The best home appliance ever.

 

How fast, easy and real solutions 

you have been waiting for!

 
Thank you, and please, support us!
