Smart Kitty handle with waste of all sizes and scoops them to separated container, which stays closed while not used. It really works! It's efficient and requires only minimal attention.
Be sure that smell and your cat’s toilet things will not concern you anymore. 
Your cat will appreciate it very much. We are sure that you will LOVE IT too!
 

            
 Smart Kitty - The Best Invention Ever 

Absolute MUST HAVE for Cat Lovers.
 
 


 






 


We have adapted Smart Kitty to all cats' sizes and needs. To make it safe we have implemented sensors and our patented solutions. Smart Kitty handle with waste of all sizes and scoops them to separated container, which stays closed while not used. 


This way you can be sure that smell and your cat’s toilet things will not concern you anymore. 


We have kept to a minimum your participation to operate the unit.

 
 
Smart Kitty starts working and makes its job only after your cat leaves it.
 
Since now, you don’t have to worry about emptying your cat's litter box when you leave town for few days nor you are going to take a weekend trip. 
You can be confident that Your cat will benefit from hygienically clean litter box.

 

The device is constructed of 3 independent modules, each of which can easily be removed.

Such a solution is convenient and very functional. It provides fast disassembly and makes easy cleaning. 

When you are back cleaning of Smart Kitty automatic litter box is now very simple. You just replace Replaceable Waste Bags.
 
 It is so easy as changing a kitchen garbage bag every few days or weeks. 

 
        


 

 
                       


 


 

 
 

       
A few minutes after use by cat litter box, automatic cleaning process starts. Raking system allows precise separation of impurities from the gravel.
After collecting litter container opens, and droppings are placed in a special closed container for excrements in the same time preventing the extraction of odors. This is done without losing the pure grit. 
Inside the container there is interchangeable disposable molding, providing comfort and cleanliness of the device.  
 
The only action that will be done from cat owner, is to eject a filled container of excrement (depends of amounts of cats nor its sizes – every few days/week).


 
 
 
         


We followed two ideas: FUNCTIONALITY and DESIGN. 
From now litter-box can be a decoration for your home.


We wanted that Smart Kitty - automatic litter box will no longer be associated only with impurities and has not been pushed to the farthest corner of your apartment. 
From now Smart Kitty is an element of interior design thanks to its design and quality.
 

Here are available options of SMART KITTY for INDIEGOGO supporters:
 





 

 



 
With Smart Kitty you can easily personalize you favorite set:


- Lightweight Tent: 
 

 


 
avaiable colours:
 
 

 
 
- ILLUSTRATED tents:
"Never Enough of Kitties"


"Newspaper Tent"

 "Kuril Style Tent"

 

We prepared a wide range of colors of fabrics to choose from.
Lite tent is made of the soft material and based on a very lightweight carbon fiber construction.
 
Advantages: easy to remove, able to clean the tent in a washing machine. 

 



 - The colors of control panel    - The colors of rakes and sensor  For your comfort you will find enclosed 2 pcs. of rakes within Smart Kitty perk. One with 16 and second one with 18 prongs to be used with different kind of grit.    




You don’t need to clean each time after your cat uses Smart Kitty – it's automated.
 
You don’t need to check status, etc. on control panel. Every important information is real-time processed and send to your smartphone.

 

 
Moreover you are able to make your personal configuration and settings and specify a number of parameters, e.g.: 

 
- Delay - at what time of cat visit litter box activate the cleaning process 

- Set the number of repetitions for Clean function
 - How many times Smart Kitty must repeat the process of cleaning
 - The user will also be informed of the overflow box. This is important not only for convenience but also for the health of the cat


- Perform time frame of cleaning process e.g.  [10:00 to 17:00].  
-Set exit rack to the base position 
 
- Hanging rakes in place to enable their removal - Setting notification of the need to buy molds in Shop with a  smartphone.
 


 
Time is precious.  Let’s gain some more of it for ourselves (and for more pleasant activities).

Smart Kitty will let you know itself when the time comes to replace scoop bag simply by sending information to your Smartphone.  Application will be available for Android, iOS and Microsotf platform users for free.
  
 
 
That allows its effective management no matter where you are. Our goal was to create the most practical self-cleaning automatic litter box ever with hi-end design with the most comfortable and easy to use application.  With Smart Kitty - Automatic self-cleaning litter box you only have to replace overfilled box (approx. every few days).
Smart Kitty can be provided with different color themes matching your own style. 
 
Take the chance of choosing the one you like and place Smart Kitty in your home or office whenever you wish to. 
 
Your cat will appreciate it very much. And we are sure that you will LOVE IT too!
 

 




 
 
Weight: 5 kg (10 lbs.) 
Power  supply and Voltage: 12V

OVERALL DIMENSIONS:
 






 



   

 

 

 
 



 
We have managed to design it and we are in just small step to produce it.
 But… as the smelly funk is a rather an expensive business we need your support so that cats and their owners worldwide could enjoy advantages of our Smart Kitty - automatic self-cleaning litter box. The best home appliance ever.
 


How fast, easy and real solutions 

you have been waiting for!

 
Thank you, and please, support us!

story:
What is Renderpockets?

Render Pockets is an elegant DO-IT-YOURSELF solution for the IKEA Helmer Renderfarm setup.   Designed to be used with S-Series i7 Processors for lower power consumption and smaller energy bills, but yet powerful enough to render anything!
Instead of cutting all the metal parts, this lasercut plexiglas kit will simply slide into each drawer, making it quick and easy to assemble your own CPU based (perfect for Vray and Corona users) renderfarm in matter of minutes!

"The most ambitious Ikea- Hack ever" 
Fab-Lab Berlin

Some of the benefits of using Ikea Helmer Renderfam  

  • Very compact and lightweight
  • Affordable (Almost 40% Cheaper than Equivalent Dual Xeon system)
  • Fits under the desk / space saver
  • Low energy consumption (~150W per node) 
  • Powerful Intel i7 processor  (Total 24 Cores / 48 Threads render power)!
  • Recommended - i7-4790S (65W), for low energy consumption and at the same time powerful enough to render anything -  which also results in less heat and smaller power bill! 
  • Swappable faceplates
  • up to 32GB RAM (With  200mm wide mATX board or mini-ITX up to 16GB)
  • Economy Friendly - Assemble your renderfarm, one node at a time!


Premium Faceplate - Front fans, sensor and power switch cutouts


Minimal Faceplate - 1 front fan cutout 

Many faceplate options coming soon!

Free with the purchase of Renderpocket Kit.
If campaign is successful, there will be new faceplate variations, right now only minimal and premium faceplates are available as advertised in black or white.  If you would like custom color, please contact me.


Why I need funding?

Since it is a very niche, one of a kind product on the market, I do not know how many people will be interested so I cannot take on the risk on producing hundreds of cases on my own. With your help, I will know for sure how many cases I will have to make and exactly how many screws, nuts, and fan grills will I have to purchase.  

It is not cheap to produce this plexiglas lasercut case. However, I found one factory that is willing to offer small discount for a minimum order of 300 cases, it is very rare, usually factories do not offer much of a discount for under 10,000 units.  


If you feel the price is beyond your budget, you are welcomed to purchase Renderpocket Lasercut files and lasercut as many cases as you wish by yourself, there are no restrictions, the files are yours to modify and do whatever you wish!

Prices

After this campaign, the prices will be 10-20% higher, because it will be based per individual order, which costs more to produce vs the group order.

BONUS!



Assembly Guide

Each purchase of Renderpockets will also include an Assembly Guide, which will explain how to assemble all the parts, and show steps how to put all the computer hardware into place. 

Render Node Manager (Special Offer)!

Renderpockets partnered up with Pixamoon to provide you with their upcoming renderfarm management software!

It is still in development, and should be available soon. When you purchase 3 Renderpockets Bundle you will get 50% off discount, and by purchasing 6 Renderpockets Bundle you will get this software totally FREE! 

You can find more info about the capabilities of RNM on scriptspot.

The Idea (hobby project)

The whole thing begun when I had crazy deadlines at work and I had to spend nights waiting for my computer to finish rendering, it was a disaster when I had to render during the day, because I couldn't use my computer until it finished rendering, and sometimes 1 rendering took 8 hours or more!  

So I began searching for better options, I couldn't afford a powerful $10,000 Dual Xeon state of the art machine, so I looked at cheaper options, unfortunately many retailers sold computers with low quality parts and they had the latest i7 CPU but other specs were not that good for rendering.  


I then looked at Rack Server systems, they were heavy and expensive, plus I had very little room at my apartment in New York and couldn't put huge rack system with all the wires exposed and stuff, so this was not an option.  Then one day I came across DIY Helmer Renderfarm setup on the internet (google it now and there are dozens of them!)  it was a really cool idea, 6 cheap (about $750 each) render nodes combined together to create a powerful personal renderfarm, for almost half the price of equivalent Dual Xeon beast!  


With Helmer Renderfarm, I no longer have to worry about crazy deadlines, final renderings are done under 1 hour! I can also render 6 views at the same time, and making animations is fun again! This way I was able to take on more work and wait less! 


Time and Money Savings

This kit doesn't just saves you time (making your own Helmer Renderfarm), it also saves you money, you do not need to buy expensive power tools (drill, dremel kit, protective cutting equipment, special metal cutting parts, etc, costs about $300).  The time savings are enormous, I spent countless hours cutting the metal parts, it was a trial and error process, because no matter how accurate you mark up the metal parts, you still get some error and at the end some things don't line up perfectly...  

With Renderpockets, you also save your Ikea Helmer cabinet for future use, instead of totally destroying it!


Prototyping

The prototyping has gone through many stages in the span of about 2 years! Most of the latest prototyping was done at a local laser-cutting lab in Berlin, Germany (Fab-Lab Berlin). So most of the design was engineered in Germany.  They liked my idea so much that they even showcased it on their BLOG! 

Almost every possible layout configuration was tested, even 2-in-1 system was constructed (2 computers in 1 drawer - "not recommended", possible with with pico-PSU), but the final configuration was chosen based on 4 important features: 

  1. Air ventilation (vent holes and fan locations strategically placed)  
  2. Portability / Expend-ability (quickly dis-assemble and transport, expend the design by snapping new parts as they become available soon) 
  3. Ease of assembly (easily snap parts together without screws)
  4. Make it look cool!


Stealth Mode - Hide your renderfarm!


Is heat an issue?

Renderpockets was designed to be used with  "S" series i7 Processors such as i7-4790S or 4770S, they produce less heat and consume much less energy than the K series, the K series are meant for overclocking and require big CPU coolers inside big PC cases and are not appropriate for smaller cases with low profile CPU coolers. 

It is possible to use CPUs other than S-Series i7, but at your own risk, you must do thorough research about what type of CPU cooler to use for other CPU types, and how much heat they produce.   Many of them require special big coolers that won't fit inside Renderpocket cases. 

The average temperature at full load (100% Rendering) is as shown above, about 65 degrees Celsius (with i7-3770S (65W) CPU and Noctua NH-L9i CPU cooler). 

It is recommended to use Front panel with at least 1 fan to reduce the heat.  The temperature is hotter for Stealth mode (without front fans), 10-20c hotter in some cases.


Pic. 1 - screenshot from one of the nodes while rendering.


Is noise an issue?

I recommend using good quality fans, to reduce the noise. In this video you can hear renderpockets in operation, you can hear some noise as expected from multiple computers, but it is not as loud as server rack systems.

Manual shutdown was performed for demonstration purpose only, you can shutdown all nodes remotely.


Not Included (Red text)

The items in red can be purchased from either amazon or ebay, I must get re-seller license in order to sell these, and it will delay everything alot.  For the power switch (22mm Momentary Vandal Switch) I would recommend www.frozencpu.com.

Click here to view larger


Turn your renderfarm into a green renderfarm!
Use S-Series i7 processors (65W), such as 4770S, 4790S which produce a lot less heat, and save you on energy bills! 


Risks and Challenges 

Like with any new product there are risks and challenges, here are the main challenges:

Production time: The design of Renderpockets is complete, now the main challenge is to produce hundreds of cases on time! I have researched a number of lasercutting facilities and ordered samples from each one, and chose one that had best results, communication and timing.  I hope that production of hundred or more cases will go as smoothly as it went for the dozen I ordered from them before, but there might be unexpected delays. 

Shipping within USA and Europe: I have experience with shipping within USA and to Europe, but not that much with the rest of the world.  For USA, and Europe, the shipping price is fixed, and is written on the perk you choose, please pay that extra amount via paypal when ordering.  I will also contact you before shipping to verify final payment.

Shipping for outside USA and Europe the prices fluctuate too much and I cannot provide fixed fee, so please use these specs to calculate the price to your country, and add that extra payment to your pre-order purchase, I will review it and contact you individually before shipping to verify final price.  

  • Shipping size for 6 Renderpocket: 50cm L x 30cm W x 15cm H (~5kg)
  • Shipping size for 3 Renderpockets: 50cm L x 30cm W x 10cm H (~3kg)
  • Shipping size for 1 Renderpocket: 50cm L x 30cm W x 5cm H (~1kg)
The origin of shipment can be selected either from Michigan, USA or from Berlin, Germany, please choose whichever is closest to you, but I recommend to try both anyway.

Customs: For some countries, you may have to pay tax, I have no control in this.  Also I will try to provide product tracking whenever possible, but if shipping company doesn't provide it for your country, then nor can I.

Returns: If products arrives damaged, please take a photo immediately, and contact me the same day, I will do my best to help resolve any issues. 

Ikea Helmer version: This product was tested on Helmer versions Year 2012 and newer, please make sure your Helmer is the one that can disassemble, older versions of Helmer come all welded up and prebuilt, you would have to cut out the back to fit the Renderpockets in.  You can measure your Helmer drawer to make sure this fits:

Renderpocket size is 40cm L x 23cm W x 84cm H

Pixamoon Software: For any questions regarding Render Node Manager, please contact the software developer through scriptspot or pixamoon.

Risks: It is a brand new product, I have used the operational prototypes for about 6 months without issues. I  recommend to buy new computer components from trusted manufacturers, especially the power supply (80 Bronze plus at least), if there is a problem with your computer components, I cannot be held liable for any damage caused by those components or if they break.  

Flexible Campaign: I've chosen the flexible campaign option, that means, even if the goal amount is not met, you will still receive your product, so this campaign is the actual pre-order for the product no matter the outcome of the goal amount.


Render with Style!

story:
A Pretty, Nerdy Cheese Board.

We are designers, engineers, artists, makers...and we end up doing a lot of client work. So the team at Studio KMD formed Small Batch: a place where we can make beautiful and useful objects to share with the masses. 

We developed LIGNA / CUPRUM Board No. 15 after learning about last year's discovery of the 15th convex pentagon to tessellate, or tile the plane. This is a big deal because for the last 30 years, there were only 14 known pentagons with this ability—little buggers are tough to find! We think the new shape is a looker, and we hope you agree. 

We've also been hard at work developing our own method of pressing a gorgeous copper rivet into wood. We love how the bright copper plays with cool, clean maple and rich black walnut. Please support our campaign so we can bring this beauty to market. And tell your friends!

What We Need & What You Get

We've set a goal of $15,000 for this campaign in the hopes of investing in some new tooling and equipment, as well as much-needed high-five lessons for our buddy Drew (watch the video). This will allow us to bring our beloved board to market more efficiently.

When you support our campaign, you'll be first in line to snag your own LIGNA / CUPRUM Board No. 15 at a price well below retail. Perks include one, two, three, four, or ten boards in your choice of maple, walnut, or a combination of the two. Keep them all and make your own tabletop tessellation, or knock a few people off your shopping list nice and early this year.

Shipping and Fulfillment

We're excited to start getting these items out to our supporters and will begin fulfilling orders as soon as the first batch of boards is complete. At the moment, we can not supply perks to our international supporters. We're working to resolve this internal issue with shipping; join our international mailing list for updates regarding our progress.

Risks & Challenges

Honestly, we've got this thing pretty well worked out. We've made some of these already with our existing equipment, so even if we fall short of our goal and can't get new tools, you'll still get your perks as though we had. In addition to that, we've already done a very successful crowdfunding campaign (our Pick Your Poison Decanters), from which every single order went out on time. You take on little risk in supporting our campaign, and we love to work. Win-win!

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute right now, you can still support us by sharing this campaign far and wide! Please tell your friends and fans about our LIGNA / CUPRUM Board No. 15, whether on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, blah blah blah things we don't even know about. And the Indiegogo share tools! They're so easy! Yay!

THANK YOU!

Risks & Challenges  Honestly, we've got this thing pretty well worked out. We've made some of these already with our existing equipment, so even if we fall short of our goal and can't get new tools, you'll still get your perks as though we had. In addition to that, we've already done a very successful crowdfunding campaign (our Pick Your Poison Decanters), from which every single order went out on time. You take on little risk in supporting our campaign, and we love to work. Win-win!


Other Ways You Can Help
 Even if you can't contribute right now, you can still support us by sharing this campaign far and wide! Please tell your friends and fans about our LIGNA / CUPRUM Board No. 15, whether on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, blah blah blah things we don't even know about. And the Indiegogo share tools! They're so easy! Yay!
THANK YOU!

story:
THIS IS SMART GRILL:

 

           

 

            Introducing the world’s first and only ultra-portable packable fabric grill. Made from fireproof fabric, the GoBQ folds up like a camping chair and fits in a backpack, a drawer, or slung over your shoulder. It's lightweight and compact. It’s quick and easy to set up and take down. Oh, and it's pretty dang cool too.

 

 

Ever feel shackled to your backyard, or steps from your car because traditional grills — even the “portable” ones — are just too bulky and heavy to take with you? We did too, but not anymore! The SMART BBQ Grill can easily be taken to the beach, camping, tailgating, picnicking, biking, boating, hiking, fishing, or anywhere you go!Take it wherever you imagine you could be grilling! And the high-tech heat and flame resistant material cools down soon after dumping the embers so you can quickly pack up and hit the trail to your next destination!

 

Compact for easy packing and storage:

 

The SMART BBQ is so compact there’s really no limit where you can take it. Whether you’re on foot or a bike, in a canoe or an airplane, the SMART BBQ folds up to the size of a small bag. It’s perfect for urban dwellers who don’t have a balcony or storage space for a regular grill, as it easily fits in a drawer or closet! And guess what, you don't have to give up functionality for portability. The SMART BBQ unfolds (as if by magic! ) to become fully functional BBQ grill with and enough grilling space to feed the whole family. Forget about all those other so-called "portable grills"!

 

High-Tech Heat/Flame Resistant

 

Made from special flame resistant materials that can withstand temperatures over 1200ºF (648º C), the SMART BBQ can take the heat! This material is  FDA-compliant for cookware. It cools down much faster than metal, and insulates the heat so the outside stays cooler than the inside, making it safer for kids and clumsy cooks!

 

 

CONSTRUCTION:

 

 
 

Just want a GoBQ Grill? Check out our PERKS:

 

 

Fathers Day, Graduation, Birthdays, all perfect occasions to buy a SMART BBQ for the person who grills everything. Get her a SMART BBQ! Can’t decide what to get Dad? Get him a SMART BBQ! Your kid’s going off to college? Get ‘em a SMART BBQ! It’s the gift that keeps on grilling!

 

Risks & Challenges

There are always possible bumps in the road with any new product development. Maintaining the integrity of the design and high standards of quality in the materials and craftsmanship is important to us, as is staying on schedule so our customers get their SMART BBQs as soon as possible.  

We've worked hard to minimize risks by first designing, creating, testing, using and improving several working prototypes in-house so that any design flaws, however minor, could be identified and solved well ahead of time.

Next we've carefully selected and vetted our manufacturing resources to ensure reliability, quality and scheduling is monitored and maintained throughout the process. Instead of having one factory make our product, we will source to factories that excel for each unique part and then bring everything together to assembly.  

Finally, before the first unit ships, we'll personally perform final quality inspections so every SMART BBQ meets our high standards of quality and performance. 

All that said, there's always the possibility for unforeseen delays due to circumstances beyond our control. Inclement weather can affect shipping times. Ports can become backed up with surplus cargo.

But no matter what, we promise to keep you informed with frequent updates on the progress of our project. So check back often to see how everything is going, and thank you again for all your support!

 

Other ways you can help

Even if you can't make a pledge, you can still help up by spreading the word about our campaign. Just click any of the share links at the top left of this page and share our campaign with your friends and family, or anyone you know who likes to grill! Thank you SO MUCH for supporting SMART BBQ Grills!

story:
Coocepts team is back with more innovation!

We are the Coocepts team and we created the brand Levimoon in 2017 to create planet lamps with unique ideas.

This year in 2019, we are happy to present our latest innovative planet lamps, Pirouette. Pirouette is a series of planet lamps which will dance nicely but there will be no visible docking of the lamp. With our patented design, Pirouette lamps are wonderful planet lamps that will illuminating every happy moment in your life.

 

Why is Pirouette unique?

Pirouette is a series of planet lamps include The Moon, The Earth and The Jupiter. Each planet is 3D printed with high quality finishing. Each lamp is a full restoration of the real planet.

 

Pirouette is a always spin portable lamp. Usually you will find a dock for most of the spinning lamp but with our patented technology, there will be no visible docking for Pirouette.

 

Button-less design is one of the objective in designing Pirouette. In order to present the best of each planets, we have designed a new way to operate the lamp, the "knock-to-work". You can gently knock the lamp to turn the lamp on, change the color of the LED (between white, beige and yellow) or turn the lamp off.

 

Wireless charging is a must have for Pirouette. Pirouette can be charged with any mobile phone wireless charging pad. Without any USB charging port on the lamp, the presentation of the planets are more complete. 

 

Specifications:

Pirouette:

  • Demension: 140mm
  • Power: Lithium Polymer Battery charged by any Qi wireless charger
  • Working hours: 10 hours
  • LED colors: White, Beige, Yellow interchangeable by "knock to work"
  • Packaging: Gift box with carton box

Qi Wireless Charger:

  • Color: Black
  • Input: 9V/1.35A 5V/1.5A
  • Working wattage: 10w Max
  • Execution standard: Qi Wireless charging standards
  • Charging power: over 76%

 

How to choose the peak:

Pirouette is available in The Moon, The Jupiter and The Earth. You can also choose your favorite planets no matter which peak you choose.

The Qi wireless charger is an option for supporters who do not have a Qi wireless charger or who want to buy another charger for Pirouette.

 

Why backing us?

Our brand "Levimoon" is born on crowdfunding platform. With all the supporters from 2017, your options on finalizing the product to a retail ready product are very important to us. Without your support and your options, Levimoon will never become as beautiful and innovative as now. Here is how our last campaign goes and a reference to our official website of our Levimoon products:

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-wireless-charging-levitating-moon-light/x/18827429#/

https://levimoon.com

We are so happy that we received so many positive feedbacks from our happy supporters and this is the fuel for our team in working out more innovation planet products. And now, we need your help again. In order to continuous our journey, we need your support again. Not limited to backing our project. Your options on our product is also very important to us. We are so happy to hear your comment on our products and idea. Let's work out the best planet lamps together!

 

Risks & Challenges

As we have sold over 10,000 pieces of Levimoon products from 2017, we are very confidence in producing our planet lamps with our latest 3D print technology. The patented invisible docking is very mature and the Qi wireless charging technology is also a well used system nowadays. After months of developing and testing, we finally completed the puzzle. Pirouette is now ready for production and we are so confidence in getting the best planet lamp to live.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Backing to our project is welcome but it is not the only way to support us:

  • Please also share our campaign with your family and friends in helping to spread the words
  • Indiegogo have sharing tool which is very easy to use and it will take you no time in sharing our campaign

 

Finally thank you very much for spending your time in reading our story and I wish you will become a friend of our team in supporting us in this project.

story:
Turning Picky Eaters into Veggie Lovers

VeggieMat™ is an interactive reusable placemat that helps kids, even picky ones, discover the joys of eating colorful veggies. It encourages children to develop healthy eating habits, which not only helps their growth and development but also reduces their risk of disease.

 

 

A coloring sheet for real veggies.

Crazy colors, odd textures, and funny flavors – it’s understandable that kids find vegetables both scary and disgusting. That’s why we created VeggieMat™, a reusable interactive placemat designed exclusively to make kids love their vegetables, develop their imagination and have some plain ol’ fun. 

Though VeggieMat™ works best for ages 2.5-5, if you think your little one would enjoy this kind of activity anyway, give it a try! You can help your children discover a veggie wonderland and teach them that eating healthy can be fun! 

 

 

How VeggieMat™ Works

  1. Prepare Your Veggies — Show your kids where veggies come from, how to wash them, and fun shapes to cut them into.
  2. Fill Out the VeggieMat™ — Match the veggie pieces to the shapes, discuss the colors, and let your kids discover goodness at their own pace.
  3. Build a Healthy Habit — Help your kids love veggies earlier to increase the likelihood of a healthier lifestyle when they grow up.

 

Based On Science

"Increasing our consumption of fruits and vegetables could save more than 100,000 lives and $17 billion in health care costs from heart disease each year." — Union of Concerned Scientists report.

“A diet rich in vegetables and fruits can lower blood pressure, reduce the risk of heart disease and stroke, prevent some types of cancer, lower risk of eye and digestive problems, and have a positive effect upon blood sugar, which can help keep appetite in check.”  — Harvard T.H. Chan School of Public Health

Adopting healthy eating habits from a young age can have a positive influence on a child’s dietary habits later in life. 

We’ve used 4 scientific studies in designing our mats to ensure every detail helps your kids eat more vegetables:

Involvement Encourages Eating
Children who help prepare their meals, eat up to 76% more vegetables than those who don’t.
Read the research

Colors Stimulate Interest
Kids love variety, wanting as many as 6 different colors on their plate (in contrast to us boring adults who prefer just 3)
Read the research

Playing Leads to Trying
Playing with food actually helps pickier eaters try new things (but you might want to keep this a secret ?).
Read the research

Visual Appeal Is Important
Kids eat tastier-looking fruit than regular-looking fruit, and we’re sure it’s the same for veggies.
Read the research

 
 
 

 

Easy to Clean

When there are kids involved, you need all the help you can get! Simply wash VeggieMat™ with warm soapy water or clean it in the dishwasher. It’s also ideal for places where tables are not super clean, providing the kid a clean surface to eat. VeggieMat™ also protects fancy and super clean tablecloths in other places, making it easier to clean up after your child, without leaving a catastrophic mess.

 

Great Table Grip

Concerned the food might end up on the floor? VeggieMat™ is harder to move than regular plates, but if you want it to be even harder to move, sprinkle some drops of water under it to make it stick to the table even better.

 

Easy to Store and Carry 

Being elastic and foldable, VeggieMat™ is super-flexible for storing and carrying. It can be stored rolled up or folded, occupying minimal space in a drawer or cupboard.

 

Eco-Friendly Money Saver

VeggieMat™ is more than just mealtime fun – Made of the same materials as reusable baking mats, it is also an eco-friendly reusable alternative to disposable parchment paper for rolling dough while baking cakes, puddings, bread, pizzas, etc. for a more sustainable kitchen, to save money and to keep the environment clean.

 

Specifications

VeggieMat™ is made of FDA-approved food-grade silicone, the same material that baking mats are made of.

  • Reusable
  • Dishwasher Safe
  • Oven Safe (Up to 230°C / 450 F)
  • Microwave Safe (Up to 230°C / 450 F)

  • Freezer Safe (Up to -40 °C / -40 F)

 

What Parents say about VeggieMat™

 

Available in 2 Colors and 2 Designs

Both Rainbow and Bicycle are available in red and blue.

 

 

Rewards

You can mix colors and designs in your order.

 

    The Team

    Artiom Dashinsky - VeggieMat™ Head Honcho – I’m a former Senior Product Designer at WeWork and the author of an Amazon best-seller in the Design category.

    Based in Berlin and Tel Aviv, I’m building VeggieMat™ with my parents who live in Minsk, Belarus. Three of us are makers, educators, and product designers alike who have built things used by professionals at Google, Facebook, Netflix, Boeing, and others.

    Have any questions? Send us an email!

     

     

    Timeline

    Our goal is to deliver VeggieMat™ to YOU – our supporters as fast as possible, so your kids can enjoy VeggieMat™ soon. Our goal is to make sure VeggieMat™ is delivered within 2 months after our Indiegogo campaign ends.

     

    How You can help

    • Back us!
    • Spread the word in your parenting community about our Indiegogo campaign.
    • Add a second copy to your pledge for someone you care about whose kids need to eat healthier while having fun.
    • Share using this button below:

     

    Risks and Challenges

    VeggieMat™ has already been successfully produced and tested on a small scale. With your help we will be able to place a larger order with our manufacturer and ship your VeggieMat™ soon after our Indiegogo campaign ends.

    The only risk we foresee right now is a longer production time due to unpredictable manufacturing issues. Of course, there are other manufacturers in the market in case it doesn’t work out with the one we’re currently associated with.

    Q: What if you do not meet our funding goal?

    A: Our Indiegogo campaign is “flexible”, which means you will receive your VeggieMat™ even if we don’t meet our funding goal.

story:
Tillchecker™

Get more from your grocery dollars and save time, hassle and the environment at the same time!

  • Created by a third generation grocer who understands the shopping pains we all feel
  • Test launched in Canada and now ready to start passing savings on to Houstonians.

We need $100,000 to get started in Texas and your contribution will help us:

  • Launch Tillchecker™s iPhone App in the U.S.
  • Create the Tillchecker™ Android App
  • Create an easier to use and localized Tillchecker™ website 
  • Enroll 10,000 new Southwest Houston members
  • List current prices for thousands of products in hundreds of SW Houston stores
  • Create contests to make finding the best deals fun and rewarding
  • Offer crowd sourcing rewards and prizes to Tillchecker™ members
  • Get Tillchecker™ ready to launch across all of Texas this year
  • Launch this year in the State and City that makes the most campaign contributions
  • Help Tillchecker™ members save money on groceries
  • Help Tillchecker™ members save driving time and time wasted waiting at checkouts

When you join our campaign by making a contribution you will

  • receive a fun and amazing PERK, at least we think it is!
  • become a full Lifetime Tillchecker™ Member
  • help Tillchecker™ members save millions of dollars on groceries
  • help Tillchecker™ members waste less gas driving and save millions of dollars more
  • help us add new features, like where to find the best local produce
  • and even help the environment
  • join the Tillchecker™ community, here's your change! 

Our Great Perks:


 

Risks & Challenges

To pull this together we need enough money, good people and growing member support, and even though success is never guaranteed, our team has a proven track record of delivering affordable game changing solutions.

Other Ways You Can Help

Our campaign isn't just about the money. It is about community. It is about sharing the best ways for everyone to save money, time, mileage and hassle when they go shopping.

We know that many people are just getting by and may not be able to contribute money, and those will be the members that Tillchecker™ can help the most. Whether you can send us money or just want to help by joining, please use the Indiegogo Share tools to go to our site, register as a new Member, and click on the Share buttons to help deliver our message and Tillchecker™ savings to everyone you know.

Every member counts, every penny counts and we thank you for your support.

Create an easier to use and localized Tillchecker™ website 
Enroll 10,000 new Southwest Houston members
List current prices for thousands of products in hundreds of SW Houston stores
Create contests to make finding the best deals fun and rewarding
Offer crowd sourcing rewards and prizes to Tillchecker™ members
Get Tillchecker™ ready to launch across all of Texas this year
Launch this year in the State and City that makes the most campaign contributions
Help Tillchecker™ members save money on groceries
Help Tillchecker™ members save driving time and time wasted waiting at checkouts

When you join our campaign by making a contribution you will

receive a fun and amazing PERK, at least we think it is!
become a full Lifetime Tillchecker™ Member
help Tillchecker™ members save millions of dollars on groceries
help Tillchecker™ members waste less gas driving and save millions of dollars more
help us add new features, like where to find the best local produce
and even help the environment
join the Tillchecker™ community, here's your change! 

Our Great Perks:
 
Risks & ChallengesTo pull this together we need enough money, good people and growing member support, and even though success is never guaranteed, our team has a proven track record of delivering affordable game changing solutions.
Other Ways You Can Help
Our campaign isn't just about the money. It is about community. It is about sharing the best ways for everyone to save money, time, mileage and hassle when they go shopping.
We know that many people are just getting by and may not be able to contribute money, and those will be the members that Tillchecker™ can help the most. Whether you can send us money or just want to help by joining, please use the Indiegogo Share tools to go to our site, register as a new Member, and click on the Share buttons to help deliver our message and Tillchecker™ savings to everyone you know.
Every member counts, every penny counts and we thank you for your support.

story:
'STILL EARLY' PERKS JUST RELEASED

LETTING YOUR PETS OUT JUST GOT A WHOLE LOT EASIER.

POPS UP MAGNETICALLY IN SECONDS AND FOLDS AWAY INSTANTLY, SO YOU CAN STILL LOCK YOUR DOOR WHEN YOU LEAVE HOME.

WHY PRE-ORDER ON INDIEGOGO?

Indiegogo is the only place where you can pre-order Pop-Up Pet Door 2.0. Backers of our campaign will receive their pet doors much sooner than the rest of the world and for much much cheaper! *As the campaign continues, pricing on Indiegogo will steadily increase. Reserve yours now by selecting a perk in the size that best fits your pet.







Since early 2018, we've delivered 10,000 doors around the world. We've listened to all of our customers' valuable feedback and produced the new and very much improved prototype that you saw in the video. We're so excited to run our very first crowdfunding campaign on Indiegogo to manufacture our second-generation model. With your help, we'll deliver Pop-Up Pet Door 2.0 to the global masses and make pets and people's lives a whole lot easier.
 






Pop Up Pet Door 2.0 is a revolutionary solution that lets your pet outside without you having to open and close your sliding door each and every time. It was designed for the typical pet owner who does not want a permanent and costly pet door . This one snaps in magnetically when you want it there and comes down just as fast when you don't!



Competing pet door inserts range from $100 to $300+ and do not offer the portable features and larger sizes that you see here. Pop-Up Pet Door 2.0 is the most affordable, yet truly reliable solution on the market today.







*Shown here is a working prototype sample. The final product will have the magnetic logo in red, and the transparent flap will be laser cut to minimize open space in between the framing. This will help to keep the bugs out!




The original Pop-Up Pet Door is limited to doors that are 80" in height. Version 2.0 now fits doors up to 96" and heights in between. The new ADJUSTABLE SUPPORT FRAME allows you to adjust the overall height of the pet door to get that exact fit! NOTE: If you have a 96" tall door, don't forget to get the 16" EXTENSION Add-On at check-out. Cost is only an extra $12. 




Easiest way to decide which size to get is to measure your pet's width and height with a tape measure. If your pet measures less than the "Flap Dimension", then it will fit through the opening. If you have more than one pet, just get the bigger size. Small pets can easily push through the larger flaps too.


Because your pets simply can't wait, you also have the option to get Version 1.0 at less than half of retail price, shipped with FREE USA shipping in 1-2 business days! Just select the "Version 1.0" Add-On, at check-out. *Version 1.0 is only available in SM, MD & LG.






It's so easy. Just check the size guide above for the Pop-Up Pet Door that fits your largest pet, then select the Perk that matches that size. If you have a non-standard 96" tall door, you will be given the option for a 16" Add-On at check-out. Follow our timeline below and our frequent campaign updates to know when to expect your perk(s) to get delivered. Yes, you can buy more than one and even send a few as gifts!

HURRY HURRY! As our promotional (Loyalty Discount, Early Bird) perks sell out, we will continue to release more units at closer to retail prices. Get yours while it is still HALF OFF!



Buying more than just one? Simply complete your first transaction, then revisit this campaign to start another. You'll have the option to specify a different delivery address if it is intended as a gift. OH, and if it is a Christmas present, we'll be sending out digital eCard templates for you to delivery personally, since our perks won't be delivering until Late February.



Pop-Up Pet Door 2.0 comes fully assembled:

1. Simply affix an INCLUDED metal strip to the top of your doorframe.
2. Unfold and magnetically attach the top of the pet door to the metal strip.
3. Adjust the bottom support frame for an exact fit!


 





Our campaign goal is set at $20,000 to finance tooling and sampling costs. This will also finance a long-awaited trip to our factory, where we'll personally inspect and approve the units before delivery. If you can help us get to this critical point, we have additional investors that will double down to get production under way! 
 


Renee Kay is a mother of two grown children and a dog lover extraordinaire. She started three companies and has invented and brought to market several products. Renee has appeared in multiple media channels, and has been involved in numerous philanthropic endeavors, including efforts to find homes for pets in animal shelters. 

From my family to yours, THANK YOU so much for your support!
~ Renee Kay

story:
The Fresh Portal is in discussion with major online delivery retailers that are interested in seeing this product come to market, BUT we need help to build our prototypes (8 of them to be exact).  During this 30 day campaign, join us to enjoy special perks only available to our friends and family here on Indiegogo.

REFERRAL PROGRAM

The Fresh Portal™

The Fresh Portal™ is a patented, innovative home delivery solution. The Fresh Portal™ features advanced multipurpose delivery receiving solutions, remotely controlled via Fresh Portal™ app and WiFi that incorporates Far-UVC disinfection, package security, and climate control into a single household appliance. 

The Fresh Portal™ keeps delivered groceries and prepared food fresh and temperature controlled until you can collect it into your own home.  The Fresh Portal™ is also the solution for temperature sensitive medications.

The Fresh Portal™ is the ideal delivery solution for the modern home.

$3,450 Installed*

*Price includes a standard installation with one added electrical location.

    

The Fresh Portal™ will help our customers harness all emerging delivery options, to the benefit of keeping their families healthier and safer. The Fresh Portal’s™ new technology will facilitate a direct-to-consumer and eco-friendly supply-chain by inspiring concepts like farm-to-table, improving freshness and reducing single-use waste. 

The Fresh Portal™ Story

The Fresh Portal™ idea came to life in 2015 when three professionals in the Carmel, California luxury building market were trying to design a fresh food delivery solution so their customers could focus on enjoying the weather rather than running for groceries. We envisioned Fresh Portal™ owners waking up to freshly brewed Carmel Roasting Co. cappucino delivered and ready to be enjoyed. This was at a time when food delivery services were just emerging and before Amazon came out with their locker program. Since then, Fresh Portal™ has been fully designed, we have applied and been granted a patent, secured a local engineering firm, designed the software and PCB behind the product and now we are seeking to raise funds for the production-ready-prototype and we will then begin shipping and installations.

(USTPO Patent No. 10729265.7)

                         

How Fresh Portal™ Works

Fresh Portal™ is an appliance installed into an exterior wall of your home or office. A securely locked exterior door is accessible to delivery persons using a unique one-time access-code sent to their device over your existing WiFi network. A locked interior door gives you personal access to the delivery products. Fresh Portal™ has the ability to safely control temperature based on the needs of the particular delivery - your meals can be kept cool or warm and you can adjust the temperature so that your temperature sensitive medications or packages can be kept safe. Fresh Portal™ units are designed with two temperature zones. In a single delivery you can have hot pizza in one zone and cold beverages in another. The Far-UVC disinfection light cycle automatically runs every time a delivery occurs. 

Reduced contact delivery keeps you healthier.

Fresh Portal’s™ ability to receive deliveries when you’re not home gives you peace of mind. You control everything from an app on your personal smart device. Notifications and live video allow you to monitor activity whenever activity occurs.

 

Fresh Portal™ Construction & Durability

The patented design of the Fresh Portal™ has three main components.  

Mount Box

Interior Door

Exterior Door

The mount box is permanently installed. It is made of the highest quality stainless steel and is corrosion resistive. The mount box contains zero moving parts - it will stand the test of time!

The interior and exterior door components include all of the Fresh Portal™ mechanical features. These parts are made of the most durable powder coated steel. They are the moving pieces of the Fresh Portal™ and, as such, may wear out over time. A manufacturer warranty will be available and replacement parts will be available.

How is Fresh Portal™ Installed?

Fresh Portal™ installation is much like adding a window to your home. 

A certified Fresh Portal™ installer cuts a template into your interior and exterior wall finishes between stud bays (or similar for masonry) using dust mitigation technology. The mount box is inserted and affixed and then insulated and waterproofed just like a window. We attach the interior component and the exterior component, together accounting for 100% of the moving parts. The Fresh Portal's™ weather-proof seal is tested and perfected. Your installer will then power it on, connect it to your wifi and you will download and install the Fresh Portal™ app to your preferred devices. Once paired with your devices, your installation is complete. You can customize your Fresh Portal™ app settings and then simply enjoy.

How will the Fresh Portal™ app Integrate with Food Delivery Providers?

The Fresh Portal™ app will be your go-to app for food delivery - whether it's fresh groceries or prepared foods. Within the Fresh Portal™ app you will have access to local farmers, grocers, restaurants and established food delivery providers. As our technology matures, we'll continue streamlining vendor-partner communication with the goal of providing the one-click 'Deliver to my Fresh Portal™' option. 

For example, within the Fresh Portal™ app, order dinner by searching for your favorite restaurant, place your order and adjust the temperature zones. The app will notify the restaurant of your order and then provide a one time access code to be shared with the delivery driver. The driver uses the one time access code manually or the wifi and Bluetooth technology automatically open your Fresh Portal™ door as he approaches. He places your dinner inside the Fresh Portal™, he taps the door to auto close and he leaves (it will auto close if he forgot). You get a push notification that the Fresh Portal™ door has closed and your food has been delivered. Once the door is closed, the Fresh Portal™ runs a UVC light pulse to disinfect the package surface. You can even view your food with interior cameras so enjoy the rest of your leisure walk or stay on that call with your Mom a while longer, all while having the peace of mind that your food is safe inside your Fresh Portal™.

Why do I need a Fresh Portal™?

Convenience. It’s that simple.

  • Order your favorite meal delivery before leaving work and when you arrive home your meal is ready to remove from the Fresh Portal™ and serve.
  • Receive your medications that require refrigeration and secure delivery without having to be home to immediately transfer it to the refrigerator.
  • Skip the hassle of end of work day shopping, come home to your freshly delivered groceries. Online order and delivery services for groceries have vastly improved, now you can have an equally efficient receiving option that is incredibly convenient, delivered to your Fresh Portal™, Far-UVC disinfected and ready to use.
  • Don’t want your family, pets or yourself to be disturbed by the doorbell? Your Fresh Portal™ alerts you via text, when product is delivered, allowing you to retrieve it when it’s convenient.

 

Help Fresh Portal™ Advance From Concept to Shipping!

The Fresh Portal™ is turn-key and ready for production. We are raising $100,000 to work with our Berkley, CA engineering firm to refine the production-ready-prototype specifications (BOM).

What we've accomplished so far:

  • Applied for and been granted a patent (USTPO Patent No. 10729265.7).
  • Commissioned a market research study by Burke Market Research with exceptional results.
  • Designed the environmental control (heating, cooling & humidity).
  • Designed the electronic chip hardware (PCB).
  • Obtained an Engineering firm in CA, that is ready to refine the production-ready-prototype specifications (BOM).
  • Used our patented specifications to 3D print a scaled-down version of the hardware for proof-of-concept.
  • Consulted with manufacturers to confirm each part can be sourced and manufactured at high volume.
  • We have a Mutual Nondisclosure Agreement signed with Amazon and Amazon Key and continue to update our progress schedule.

     

What your contribution will help us accomplish next:

  • We will fine tune our production ready prototype, 
  • We will select the final colors and finish details.
  • We will instruct our manufacturer to begin tooling for the first production run.
  • We will train licensed general contractors on the installation protocol.
  • We will approach wholesalers and home builders and work on getting our New-Home Model pre-installed in the modern homes built today.

We expect a timeline of 3-12 months for the prototype stage, and then only 60-120 days for the manufacturing stage. Our Berkeley, CA firm is capable of domestically producing up to 10,000 units per year economically. As sales exceed their abilities, larger manufacturing options will be utilized, and our costs will decrease without compromise to quality.

The Fresh Portal™ retails for $3,450 so if you want your very own, you’ll definitely want to check out our perks!

 

  •  For $20 we'll add your name to our office surfboard to commemorate you.  By joining us in the Fresh Portal™ launch, we'll send you an email for your e-signature or doodle.  Then we'll laminate the office's vintage board with your mark.  We'll post photos so that you can see your mark along side the other company contributors. This surfboard will forever be with us in the hopeful the Fresh Portal™  headquarters.

 

  • Not ready to commit to a purchase, but think you might want a Fresh Portal™ in the future? The COUPON CODE perk is for you! Pay just $50 now and when you’re ready to make your purchase on our website at some later date, you'll save $250 with your coupon code!

 

  • We have the option to PRE-ORDER and receive a $500 discount. This deposit holds your place in line for delivery & installation. We’ll contact you no sooner than March 2021 to collect the remaining $2,950. 

 

  • Our deepest discount comes with the PURCHASE of a FRESH PORTAL™ FIRST EDITION. You save $1,000 by paying in full today. You’ll be one of the first units to be delivered and installed. 

NOTE: THE FIRST 100 INSTALLATIONS WILL BE COMPLETED IN CALIFORNIA.

 

 

Can't make a contribution?

Don't Fret!

You can still help by sharing our campaign on your social media platforms and getting the word out!

 

 

Help bring the Fresh Portal™ to market and become a pioneer in the future of home delivery!

 

The more our vendor-partnerships grow because you demand the Fresh Portal™, the more our one-click 'Deliver to my Fresh Portal™' option will be made available by retailers and delivery services like AmazonFresh, Safeway, Krogers, Albertsons, Costco, GrubHub, DoorDash, etc.

Please join us in shouting out...NO MORE WILTED LETTUCE!

The Team behind Fresh Portal™

The Fresh Portal™ is brought to you by Nurdwerx LLC, founded by Jeremy High, a Licensed Architectural Builder and head of the Construction company he founded 12 years ago. Jeremy has spearheaded builds of impressive custom multi-million dollar homes in Pebble Beach and Carmel, CA . He earned his BS at the University of Oregon.

Co-Founder and Head of Design Josh Bauman has 9 years of experience designing homes in Pebble Beach and the Pacific Coast. Josh designed 3d printable parts for a proof-of-principle prototype, confirming the Fresh Portal™ can be built and installed as planned.

Co-Founder Phil Ciszek has been immersed in high-end building and construction work for 10 years. Phil is a key member on the design and development team.

Attorney and Chief Technical Officer Gary Romel II is an Air Force Veteran. He ran the airborne computer systems aboard the AWACS aircraft. He graduated with honors from Loyola Law School, Los Angeles and holds a Bachelors of Science degree in Technical Management.

Chief Financial Officer Kelly Parrish is a Licensed CPA. She earned her Masters of Accounting degree from Florida State University. Kelly also assists with other functions such as HR and marketing management.

You’ll be one of the first units to be delivered and installed. NOTE: THE FIRST 100 INSTALLATIONS WILL BE COMPLETED IN CALIFORNIA.  Can't make a contribution?Don't Fret!You can still help by sharing our campaign on your social media platforms and getting the word out!  Help bring the Fresh Portal™ to market and become a pioneer in the future of home delivery! The more our vendor-partnerships grow because you demand the Fresh Portal™, the more our one-click 'Deliver to my Fresh Portal™' option will be made available by retailers and delivery services like AmazonFresh, Safeway, Krogers, Albertsons, Costco, GrubHub, DoorDash, etc.Please join us in shouting out...NO MORE WILTED LETTUCE!
The Team behind Fresh Portal™The Fresh Portal™ is brought to you by Nurdwerx LLC, founded by Jeremy High, a Licensed Architectural Builder and head of the Construction company he founded 12 years ago. Jeremy has spearheaded builds of impressive custom multi-million dollar homes in Pebble Beach and Carmel, CA . He earned his BS at the University of Oregon.Co-Founder and Head of Design Josh Bauman has 9 years of experience designing homes in Pebble Beach and the Pacific Coast. Josh designed 3d printable parts for a proof-of-principle prototype, confirming the Fresh Portal™ can be built and installed as planned.Co-Founder Phil Ciszek has been immersed in high-end building and construction work for 10 years. Phil is a key member on the design and development team.Attorney and Chief Technical Officer Gary Romel II is an Air Force Veteran. He ran the airborne computer systems aboard the AWACS aircraft. He graduated with honors from Loyola Law School, Los Angeles and holds a Bachelors of Science degree in Technical Management.Chief Financial Officer Kelly Parrish is a Licensed CPA. She earned her Masters of Accounting degree from Florida State University. Kelly also assists with other functions such as HR and marketing management.

story:
Light Paint HiR (Hyper Interactive Reality)

We are a small team of highly motivated and creative individuals, who
have come together to create the world's coolest new light painting, VJing and multimedia production tool: Introducing Light Paint HiR! 

What is Light Painting?
Light Paint HiR is inspired by a relatively new form of painting with light, called by many names; "light painting", "light graffiti", "light art" and "long-exposure photography", where one can create stunning images by leaving the exposure of a camera open in a dark setting, and then selectively "paint in the scene" using different light sources.  This "painting with light" has traditionally been done using higher-end digital cameras and "old school film cameras", but not any more!

(A simple 'Light Painted' scene captured using Light Paint HiR)

So what is Light Paint HiR?
Light Paint HiR software allows for the real-time capture of images, video and audio, allowing you to save your unique art creations with a user-friendly interface. Turn an average webcam into a real-time digital multimedia production tool!

We are now making this very cool new art form available to the masses!

(the creator of Light Paint HiR briefly describes what LPHiR is)
What can lpHiR do?

Light Paint HiR is a new way to create innovative tutorials, paint unique pictures, and project live visuals during dance parties and music shows.  The real fun happens in the "live art creation" modes, where the light is retained and tracked, creating a live canvas on any screen or projection surface. 

The paint brush can be your body or light sources such as flashlights, LED hula hoops, spinning fire and our newly prototyped LED painting tools. Now everyone can be the star of the show while seeing themselves in a whole new light.


With Light Paint HiR, light painting can now be brought to real world surfaces by incorporating a projector, and facing the camera at the projection surface, allowing the painter to 'draw' right on the projection surface with light. Because the light is 'mapped' to the surface, we have dubbed this technique:

'Projection Mapped Light Painting'


(an example of a 'Projection Mapped Light Painting')


Video production artists can seamlessly apply real-time effects and filters to video, images or camera streams on the fly using a simple user interface. This offers a new way to edit video that is visually appealing and unlike anything experienced before.


(a short video demonstrating light painting with a video blended in lpHiR)

Your contributions will allow us to move forward and make this evolutionary
new tool available to the world. 

The software is currently ONLY available for Linux, however our goal is to make it cross platform so it can be enjoyed on OSx, Windows, tablets and smart phones.  The good news is that if you own a computer that does not have Linux installed, you can simply choose our "Bootable USB PenDrive Perk" to run Light Paint HiR.

We have created a new paradigm in human-computer interaction that goes far beyond your mouse and a keyboard... and it keeps getting better.This project is allowing us to continue developing more Open Source tools, such as motion controlled user interfaces and software to help people overcome their movement based disabilities. We want to see a more creative, enabled world using the technology we already have at our fingertips.

We need this funding to ensure we have the energy and resources to give ample support to our fans and make the experience even easier for everyone to use.

Support us so we can support your Creativity

Monies received from this campaign will go towards:

  • Offering one on one support for "early adoptors"
  • Creating Light Paint HiR video tutorials
  • Maintaining FAQ's, member's forum and user gallery
  • Development of Cross-platform versions (OSX, Windows, Android, iOS, etc.)
  • Paying back investors that helped us get this far
  • Paying our developers for their time and efforts
  • Contributing to the Open Source projects used in LPHiR
Plus further development of Light Paint HiR features such as:
    • Voice, MIDI, and motion controlled interface features.
    • Developing a smart phone interface for remote control.
    • Adding cool new effects and filters
    • An automation system and timeline control

    What can we give you?

    We love to share what we do. Over the last year we have set up installations at Full Moon dance parties, music festivals and numerous private functions. It is most exciting when we see others laughing, moving and playing like kids as they see themselves in a new light :) Having visuals at any event is always a treat and when the visuals are interactive, then the event is even better! 

    So we can use this on our mac's/pc's?

    For non Linux users, we have created a bootable flash drive that allows the software to work on PC's that meet the minimum requirements. This will allow you to "Plug and Paint". Features include a full user interface allowing real time changing of multiple filters and effects while capturing the audio, video in good quality. Light Paint HiR is now running at multiple test sites, so we know we are ready to release this software to the public.  We will do our best to support you in getting it up and running so you can get down to some seriously fun creativity! 

    Cool, any cool tools to Light Paint with?

    The Hyper Interactive Reality crew is also developing light painting tools!  

    We have done much research and development to create the ultimate light painting multi-tool.  In order to allow artists to get the most out of lpHiR we are refining our design and making this tool available to the world. In the spirit of open source, we have created build plans featured on instructables, allowing ease of access for the DIY'ers of the world.  the final design will include a rechargeable lithium ion battery, multiple attachments, and a 24 key remote for ultimate control of your light brush. 


    Light Paint HiR at events!

    We love taking our show on the road and hosting parties. Following this campaign, we will host a celebration event in the West Kootenays and for a contribution you can come paint your own pictures and meet the creators!

    Whether it be a wedding, dance event, festival, or a birthday party we can customize a show catered to your needs. Please contact us separately for pricing and details of what we can do for your event. 

    Uses beyond Light Painting

    • Sound Recording
    • Stop Frame Animation
    • Graphic Design and Art
    • Creating Live Music Videos
    • Interactive Advertising
    • Video and Image Editing
    • Real Time Titling (i.e. credits)
    • Screen Casting (capture desktop and sound)
    • Real Time Video projection art at live events (VJ'ing)
    • Skype and Video conferencing with filters and effects
    • Record YouTube videos with live effects (plus remaster sound)
    • Presenting information products in a creative and engaging way
    • Educating children bridging movement, learning and technology
    • Making ordinary things extraordinary (LightPaintHiR Gallery)


    Light Paint HiR is a tool that will get people up out of their chairs, creating real time art while moving their bodies.  Please share this amazing campaign with your friends and family, so they can be a part of the fun!

    The risks and challenges are few, as most of the hard work has been done.  Our biggest challenge will be providing "end-user support" for all who download this software.  To manage this we will create FAQ's, forums, video tutorials, on-line chat and offer support via email.

    Light Paint HiR is Open Source!

    Light Paint HiR is to be released Open Source, allowing everyone equal access to the programs code; so anyone can view, modify and even add to the magic that is Light Paint HiR.  So by contributing to Light Paint HiR you are supporting the Open Source Movement; a growing global community, and collection of software that allows for universal access to cutting edge technology.

    Want More?

    For more on Light Paint HiR check out our website and the video playlists below
    NiVofHiR PlayList


    Synchronistic Savage Playlist:
    (Play your own soundtrack at your pleasue)


    If you have any questions or comments please feel free to contact us.

story:
Hello, everyone.

My name is K Bethany Sawyer, writer and producer of the Paranormal Shopping Network web mini-series. I’ve always loved stories. Mom says that even before I could read, I spent my time flipping through the pictures. My first play – a horror story about a bunch of rats invading a slumber party – was written when I was seven years old.

Filmmaking didn’t cross my mind until college, when I met other students who were intent on making movies. Even so, I kept thinking “not now, maybe later.” Well, later is now. Last summer, I started to experiment with filmmaking. With my cats. In my living room. With only one friend to help. The result was “The Great Escape”. It’s more than just a cat video – it’s a silent film!

After that, I began to think of other projects to work on. The concept for Paranormal Shopping Network came to me in the fall of 2014, when I was traveling in Transylvania. I really wanted to bring some Dracula breath mints back to my friends and colleagues in Seattle, but I couldn’t find any! Not to be out-maneuvered by a lack of marketing creativity, I decided to bring Transylvanian Breath Mints to the world through fiction, and the Paranormal Shopping Network was born.

The cast of "Transylvanian Breath Mints" (left to right): John Hambrick, Lucy Pearce and Greg Gutshall Jr.

This is a unique project. It’s structured as three independent commercials, but when shown together in order, they tell a single story. For that reason, Micaela Colman (our talented director) and I have decided to release the Paranormal Shopping Network as both a web mini-series and submit it to film festivals as a short film.

I have three goals for this project. First, I want to tell a great story in an unusual way. Sure, it’s a series of commercials. But put them together, in order, and they tell a cohesive story. Second, I love to make people laugh. Life is tough. Laughter is medicine. We need more of it. And third, I want to make something that everyone – cast, crew, donors, audience – can feel proud to point at and say “I’m part of this. I helped make that.”

By contributing to the film with a tax-deductible donation, you become part of the Paranormal Shopping Network community. You’ll be helping not only me, but our entire cast and crew gain experience as actors, cinematographers, gaffers, grips, directors, and producers. Everyone involved in the project has volunteered their time and talent, and many of them will use the final product as part of their demo reel to gain paid work. Wouldn’t it be nice if we could all be paid to do what we love?

Thank you for your interest, and we look forward to having you as part of our Paranormal Shopping Network community! Don’t miss out on the fabulous perks that are only available through our Indiegogo campaign.

P.S. Curious about where the money goes? Even though this is an all-volunteer cast and crew, there are insurance, legal, administrative and other costs associated with film production. Here’s a graph:


video music credit
"Lost Time" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

story:
First of all, I’d like to thank every single person you bought my cookies, started spreading the word about my cookies, or just said a kind word about my business.

THANK YOU, THANK YOU, THANK YOU !!!!!!

A little about me and how I got started

I've always loved cooking and baking and developing new recipes in the kitchen.

 That love and some winning recipes landed me on the Food Network on “Grill It! With Bobby Flay”. I saw a need for great tasting gluten free snacks and starting trying out a few recipes that included cakes, brownies, muffins,  delicate pastries, and of course cookies! In 2014, I introduced  my baked goods to then Executive chef Joshua Drew at FARMSHOP in Brentwood, CA and Kitchen Table products was born. They now carry my Gluten Free Mini Chocolate Chip Cookies. More flavors soon to come like:

Ginger Molasses

Peanut Butter

Almond Butter

Mocha Espresso 

Coconut Macaroon

Whole Grain / Oatmeal

Iced Lemon

ABOUT OUR ARTISAN COOKIES

The artisan food market has been joined by small batch cookie company Kitchen Table Products. KTP has PERFECTED the gluten free Chocolate Chip cookie and successfully combined gourmet ingredients, kitchen tested recipes and home-made authenticity to create a next level cookie that surpasses all other gluten free treats.

We are committed to every batch having a homemade taste using high end quality ingredients for that traditional flavor and texture that literally will put a smile on your face!

WHAT’S IN OUR COOKIES

ALL NATURAL WHOLE FOOD INGREDIENTS

HIGH QUALITY GLUTEN FREE FLOUR

BAKED FROM SCRATCH

WHAT’S NOT IN OUR COOKIES

NO TRANS FATS

NO FILLERS

NO PRESERVATIVES 


WHY SUPPORT US?

For those who choose gluten free you deserve to have delicious options for your snacking desires. I really care about what I do.

I also hate waste,  so Kitchen Table prides itself on supporting other businesses that care about the environment that recycle materials and accept our donations of any leftover product.


A business cannot survive without: 

A good idea or product

A market to buy your product

Advertising or word of mouth to keep it going

Capitol to keep it growing

Kitchen Table Products has been in business for 8 months selling small batch Gluten Free Chocolate Chip Cookies at FARMSHOP in the Brentwood Country Mart in Brentwood, CA. Because of a great recipe and word of mouth, my sales have quadrupled in the last 3 months and it’s time for me to expand and grow! I have been financing my business with my profits and personal $$, but it is not enough to move forward without a little help.

Why Indiegogo?

We choose to go straight to the support of the community and people across the world who would love to help a good business get great!! People helping is people is pretty cool.

Risks and Challenges

California is the epicenter of the artisan food business. I was able to start my business because of the California’s Cottage Food industry program. However, the challenge for new  artisan producers making high end quality products is how to scale up at an affordable cost, which is why many of the current small commercial kitchens for lease allow entrepreneurs to share space for rent by the hour. Cottage Food businesses are also restricted to making less than $50,000 annually in sales.

Also, regulatory requirements have complicated the transition from selling goods at local retail shops to distributing them wholesale to large grocery store chains (like Wholefoods or Trader Joe’s). Wholsale buyers have stricter health standards than local retailers, requiring significant upfront investment by small batch artisans.

In the issue of  sharing a commercial kitchen, you are more susceptible to the cleanliness of others sharing the kitchen and the possible loss and/or disappearance of inventory and an expensive endeavor without much control. 

With that said, we understand that there will be many challenges as with any business in the growth stages. We are confident in our product(s) that we will be successful in this journey and will be transparent through this process ad reach our sales goals. 

COOKIES MAKE PEOPLE HAPPY !!!

Funding will go to

Inventory for scaling up

A larger mixer

A small refridgerator

Storage Supplies

License and fees/other cost for maintaining health code kitchen

New Hire(s)

Any new city or state certifications and insurance

Samples and demos for new accounts

Introducing new products, labels, etc.

Sales and Distribution

Marketing and PR

SPREADING THE WORD !!! 

Our funding goals initially are to raise $10,000 to complete the above mission and then a stretch goal of $25,000 when it is time to move to a commercial kitchen, provide delivery to serve multiple accounts, and attend food shows to get in front of major retailers.

**Updates to perks, videos and store demos will be on the gallery page.

***NOTICE****
WE WILL BE DOING A SAMPLE TASTING  AT FARMSHOP IN BRENTWOOD, CA AT THE BRENTWOOD COUNTRY MART ON AUGUST 2ND STARTING AT 11AM!! SO COME AN MEET ME AND TASTE OUR COOKIES!!!

With that said, we understand that there will be many challenges as with any business in the growth stages. We are confident in our product(s) that we will be successful in this journey and will be transparent through this process ad reach our sales goals. 

COOKIES MAKE PEOPLE HAPPY !!!


Funding will go to

Inventory for scaling up
A larger mixerA small refridgeratorStorage Supplies
License and fees/other cost for maintaining health code kitchen
New Hire(s)
Any new city or state certifications and insuranceSamples and demos for new accountsIntroducing new products, labels, etc.
Sales and Distribution
Marketing and PR
SPREADING THE WORD !!! 



Our funding goals initially are to raise $10,000 to complete the above mission and then a stretch goal of $25,000 when it is time to move to a commercial kitchen, provide delivery to serve multiple accounts, and attend food shows to get in front of major retailers.
**Updates to perks, videos and store demos will be on the gallery page.***NOTICE****WE WILL BE DOING A SAMPLE TASTING  AT FARMSHOP IN BRENTWOOD, CA AT THE BRENTWOOD COUNTRY MART ON AUGUST 2ND STARTING AT 11AM!! SO COME AN MEET ME AND TASTE OUR COOKIES!!!

story:
Short Summary

The QUIDNON project aims to make kits available for DIY construction of a very versatile houseboat: a tiny house that is also a sailboat. It will measure 36 feet by 16 feet and combine high-tech kit production techniques and rapid, low-tech DIY assembly.

I have been living aboard with my family and sailing the Eastern Seaboard of the US for the last decade. QUIDNON's design incorporates hundreds of design features hard-won through my personal experience.

Two years ago I came up with this project, put my thoughts together on a blog and started gathering feedback and suggestions from other experienced live-aboards and custom boat-builders.

A year ago two other engineers joined the cause. We have put together a detailed 3D model of the design and built and tested a radio-controlled scale model. The tests went extremely well, with no surprises except for how well the model sailed.

We are now ready to build the first full-scale hull. So far we have been donating our time to the project and using free or donated software. But for the next step we have to buy software licenses, tools, other resources and specialized expertise.

What We Need & What You Get

We need to be able to license software, pay for access to equipment and for workshop space, engage a marine architect to review and approve the design, and buy the materials needed to complete and equip the first hull. If there is money left over, we will compensate ourselves, but what we want out of this process is QUIDNONS—for ourselves and for whoever wants one. We want to make QUIDNON kits available for delivery in 2018.

The Impact

Given the high rents and real estate prices, living aboard is a major lifehack—something that can help people, especially young families, to live well and stay out of debt. But most boats are not designed with that in mind, but for sport or luxury. QUIDNON combines a roomy interior, rugged construction and sailing ability in a single affordable package. All of the assembly and construction can be done DIY by moderately skilled people. The boat comes as a kit that comes together like a piece of IKEA furniture and can be put together quickly near a beach or a riverbank barn-raising style and then launched by pushing it to the water.

Risks & Challenges

The technical risks for this project are minimal because the construction technique (fiberglass over plywood) has been extensively tested and because this design has already been tested out in software simulation and on a radio-controlled scale model. The biggest risk is that the funds we raise will be insufficient to complete and test the first hull later this year and the project will move forward more slowly than we are planning. At an absolute minimum we will produce the data needed to fabricate kits and will self-finance the construction of the first hull.
