story:
WHAT MAKES TRIDO® UNIQUE?

It comes down to these things:

Your imagination isn't limited, so why should your creations be?

 

For TridoⓇ we utilize multiple powerful neodymium magnets on each side of each shape.

 

TRIDO® IN THE MEDIA

 

IS TRIDO® FOR CHILDREN OR ADULTS?

YES and YES! 

TRIDO is a toy for all ages, perfect for any number of uses, including fidgeting, relaxation, idea boosting, and playtime. You can play with TRIDO on your own or in a group, and you can even invent your own TRIDO uses. For example imagine playing magnetic Jenga with it!

The play is not just essential for kids; it can be an important source of relaxation and stimulation for adults as well. Playing is a sure and fun way to fuel your imagination, creativity, problem-solving abilities, abstract thinking and emotional well-being.

TRIDO will unleash the world of 3D geometry right before your very eyes. 

Children can explore concepts in science, geometry and math, while they develop motor skills, reasoning, and dimensional and spatial thinking. But most importantly, they'll have fun while doing it. 

 
You can always find your own way to play with TRIDO as we assume there are plenty of amusement things we haven’t thought about.
 
 
 
Creating stuff with TridoⓇ is easy and satisfying
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Put it in your room as an element of decoration.
 
 
 
Have fun sticking it to some iron objects.
 
 
Or just get it with your coffee :) 
 
 
Anyone can create spectacular looking shapes with a few snaps and will simply have no time to get bored.
 

 

Half-Tetrahedron unlike other shapes has different faces and brings great diversity to TridoⓇ.

 

Having a stressful day and need a moment to relax or to do something with your hands? Keep a set of TRIDO with you.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
We've paid special attention to choosing colours and balancing Octa/Tetra/Half-Tetra ratio to make sure that Trido is optimized for play. Small, Medium, Large.
 

 

 

 

PLEASE SUPPORT US

We have come to you, for help raising £11000. This start-up capital will cover the costs of manufacturing TRIDO on a wider scale and then marketing and distributing our product. We want to take TRIDO on the road, introducing this toy at shows and conventions everywhere. In order to do so effectively, however, we need all the help we can get. 

Even if you cannot donate at this time, you can show your support by sharing this campaign with friends and family who might like some TRIDO of their very own.

story:
NexVidea's co-founders have a combined 40+ years in technology ideation, development, commercialization, and management across multiple industries.

    We're doing everything we can to de-risk production and market success for this exciting new mobile lifestyle product and give your smartphone the companion it deserves. We have developed multiple working prototypes, like the second-generation, working prototype featured on this site.

    We need YOUR help to move OLLI into mass production.

    We have already engaged multiple factories to procure and produce the components necessary for the production of the OLLI. Each process and component is manufactured and assembled on a proven assembly line, by an experienced technical team.

    OLLI will be fully-certified for sale and distribution in the United States and Canada — including F.C.C. (US), I.C. (Canada), BC-CEC & UN38.3 (Battery), and California Proposition 65 (Environmental Compliance).

    Ongoing age and functionality testing will be performed by our quality control team, according to an industry standard test plan — ensuring that each and every OLLI that ships will function as intended and expected.

    Warehousing and fulfillment will be managed by our logistics partner, Amazon, via their trusted Amazon FBA distribution network.

    As a true measure of our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction, NexVidea will be offering our backers a 6-month, limited warranty on every OLLI received for pledging to our campaign.

    Lastly, should any unforeseen delays in production or shipping arise, we will proactively provide updates and keep you well informed all the way.

    Questions? Comments? Concerns? Don't hesitate to contact us at olli@nexvidea.com.

     

    Over the past 24 months, NexVidea has invested in product research and development, industrial design, patent and trademark filing, multiple working prototypes, and marketing content necessary to get OLLI ready for our North American campaign on Indiegogo.

    Now we're looking for your support to get OLLI to market and make your mobile life as rich and rewarding as it should be. We can't do this without your help!

    Funds raised during our campaign will help us defray project costs associated with: 

    • Factory tooling
    • Packaging design and development 
    • Initial manufacturing runs

     

    Even if you're not in a position to claim a perk and pre-order your OLLI today, you can still help us achieve our campaign goals. 

    Use Indiegogo's share tools below on your smartphone (or at the top of this page on your desktop) to help us spread the word about our campaign.

    And we'd love it if you would include the hashtag #getOLLI  in all of your posts, tweets, and other social shares so we can stay tuned in on all of your enthusiasm and support.

    We greatly appreciate your believing in and joining us on the journey of OLLI! 
     

     

     

    An OLLI second-generation, working factory prototype (P2) is featured throughout this website.

    OLLI is shown holding an Apple® iPhone® 7 Plus. Apple®, iPhone®, FaceTime®, and Siri® are trademarks of Apple, Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries.


    Smartphone is not included with the OLLI powered smartphone valet.

    Skype® is a trademark of Microsoft, Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries.

story:
Irepasse

The Irepasse is the first ironing robot for your home. Finally, why use a dryer and an iron when the Irepasse can do it for you! If you hate to iron, you will love the Irepasse.

Pants & Shirts:


-  Dries & irons simultaneously

-  Fabric protection

-  More free time for yourself

-  Effortless

Irepasse Components:



FAQ


What does Irepasse do?

  The Irepasse simultaneously dries and irons shirts, polo shirts, sweatshirts, T-shirts, shorts, skirts, pants, jeans, jackets, coats & many more. The Irepasse can accommodate sizes XS to XXL for tops and sizes 26 to 50 for bottoms. It works with almost all fabrics; cotton, linen, flannel, silk, mixed cotton-polyester & many more, excluding mesh wool.

  It works for different style shirts; long-sleeve, short or long neck with Italian, French, semi Francese, button down or Korean. It even works on cuffs & collared shirts, capable of most types of fabrics and able to maintain longer unaltered fibers.

How does Irepasse work?

  It only takes a few seconds! Place your wet garment after spin cycleon the appropriate inflatable bust or legs (supplied by Irepasse), arrange the central tensor and start up your Irepasse to inflate with hot air. A quick check that your garment is properly placed and the Irepasse will do the rest!

  Within minutes the hot air will dry the fabric as well as keeping the garment taut, making your clothes ready to be worn or put in the closet.

Why is Irepasse so important?

  -Millions of people in the world hate to iron!

  -You have enough household chores!!

  -More free time for you!

  -Effortless!

  -Save money! No need to take your clothes to the Dry Cleaners or hire a maid!

-Environmental! Irepasse uses only air, no treatments, no chemicals & they are  100% recyclable!

-Fabric protection! Irepasse gently dries and irons at a temperature no higher then 55°C; 131°F. This allows the fibers in the fabric to last longer, unlike the stress of a hot iron of up to 200°C; 392°F.

-Free from weather conditions! Rain, cold, humid means longer drying time (up to 24hrs) and if you live in the city, your clothes may smell like smog from long drying times. Rain or shine Irepasse has quick drying times!

-Comfort of wearing your garment dried & ironed after just a few minutes, compared to the traditional time of drying on a clothes line (must have room), then get the out the iron (need more room)!

-Eliminate the risk of harm to humans and garments produced by the use of ironing. Such as those relating to the folds, glossy reflections, buttons ruined, burns to garments & humans, especially children. 

-Puts life back into your garments with vertical ironing & drying!

-Irepasse, thanks to their practicality, is also used as a fan heater with heat diffusion of 360 degrees.

How fast does Irepasse work?

  Shirts: Between 7 to 12 minutes*

  Pants: Between 10-15 minutes*

* Average time may vary depending on fabric type & dampness.

More detailed feature information.

230V 50Hz monophase or 110V 60hz

1500 watt

Dimensions: cm 26x35x120; inch 10.2”x13.7”x47.24”

Weight: 6.5 kg; 14.33lb

The materials and components used have been studied to ensure maximum strength and durability.

The motor is designed for a duration exceeding 100,000 continuously dried & ironed shirts. The special plastic used is fiber reinforced glass and equipped with a higher level self-extinguishing (VO).

The inflatable bust and legs consist of a special fabric treatment to obtain the best adhesion to the wet garment and resistance to the temperature they undergo.

The Irepasse is equipped with a dual thermal security system that allows a temperature control (maximum of 65 °C; 149°F).

What is the warranty for Irepasse?

The Irepasse comes with a 5 year warranty!

Our manufactures in Europe have 50 years experience.

The appliance promotes a policy of the product as opposed to the process of trivialization and loss of quality of household appliances in Italy, which derives from the relocation of the production to countries with cheap labor and not fully protected with the results of a decrease in purchases in the medium to long term, even at the appliance stores.

For these reasons and to guarantee the quality ‘Made in Italy’ have chosen to buy the components from major companies in Europe, keeping production in Italy, double checking each product (the first at the end of the assembly and the second during final assessment called ‘total quality’) Irepasse will include a 5 year limited warranty and one year for professional.

Where can Irepasse be shipped?

We will ship worldwide.

Please select either: Irepasse 230V 50HZ or Irepasse 110V 60HZ

When will Irepasse ship?

We expect to ship Irepasse 230V by Febuary 2016 and Irepasse 110V by July 2016

Who are we?

Rodolphe Herblot, president of AHT DIFF SARL since 1999.

Since Rodolphe needed shirts for work, yet his wife hated to iron, he developed the Irepasse, the ironing robot for your home. It has the same kind of system the professionals use but without the heavy weight (20 to 180kg), the bulky size or the huge price tag ($2000)! Rodolphe wondered why there wasn’t a residential ironing robot in existence. The community spoke, as well as his wife, he listened and now he is launching the product to the Indiegogo Community, a group of early adopters who see into the future of technology, with hopes of making this product as popular as the washing machine.

Why are we doing an Indiegogo crowd funding campaign?

We know that the best way to find out if people really want a product is the give them the chance to buy it. Crowd funding on Indiegogo gives us the opportunity to validate that the product matches the needs of the market before we produce hundreds of thousands of them.

How to contact us.

If you have any questions feels free to contact us on our website at www.irepasse.com

Why does Irepasse need your support?

To help bring Irepasse to the market, we are seeking to raise funds that will help us launch into full-scale production.

Indiegogo is the only place in the world that you can buy an Irepasse right now.

Ordering today helps us kick start our production and in return you will be the first to get your Irepasse robot!!

Most importantly, we need you help to spread the word! If we can get more people to know about our ironing robot, we can continue to develop and improve upon it, given the feedback we receive from our consumers!

                                                                irepasse

our consumers!                                                                irepasse

story:
A wedding is a memorable and cherished event and for years has warranted large celebrations of families as they became one. We also wanted to follow this tradition as true believers of marriage and the pledge before God. We planned and budgeted for what we thought would cover our cost, little did we know weddings are more costly than most people plan for.

As we approach our special day on April 25th we have paid many of the costs ourselves and are still in a large need of assistance. We figured who better to ask than friends, family, community and those who are generous at heart and able to contribute where needed. We are truly blessed already and grateful for every penny donated.

story:
End the Pain of Picking Paint Colors

The average homeowner spends over 3 months choosing a paint color! Our product saves you time, money and the hassle associated with picking the perfect color for your home. We aim to provide valuable interior design advice to do-it-yourselfers and homeowners looking for convenience.

What people say about Tinted...

"I had bought over 12 samples and painted areas of my room prior to having the Home Color Package consult. I could not even pick ONE color that I liked. I purchased the paint color suggested in the package and it was PERFECT."
- Early Customer

 

“I received my tinted package today and was super excited and just ripped it open” @Saradolll

 

"These paint chips are actually huge!!" @Brookejanette

 

 

Why Tinted?

How Tinted Works

 

 

Add on Perk

Home Decor Colors

We can help with more than just paint! Our tool can select the perfect coordinating colors for your furniture, rugs, drapery, pillows, accessories, and more.

 

3X Stretch Goal

Peal and Stick Paint Samples

If we can reach 3 times our funding goal we will be able to replace our paint sheets with peel and stick adhesive stickers. This feature should be available in the future when our operations have scaled to higher volumes.

Awards and Partners

 

What people say about Tinted...

"I had bought over 12 samples and painted areas of my room prior to having the Home Color Package consult. I could not even pick ONE color that I liked. I purchased the paint color suggested in the package and it was PERFECT."
- Early Customer

 

 

“I received my tinted package today and was super excited and just ripped it open” @Saradolll

 

 

 

"These paint chips are actually huge!!" @Brookejanette

story:
What we love and what we do.

We love nature. We love the wild. We love gardening. We love good stuff. And we want to combine all that in a little box for you to enjoy at home and in your garden.

We curate seed mixtures “to go” focused on native plants growing all around us in the wild - beautiful seed mixtures inspired by nature.

In addition to our seed boxes, we design and create new high quality products that make our lives easier by assisting us in the garden and/or outdoor world.

Was wir lieben und was wir tun.

Wir lieben die Natur. Wir lieben die Wildnis. Wir lieben das Gärtnern. Wir lieben gute Sachen. Und wir wollen all dies in einer kleinen Schachtel für dich und dein Zuhause kombinieren. Wir selektieren und kombinieren unterschiedliche Saatgutmischungen "to go" mit einem Fokus auf einheimischen Pflanzen, die um uns herum in der Wildnis wachsen - einfach schöne Saatmischungen, die von der Natur inspiriert wurden.

Zusätzlich zu unseren Saatgutboxen entwerfen und kreieren wir neue qualitativ hochwertige Produkte, die unser Leben leichter machen, indem sie uns im Garten und / oder Outdoor unterstützen.

SLOW CONTENT in a TAKE AWAY BOX?

The irony of life.

Our take away seed box expresses the irony of our convenient and fast-paced lives – contrary to fast-food in take-out boxes, the content of our seed boxes requires patience and time in order to value and enjoy the results. We want to create awareness that great things take time and to remind us to SLOW DOWN A LITTLE.

We are "hungry" for a connection with nature – aren’t you? Why not take a little piece of nature home - our seed boxes will do just that!

SLOW CONTENT in einer TAKE AWAY BOX? Die Ironie des Lebens.

Unsere Samenbox "to go" drückt die Ironie unseres bequemen und schnelllebigen Lebens aus - im Gegensatz zu Fast-Food in Take-Away-Boxen erfordert der Inhalt unserer Samenbox Geduld und Zeit, um die Ergebnisse zu schätzen und zu genießen. Wir wollen ein Bewusstsein schaffen, dass große Dinge Zeit brauchen und uns daran erinnern, alles etwas LANGSAMER ANGEHEN ZU LASSEN.

Wir sind "hungrig" auf eine Verbindung mit der Natur - du auch? Warum nicht ein kleines Stück Natur mit nach Hause nehmen - unsere Samenboxen machen genau das!

What is in the Forest Treasure Box?

Included in our fantastic Forest Treasure Seed Box are three separate germ-protected sachets with wild garlic, wild strawberries and woodruff. Enclosed are three beautifully and with love designed leaflets with comprehensive plant instructions, tips, recipe suggestions and traditional medicinal use, available in German or English. For more information see our awesome perks!

Saatgut Box Wald Schätze “to go". Was ist drin?

In unserer fantastischen Saatgut Box Wald Schätze befinden sich drei separate, keimgeschützte Beutelchen mit Bärlauch, wilden Erdbeeren und Waldmeister Samen. Zusätzlich sind drei schöne und mit Liebe gestaltete Infoblätter mit umfangreichen Pflanzanleitungen, Tipps, Rezeptvorschläge und traditionelle medizinische Verwendungen der Pflanzen beigelegt. Erhältlich in Deutsch und Englisch. Für mehr Produktinformation seht Euch weiter unten unsere super coolen "Perks/ Geschenke"  an. 

Advantages Forest Treasure Box.

  • 3 packets of seeds (germ-protected sachets) 
  • Wild plants are not only beautiful but also more robust, diverse, and once established, require less maintenance than conventional plants
  • They provide food for us and animals
  • Wild plants are perfectly adapted to our climate
  • By sowing these seeds you contribute to plant conservation
  • Comes with recipes, tips and traditional medicinal use

Vorteile der Saatgut Box Wald Schätze.

  • 3 Samenpäckchen in Keimschutzbeuteln
  • Wildpflanzen sind nicht nur schön, sondern auch robuster, vielfältig und einmal etabliert, erfordern sie weniger Pflege als herkömmliche Pflanzen
  • Sie haben traditionellen und medizinischen Wert
  • Sie bieten Nahrung für uns und Tiere
  • Wildpflanzen sind perfekt auf unser Klima abgestimmt
  • Durch die Aussaat dieser Samen trägst du zur Pflanzenerhaltung bei
  • Mit Rezepten, Tipps und Infos zu traditionellen medizinischen Gebräuchen

Sustainability.

WALD & Co is donating 5% of the income of the Forest Treasure Seed Box to Botanic Gardens Conservation International (BGCI). BGCI is working to conserve plant diversity worldwide and tackle the threats that are endangering the survival of many species. Our first milestone is to sponsor a seed collecting expedition as part of BGCI’s Global Seed Conservation Challenge. We still need to sell 2000 of our Forest Treasure Seed Boxes! Please support us to reach our first milestone! 

Nachhaltigkeit.

Wald & Co spendet 5% des Einkommens aus dem Verkauf der Saatgutmischungen an Botanic Gardens Conservation International (BGCI). BGCI arbeitet daran, die Pflanzenvielfalt weltweit zu bewahren und die Bedrohungen zu bewältigen, die das Überleben vieler Arten gefährden. Unser erster Meilenstein ist es, eine Expedition für Samensammlung als Teil der BGCI Global Seed Conservation Challenge zu sponsern. Wir müssen noch 2000 von unseren Saatgut Boxen Wald Schätze verkaufen! Bitte unterstützen Sie uns dabei den ersten Meilenstein zu erreichen!

Our Vision and why we need your help.

“We want to bring back a little wilderness into our gardens in an authentic and sustainable way by reconnecting with nature through an assortment of wild plants.”

  • There are hundreds of wonderful native plants growing all around us in the wild and we want to curate more collection boxes of plant communities for various regions, soils and light conditions.
  • We need to pre-order seeds well in advance because most plants are cultivated on demand and we want to ensure their availability. After all, seeds are not an unlimited resource.
  • From each sold seed box we want to donate and amount to the BGCI charity - this means we still need to sell approximately 2000 boxes to reach our first sustainability milestone: to sponsor a seed collecting expedition !
  • We want to showcase and promote our products at fairs and exhibitions which involve high set up costs.
  • We want to customize and optimize the packaging of our products to limit waste. This is only possible and affordable if we order in larger quantities. 
  • Help us obtain the European Organic label! Although we already purchase organic seeds where available, we need to get verified in order to use the European organic label. 

Unsere Vision und warum wir Eure Hilfe brauchen.

"Wir wollen die Wildnis auf einer authentischen und nachhaltigen Art und Weise zurück in unsere Gärten bringen, indem wir wieder eine Verbindung mit der Natur durch eine besondere Auswahl an Wildpflanzen herstellen."

  • Es gibt Hunderte von wunderbaren einheimischen Pflanzen die um uns herum in der Natur wachsen und wir wollen mehr Saatgutboxen mit Samenmischungen für verschiedene Regionen, Böden und Lichtverhältnisse herstellen.
  • Wir müssen die Samen im Voraus vorbestellen, da die meisten Pflanzen auf Anfrage gezüchtet werden und wir ihre Verfügbarkeit sichern wollen. Immerhin sind Samen keine unbegrenzte Ressource.
  • Hilf uns dabei das europäische Bio-Label zu erhalten! Obwohl wir bereits Bio-Samen kaufen, müssen wir, um das europäische Bio-Label zu verwenden, zertifiziert werden.
  • Von jeder verkauften Saatgutbox wollen wir einen Betrag an die BGCI spenden - das bedeutet, dass wir noch ca. 2000 Boxen verkaufen müssen, um unseren ersten Nachhaltigkeits-Meilenstein zu erreichen - eine Saatgut-Expedition zu sponsern!
  • Wir wollen unsere Produkte auf Messen und Ausstellungen präsentieren, die leider mit hohen Einrichtungskosten verbunden sind.
  • Wir wollen die Verpackung unserer Produkte anpassen und optimieren, um den Verpackungsabfall zu minimieren. Dies ist nur möglich und erschwinglich, wenn wir in größeren Mengen bestellen.​

Our Perks.

Have a look at our awesome Perks! Give a Gift. Buy for Yourself. Pre-Order Now.

 

Forest Treasure Seed Box "to go".

Included in our fantastic Forest Treasure Seed Box "to go" are three separate germ-protected sachets with wild garlic, wild strawberries and woodruff. Enclosed are three beautifully and with love designed leaflets with comprehensive plant instructions, tips, recipe suggestions and traditional medicinal use, available in German or English.

Saatgut Box Wald Schätze “to go".

In unserer fantastischen Saatgut Box Wald Schätze befinden sich drei separate, keimgeschützte Beutelchen mit Bärlauch, wilden Erdbeeren und Waldmeister Samen. Beiliegend sind drei schöne und mit Liebe gestaltete Infoblätter mit umfangreichen Pflanzanleitungen, Tipps, Rezeptvorschläge und traditionelle medizinische Verwendungen der Pflanzen.

 

NI:LA.

The outdoor allrounder cushion NI:LA was originally developed by WALD & Co founder Sonja to seed and plant large planters that were situated on a building site covered with rough and hard ground.

“I couldn’t find anything that satisfied my expectations. I just wanted something that is highly durable, supports my bodyweight and knees and looks like new after I dragged it over the rubble.”

We tested this cushion for over 2 years and love the quality and various uses. That’s why we want to offer NI:LA as an extra perk to assist the seeding and caring of the Forest Treasure Seed Box or any other outdoor work/ activity. NI:LA – one that comforts all.

"Sustainable, because it just lasts!"

NI:LA.

Das Outdoor-Allrounder-Kissen NI: LA wurde ursprünglich von Wald & Co-Gründerin Sonja entwickelt, um große Pflanzen auf einer Baustelle mit rauhem und hartem Boden zu säen und zu pflanzen. "Ich konnte nichts finden, dass meine Ansprüche erfüllt hat.

"Ich wollte einfach etwas, dass sehr haltbar ist, mein Körpergewicht und Knie unterstützt und immer noch wie neu aussieht, nachdem ich es durch den Schmutz gezogen habe.”

Wir testen dieses Kissen seit über 2 Jahren und lieben die Qualität und die verschiedenen Einsatzmöglichkeiten. Aus diesem Grund wollen wir NI: LA als kleinen Anreiz anbieten, um die Aussaat und Pflege der Seed Box oder einer anderen Outdoor-Arbeit / Aktivität zu unterstützen. NI: LA - one that comforts all.

"Nachhaltig, weil es einfach hält !"

 

A1 Wall Calendar 2018.

One would think we are old-fashioned in today’s digital world by offering a wall calendar. But how often are you on your phone in the office and need a quick overview of all your appointments at one glance? Furthermore, we haven’t actually seen a wall calendar that makes an office space a little greener: so we created one! We want this to be a true international and multi-cultural calendar – suitable for everyone in the world. That’s why we haven’t included any bank holidays. The calendar is in English and shows the work weeks. The calendar is A1 sized and printed on 170g/m2 recycled and Blue Angel labelled paper.

A1 Wandkalender 2018.

Man würde denken, dass wir in der heutigen digitalen Welt altmodisch sind, indem wir einen Wandkalender anbieten. Aber wie oft ist man im Büro am Telefon und braucht einen schnellen Überblick über alle Termine? Ausserdem haben wir noch keinen Wandkalender gesehen, der eine Bürofläche etwas grüner macht - deswegen haben wir einen entworfen! Wir wollen, dass dies ein echter internationaler und multikultureller Kalender ist - der für jeden auf der Welt geeignet ist. Deshalb werden keine Feiertage angezeigt. Der Kalender ist auf Englisch und bildet die Arbeitswochen ab. Der Kalender ist auf 170g/m2 recyceltem Blauer Engel Papier gedruckt.

 

Corporate: Small package

You value your employees and customers? You want to have a sustainable, unique, cool & trendy GIVE AWAY for your special employees and clients? Look not further for a corporate GIVE AWAY of our Forest Treasure Seed Box "to go". Individualize your 150 FOREST TREASURE BOXES "to go" with customized design to your requirements and your company logo!

BE UNIQUE!

Corporate: Be our STAR SUPPORTER

You think BIG? So do we! You want to have a sustainable, unique, cool & trendy GIVE AWAY for your special employees and clients? You want to support a start-up? You want to be our STAR SUPPORTER on our front Indiegogo page? Look no further. We design the 5000 FOREST TREASURE SEED BOXES "to go" to your requirements and with your own company logo. 

BE UNIQUE!

You are a re- seller?

You would like to re- sell our products? We look forward hearing from you. 

Sie sind Wiederverkäufer?

Sie möchten unsere Produkte verkaufen? Wir freuen uns von Ihnen zu hören. 

Our History. 

With a particular affinity for forests and wild spaces, we started the Blog “WALD & Co” (Wald meaning forest in German) a few years ago. Blogging with the philosophy “take a little piece of forest home” we write about harvesting plants and fruits from the forest and share recipes. After visiting several public and private gardens and parks, we noticed that strangely most gardens bear little resemblance to nature.

It was then a natural progression to create the seed box FOREST TREASURES, which takes our philosophy literally by taking a piece of forest home. Our first seed collection box contains, according to us, the real treasures of our forests: woodruff, wild strawberries and wild garlic. The plants and fruits not only look pretty, but they can also be used in various recipes and have traditional medicinal values. We looked around us and got inspired by nature to curate this special seed collection with plants that grow naturally within close vicinity.

"We strongly believe that nature has a positive balancing impact upon us".  

Unsere Geschichte. 

Mit einer besonderen Affinität zu Wäldern und der Natur haben wir vor einigen Jahren den Blog "Wald & Co” begonnen. Auf dem Blog mit der Philosophie "hol dir ein kleines Stückchen Wald nach Hause " schreiben wir u.a. über die Ernte von Pflanzen und Früchten aus dem Wald und teilen Rezepte. Nach dem Besuch von mehreren öffentlichen und privaten Gärten und Parks, bemerkten wir, dass die meisten Gärten wenig Ähnlichkeit mit der Natur haben.

Es war dann für uns selbstverständlich die Samenbox WALDSCHÄTZE zu kreieren, die unsere Philosophie buchstäblich übernimmt: hol dir ein Stückchen Wald nach Hause. Unsere erste Saatgut-Box enthält für uns die wahren Schätze unserer Wälder: Waldmeister, wilde Erdbeeren und Bärlauch. Die Pflanzen und Früchte sehen nicht nur schön aus, sondern können auch in verschiedenen Rezepten verwendet werden und haben traditionelle Heilwerte. Wir sahen uns um und wurden von der Natur inspiriert um diese spezielle Saatgutmischung zu entwickeln.

"Wir glauben fest daran, dass die Natur einen positiven Einfluss auf uns hat."

Our references.

Mother nature !

Unsere Referenzen.

Mutter Natur !

Our Seeds.

We completely avoid collecting seeds from plants growing in the wild as it can severely deplete the natural seed bank. Our seeds come from well-established and respectable seed suppliers where wild flowers are cultivated for seed collection purposes. We want to become fully organic where possible.

Unser Saatgut.

Wir vermeiden das Sammeln von Samen von Pflanzen, die in der Wildnis wachsen, da sich sonst die natürliche Samenbank stark abbauen würde. Unser Saatgut kommt von etablierten und respektablen Saatgutlieferanten, die wilde Blumen für die Saatguternte anbauen. Wir wollen möglichst biologisch-zertifizierte Samen verwenden.

Risks and Challenges.

WALD & Co is just at the beginning of creating a range of seed collections and products. There is always an issue with the availability of seeds. They are not an endless resource.  The WALD & Co collection among a multitude of growers remains a challenge, however, we anticipate that we will be able to collect and process enough seeds to meet all the pledged products. 

Risiken und Herausforderungen.

Wald & Co ist gerade am Anfang eine Reihe von Saatgutmischungen und Produkte zu entwerfen. Es gibt immer Herausforderungen mit der Verfügbarkeit der Samen. Sie sind keine endlose Ressource. Die Wald & Co-Kollektion unter einer Vielzahl von Lieferanten bleibt eine Herausforderung, aber wir gehen davon aus, dass wir in der Lage sein werden, genügend Samen zu erhalten und zu verarbeiten, um alle versprochenen Produkte liefern zu können.

How can you help.

  • After making a contribution and getting one of our awesome perks, you can help by inviting your friends, family and peers by sharing our campaign. 
  • Please back the project and tell everyone know to help spread the word!
  • Thank You so much your support - We Hope You'll Join us in Making this Project Successful!

Wie könnt Ihr uns helfen?

Nachdem Du dieses Projekt unterstützt hast oder eines unserer großartigen Perks/Geschenke bestellt hast, kannst Du uns helfen, indem Du Deinen Freunden, Familie und Kollegen über diese Kampagne erzählst oder unsere Kampagne in Deinen sozialen Netzwerken teilst.

Bitte unterstütze das Projekt und sage es allen die Du kennst!

Vielen Dank für Deine liebe Unterstützung - wir hoffen, dass Du uns dabei helfen kannst, unsere Ziele zu erreichen und dieses Projekt zum Leben zu erwecken.

​

About us.

Sonja Kalkschmidt grew up in the country side and comes from a family with a farming history. She started her career at the age of 12 by building several tree houses. Following her passions, she became an architect with a particular interest in green roofing and integrating vertical plants internally and externally.

Sonja worked around the globe on some of the largest projects in the world, managing contractors and consultants for external works and internal planting schemes. Later on she worked for a company that develops, constructs and manages tourist destinations worldwide.

Leaving the cooperate world behind, Sonja moved back to the German country side living right in the heart of three wonderful natural landscapes: the Black Forest, the Swabian Alps and Lake Constance. Here she explores her surroundings and the beauty of nature to observe, investigate and curate natural plant compositions for you to enjoy. Inspired by nature.

THANK YOU to the lovely people who helped & supported us in the making.

We would like to say thank you to companies, followers, friends and families who have helped to shape WALD & Co! Thank you so much for believing in and supporting our vision. Your ideas, feedback, and support have allowed us to make this idea real, and we’re so excited to be on this journey.

Thank YOU!

DANKE an die netten Menschen, die uns auf unserer Reise geholfen und unterstützt haben!

Wir danken unseren Follower, die Wald & Co geholfen haben und den Unternehmen und unseren Familien und Freunden, die an unsere Idee glaubten und diese unterstützten. Eure Ideen, Feedback und Unterstützung haben uns erlaubt, diese Idee Wirklichkeit zu machen, und wir freuen uns auf dieses neue Abenteuer.

Danke!

Unser erster Meilenstein ist es, eine Expedition für Samensammlung als Teil der BGCI Global Seed Conservation Challenge zu sponsern. Wir müssen noch 2000 von unseren Saatgut Boxen Wald Schätze verkaufen! Bitte unterstützen Sie uns dabei den ersten Meilenstein zu erreichen!Our Vision and why we need your help.“We want to bring back a little wilderness into our gardens in an authentic and sustainable way by reconnecting with nature through an assortment of wild plants.”
There are hundreds of wonderful native plants growing all around us in the wild and we want to curate more collection boxes of plant communities for various regions, soils and light conditions.
We need to pre-order seeds well in advance because most plants are cultivated on demand and we want to ensure their availability. After all, seeds are not an unlimited resource.
From each sold seed box we want to donate and amount to the BGCI charity - this means we still need to sell approximately 2000 boxes to reach our first sustainability milestone: to sponsor a seed collecting expedition !
We want to showcase and promote our products at fairs and exhibitions which involve high set up costs.
We want to customize and optimize the packaging of our products to limit waste. This is only possible and affordable if we order in larger quantities. 
Help us obtain the European Organic label! Although we already purchase organic seeds where available, we need to get verified in order to use the European organic label. 
Unsere Vision und warum wir Eure Hilfe brauchen."Wir wollen die Wildnis auf einer authentischen und nachhaltigen Art und Weise zurück in unsere Gärten bringen, indem wir wieder eine Verbindung mit der Natur durch eine besondere Auswahl an Wildpflanzen herstellen."
Es gibt Hunderte von wunderbaren einheimischen Pflanzen die um uns herum in der Natur wachsen und wir wollen mehr Saatgutboxen mit Samenmischungen für verschiedene Regionen, Böden und Lichtverhältnisse herstellen.
Wir müssen die Samen im Voraus vorbestellen, da die meisten Pflanzen auf Anfrage gezüchtet werden und wir ihre Verfügbarkeit sichern wollen. Immerhin sind Samen keine unbegrenzte Ressource.
Hilf uns dabei das europäische Bio-Label zu erhalten! Obwohl wir bereits Bio-Samen kaufen, müssen wir, um das europäische Bio-Label zu verwenden, zertifiziert werden.
Von jeder verkauften Saatgutbox wollen wir einen Betrag an die BGCI spenden - das bedeutet, dass wir noch ca. 2000 Boxen verkaufen müssen, um unseren ersten Nachhaltigkeits-Meilenstein zu erreichen - eine Saatgut-Expedition zu sponsern!
Wir wollen unsere Produkte auf Messen und Ausstellungen präsentieren, die leider mit hohen Einrichtungskosten verbunden sind.
Wir wollen die Verpackung unserer Produkte anpassen und optimieren, um den Verpackungsabfall zu minimieren. Dies ist nur möglich und erschwinglich, wenn wir in größeren Mengen bestellen.​

Our Perks.Have a look at our awesome Perks! Give a Gift. Buy for Yourself. Pre-Order Now. Forest Treasure Seed Box "to go".Included in our fantastic Forest Treasure Seed Box "to go" are three separate germ-protected sachets with wild garlic, wild strawberries and woodruff. Enclosed are three beautifully and with love designed leaflets with comprehensive plant instructions, tips, recipe suggestions and traditional medicinal use, available in German or English.Saatgut Box Wald Schätze “to go".In unserer fantastischen Saatgut Box Wald Schätze befinden sich drei separate, keimgeschützte Beutelchen mit Bärlauch, wilden Erdbeeren und Waldmeister Samen. Beiliegend sind drei schöne und mit Liebe gestaltete Infoblätter mit umfangreichen Pflanzanleitungen, Tipps, Rezeptvorschläge und traditionelle medizinische Verwendungen der Pflanzen. NI:LA.The outdoor allrounder cushion NI:LA was originally developed by WALD & Co founder Sonja to seed and plant large planters that were situated on a building site covered with rough and hard ground.“I couldn’t find anything that satisfied my expectations. I just wanted something that is highly durable, supports my bodyweight and knees and looks like new after I dragged it over the rubble.”We tested this cushion for over 2 years and love the quality and various uses. That’s why we want to offer NI:LA as an extra perk to assist the seeding and caring of the Forest Treasure Seed Box or any other outdoor work/ activity. NI:LA – one that comforts all. "Sustainable, because it just lasts!"NI:LA.Das Outdoor-Allrounder-Kissen NI: LA wurde ursprünglich von Wald & Co-Gründerin Sonja entwickelt, um große Pflanzen auf einer Baustelle mit rauhem und hartem Boden zu säen und zu pflanzen. "Ich konnte nichts finden, dass meine Ansprüche erfüllt hat."Ich wollte einfach etwas, dass sehr haltbar ist, mein Körpergewicht und Knie unterstützt und immer noch wie neu aussieht, nachdem ich es durch den Schmutz gezogen habe.”Wir testen dieses Kissen seit über 2 Jahren und lieben die Qualität und die verschiedenen Einsatzmöglichkeiten. Aus diesem Grund wollen wir NI: LA als kleinen Anreiz anbieten, um die Aussaat und Pflege der Seed Box oder einer anderen Outdoor-Arbeit / Aktivität zu unterstützen. NI: LA - one that comforts all."Nachhaltig, weil es einfach hält !"

 
A1 Wall Calendar 2018.
One would think we are old-fashioned in today’s digital world by offering a wall calendar. But how often are you on your phone in the office and need a quick overview of all your appointments at one glance? Furthermore, we haven’t actually seen a wall calendar that makes an office space a little greener: so we created one! We want this to be a true international and multi-cultural calendar – suitable for everyone in the world. That’s why we haven’t included any bank holidays. The calendar is in English and shows the work weeks. The calendar is A1 sized and printed on 170g/m2 recycled and Blue Angel labelled paper.
A1 Wandkalender 2018.
Man würde denken, dass wir in der heutigen digitalen Welt altmodisch sind, indem wir einen Wandkalender anbieten. Aber wie oft ist man im Büro am Telefon und braucht einen schnellen Überblick über alle Termine? Ausserdem haben wir noch keinen Wandkalender gesehen, der eine Bürofläche etwas grüner macht - deswegen haben wir einen entworfen! Wir wollen, dass dies ein echter internationaler und multikultureller Kalender ist - der für jeden auf der Welt geeignet ist. Deshalb werden keine Feiertage angezeigt. Der Kalender ist auf Englisch und bildet die Arbeitswochen ab. Der Kalender ist auf 170g/m2 recyceltem Blauer Engel Papier gedruckt.

 
Corporate: Small package
You value your employees and customers? You want to have a sustainable, unique, cool & trendy GIVE AWAY for your special employees and clients? Look not further for a corporate GIVE AWAY of our Forest Treasure Seed Box "to go". Individualize your 150 FOREST TREASURE BOXES "to go" with customized design to your requirements and your company logo!
BE UNIQUE!

Corporate: Be our STAR SUPPORTER
You think BIG? So do we! You want to have a sustainable, unique, cool & trendy GIVE AWAY for your special employees and clients? You want to support a start-up? You want to be our STAR SUPPORTER on our front Indiegogo page? Look no further. We design the 5000 FOREST TREASURE SEED BOXES "to go" to your requirements and with your own company logo. 
BE UNIQUE!



You are a re- seller?
You would like to re- sell our products? We look forward hearing from you. 

Sie sind Wiederverkäufer?
Sie möchten unsere Produkte verkaufen? Wir freuen uns von Ihnen zu hören. 


Our History. 
With a particular affinity for forests and wild spaces, we started the Blog “WALD & Co” (Wald meaning forest in German) a few years ago. Blogging with the philosophy “take a little piece of forest home” we write about harvesting plants and fruits from the forest and share recipes. After visiting several public and private gardens and parks, we noticed that strangely most gardens bear little resemblance to nature.It was then a natural progression to create the seed box FOREST TREASURES, which takes our philosophy literally by taking a piece of forest home. Our first seed collection box contains, according to us, the real treasures of our forests: woodruff, wild strawberries and wild garlic. The plants and fruits not only look pretty, but they can also be used in various recipes and have traditional medicinal values. We looked around us and got inspired by nature to curate this special seed collection with plants that grow naturally within close vicinity."We strongly believe that nature has a positive balancing impact upon us".  Unsere Geschichte. Mit einer besonderen Affinität zu Wäldern und der Natur haben wir vor einigen Jahren den Blog "Wald & Co” begonnen. Auf dem Blog mit der Philosophie "hol dir ein kleines Stückchen Wald nach Hause " schreiben wir u.a. über die Ernte von Pflanzen und Früchten aus dem Wald und teilen Rezepte. Nach dem Besuch von mehreren öffentlichen und privaten Gärten und Parks, bemerkten wir, dass die meisten Gärten wenig Ähnlichkeit mit der Natur haben.Es war dann für uns selbstverständlich die Samenbox WALDSCHÄTZE zu kreieren, die unsere Philosophie buchstäblich übernimmt: hol dir ein Stückchen Wald nach Hause. Unsere erste Saatgut-Box enthält für uns die wahren Schätze unserer Wälder: Waldmeister, wilde Erdbeeren und Bärlauch. Die Pflanzen und Früchte sehen nicht nur schön aus, sondern können auch in verschiedenen Rezepten verwendet werden und haben traditionelle Heilwerte. Wir sahen uns um und wurden von der Natur inspiriert um diese spezielle Saatgutmischung zu entwickeln."Wir glauben fest daran, dass die Natur einen positiven Einfluss auf uns hat."
Our references.
Mother nature !
Unsere Referenzen.
Mutter Natur !


Our Seeds.
We completely avoid collecting seeds from plants growing in the wild as it can severely deplete the natural seed bank. Our seeds come from well-established and respectable seed suppliers where wild flowers are cultivated for seed collection purposes. We want to become fully organic where possible.
Unser Saatgut.
Wir vermeiden das Sammeln von Samen von Pflanzen, die in der Wildnis wachsen, da sich sonst die natürliche Samenbank stark abbauen würde. Unser Saatgut kommt von etablierten und respektablen Saatgutlieferanten, die wilde Blumen für die Saatguternte anbauen. Wir wollen möglichst biologisch-zertifizierte Samen verwenden.


Risks and Challenges.WALD & Co is just at the beginning of creating a range of seed collections and products. There is always an issue with the availability of seeds. They are not an endless resource.  The WALD & Co collection among a multitude of growers remains a challenge, however, we anticipate that we will be able to collect and process enough seeds to meet all the pledged products. Risiken und Herausforderungen.Wald & Co ist gerade am Anfang eine Reihe von Saatgutmischungen und Produkte zu entwerfen. Es gibt immer Herausforderungen mit der Verfügbarkeit der Samen. Sie sind keine endlose Ressource. Die Wald & Co-Kollektion unter einer Vielzahl von Lieferanten bleibt eine Herausforderung, aber wir gehen davon aus, dass wir in der Lage sein werden, genügend Samen zu erhalten und zu verarbeiten, um alle versprochenen Produkte liefern zu können.
How can you help.

After making a contribution and getting one of our awesome perks, you can help by inviting your friends, family and peers by sharing our campaign. 
Please back the project and tell everyone know to help spread the word!
Thank You so much your support - We Hope You'll Join us in Making this Project Successful!

Wie könnt Ihr uns helfen?
Nachdem Du dieses Projekt unterstützt hast oder eines unserer großartigen Perks/Geschenke bestellt hast, kannst Du uns helfen, indem Du Deinen Freunden, Familie und Kollegen über diese Kampagne erzählst oder unsere Kampagne in Deinen sozialen Netzwerken teilst.
Bitte unterstütze das Projekt und sage es allen die Du kennst!
Vielen Dank für Deine liebe Unterstützung - wir hoffen, dass Du uns dabei helfen kannst, unsere Ziele zu erreichen und dieses Projekt zum Leben zu erwecken.
​
About us.


Sonja Kalkschmidt grew up in the country side and comes from a family with a farming history. She started her career at the age of 12 by building several tree houses. Following her passions, she became an architect with a particular interest in green roofing and integrating vertical plants internally and externally.
Sonja worked around the globe on some of the largest projects in the world, managing contractors and consultants for external works and internal planting schemes. Later on she worked for a company that develops, constructs and manages tourist destinations worldwide.
Leaving the cooperate world behind, Sonja moved back to the German country side living right in the heart of three wonderful natural landscapes: the Black Forest, the Swabian Alps and Lake Constance. Here she explores her surroundings and the beauty of nature to observe, investigate and curate natural plant compositions for you to enjoy. Inspired by nature.
THANK YOU to the lovely people who helped & supported us in the making.We would like to say thank you to companies, followers, friends and families who have helped to shape WALD & Co! Thank you so much for believing in and supporting our vision. Your ideas, feedback, and support have allowed us to make this idea real, and we’re so excited to be on this journey.Thank YOU!DANKE an die netten Menschen, die uns auf unserer Reise geholfen und unterstützt haben!Wir danken unseren Follower, die Wald & Co geholfen haben und den Unternehmen und unseren Familien und Freunden, die an unsere Idee glaubten und diese unterstützten. Eure Ideen, Feedback und Unterstützung haben uns erlaubt, diese Idee Wirklichkeit zu machen, und wir freuen uns auf dieses neue Abenteuer.Danke!

story:
Food Train are launching a Christmas crowdfunding campaign on Indiegogo.com to help raise £500 for the purchasing of new shopping boxes to help deliver vital fresh groceries to older people.

It is a tough life being a Food Train delivery box. Carrying shopping from the supermarket, into the vans, out of the van to our customers houses, back into the vans and back to the supermarket.

Repeat three times a week and it is no wonder our boxes begin to show signs of wear with the cracks showing no matter how careful our volunteers try to be. But you can help by joining our Sponsor a Box project. For £10 you not only provide us with a shiny new delivery box, you can also get your name on the box for a whole year.

Here are what some of our customers say about Food Train, customer Mrs Wilkinson (joined 1997) is Food Train’s longest serving member. Local volunteers have been delivering her groceries for over 18 years. She says “I think Food Train is a wonderful thing”. Mrs Arthur said “I don’t know what would do without Food Train, it is wonderful. It was different when I could get out, but I cannot now. It is just marvellous. And you get a wee blether too and I cannot praise the volunteers enough”

With demand for Food Train services increasingly significantly and to satisfy this demand we require more boxes. By donating you will be helping ensure that older people across Scotland this Christmas eat well, live well and age well.

story:
Our Purpose

To provide unique products designed to automatically deliver useful items to users without transferring germs from one human to another. Serve Clean created the exciting Smart Toothpick Dispenser allowing unwrapped toothpicks to be dispensed without the user touching anything other than the delivered toothpick. This not only saves money, avoiding the cost of wrapped toothpicks, but it also saves the environment from pesky paper or cello wrappers finding their way onto the ground or into the landfills.

What We Seek

We need your contribution and, as importantly, your help in getting the word out to your friends about our exciting new product. Your word of mouth and social media are the most helpful means of reaching our goal. With your contribution, we will complete the multi cavity Touch Free tong tool required to pack production for shipment. Your Dispenser will be ready, and in your hands, before Christmas 2016.

The Impact

It is estimated that over 7 million toothpick wrappers make their way, annually, onto city streets or landfills. Clearly the amount reaching a proper recycling center is minimal. In addition to this great product preventing germ transfer between humans and being "just plain fun", it serves to maintain a cleaner environment.

Please

Accept our gratitude for your generous contribution and help us get the word out. Please send this Smart Dispenser link to your friends.

Thank You

Great news! We are shipping

story:
Create deliciously infused MARINADES, SALAD DRESSINGS, or DRINKS! 

 
The screw on lid allows you to store your Salids Shaker straight in the fridge - perfect for maturing or infusing overnight.
 
The Measuring Jar means no more guess work! Measure out your olive oil, vinegar, and dressings in perfect proportions.
 
Keep tabs on how much Gin you're really drinking ;) while using as a drinks shaker. Perfect for making a cheeky cocktail, infused water, or shake up your protein drink!
 
Or maybe you're hosing a party - infuse some fruit for the punch or get them soaking for that legendary Christmas Cake.
 

 

 
 

 

Originally the idea was inspired by cherry tomatoes; more specifically the inevitable struggle that arose from trying to prepare them for salads.

We shudder at the memories of all the times they've ruined our day and managed to evade our blade; how they never seemed to infuse properly with our salad dressing, and always exploded in the oven while roasting! 

Chopping or piercing to avoid these annoyances was a time consuming activity, which is why we decided to come up with the perfect tool for dealing with those little spheres of doom - a kitchen utensil that could pierce them quickly and easily.

And thus the Salids Shaker was born.

However, in the process of testing and perfecting the Salids Shaker we discovered it had a multitude of uses that went beyond cherry tomatoes!

Our revolutionary Salids Shaker is the first kitchen utensil that allows you to extract and infuse the flavors of your ingredients - all thanks to the design protected spiked lid!

The sharp spikes on the lid activate a release of flavor while the shaking motion mixes - allowing these flavors to infuse. The result - fuller more developed flavor profiles. 

Moisoo specialises in kitchen products, while Nimuno focuses on toys. After the success of Nimuno Loops, we wanted to bring a playful aesthetic to the world of kitchen gadgets. Situated in Cape Town, South Africa, Moisoo and Nimuno are divisions of Chrome Cherry Design Studios. A lot of our previous design work has also been focused around toys; particularly toys that engage children with the physical world and encourage creativity and play.
 
You might remember us from the Indiegogo campaign for Nimuno Loops, the toy block tape, which we have just finished running. The campaign surprised us in its incredible success and we are so grateful for all the support we received from our backers and the lessons we learnt.
 
CCDS is also responsible for the brand YBIKE, a range of scooters and bikes for kids. We are now branching out into products for the kitchen. We hope to combine our playful approach with the design of functional products you didn't even know you needed!
 
The Salids Shaker aims to make dealing with meal prep in the kitchen fun and easy. 
 
 
 
 
 
 

Moisoo is not responsible for the import taxes, loss, or damage, of packages for international orders.

Due to the inconsistencies in customs and duty laws worldwide, Moisoo cannot assume responsibility for taxes or issues with customs in your country.

If you are unsure whether an item can ship to your country, it is your responsibility to contact customs to obtain the necessary verification.

 

Should you move house after supporting our campaign it is the responsibility of the backer to ensure that the correct address is provided prior to shipping.

story:
Summary

A couple of months ago I realised how much clean water I flushed away every time I went to pee. I extrapolated this over a year and came to roughly 17,300 litres (4,700 gallons) of water used to remove 540 litres (122 gallons) of urine. Using over 38x the amount of clean water to flush away your urine. Below is a table to assess your annual water usage:

This I realised was unacceptable and therefore I developed the Enviro-Wee:

 

The Enviro-Wee easily fits into any small space next to your toilet, with a thin tube running from the unit into your toilet and behind the u-bend of the toilet:

This design means that the urine from the Enviro-Wee will not contaminate the water in your toilet bowl, but rather be deposited behind the toilet bowl water. With the attachable spray bottle, in order to remove any excess urine from the Enviro-Wee a simple 3-5 sprays will flush the remaining urine down the tube, therefore never having that "stale" urine smell in the bathroom.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We have completed the concept and design, now we need your help to get this to the production stage.

In order to mass produce this product, the next steps are as follows:

1) Development of plastic moulds for each piece

2) Packaging design, company

3) Legal costs and working capital 

In order for us to achieve the above, we will be giving you the opportunity to pre-order an Enviro-Wee at a discounted price

 

The Impact

Besides being able to pay your Enviro-Wee off between 6 - 18 months (due to reduction of water costs), the below represents the estimated annual water savings based on the the number of units we manage to sell:

 

This device could literally change the world we live in!

Using over 38x the amount of clean water to flush away your urine. story:
What is Sole Stacks?

Sole Stacks binds the passion for shoes and functionality into a beautifully made product. We design and manufacture shoe display stands and organizers. 

Currently I am running Sole Stacks out of my 600 sqft. apartment. My apartment has become the HQ and warehouse for Sole Stacks. But the strong passion I have in my product, I made it happen with what I have. Every year Sole Stacks has accomplished more than I imagined. Being able to ship internationally was one of them. Last year we shipped our first orders to Canada, and more countries added to the list after that. We plan to grow rapidly across the entire world. 

 
We need your help to get our warehouse open and running with the equipment & machine that's going to be required to make our products. With your backing we will be able to acquire the CNC Machine, Warehouse, and tooling equipment to reach the production capacity necessary to make this a sustainable business.
 

For the past couple of years we have outsourced our manufacturing to local companies in Dallas, Tx. The manufacturing of Sole Stacks has always been done by a 3rd party company, and we think that it would be best if we manufactured it ourselves. The number one reason? Cost. Having our product made by someone else is not cost effective for us or our customers.  By taking on the responsibility of owning our own manufacturing shop with a CNC router we won't take on the burden of having to pay someone else to produce our product. Also, there are times when the machines goes down, or our 3rd party company gets really busy with other jobs. Which then delays getting the product in our hands to deliver to our customers. We want to get rid of all of these issues so our customers have the best experience. 

Thank you for your support!

What We Need & What You Get

To break it down.

  • We are looking to raise $125,000 which will help purchase:
    • CNC router (The Machine that cuts and manufacturers our products)
    • Air compressor, dust collector, packing tables
    • Software to run the machine
    • Warehouse space to store the machine, our materials, and work out of. This also includes upgrading the electricity/power to be suitable for the CNC router
    • Equipment, Forklift, and storage bays for our materials and products to stay on in the warehouse

Supporting this campaign will get you some exclusive discounted prices on our products. 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Warehouse. We plan to successfully sign a lease at a warehouse in the Dallas area. The only risk we see is there not being a place that fits our needs when we have successful raised our campaign goal. Real estate moves fast and we are aware of that. We are working with a local Commercial Realtor that has given us a list of options to lease our space out of. 

CNC Router. Our CNC router will be ordered from a company in Los Angeles, Ca. This is the machine that will be cutting our material to produce Sole Stacks. Currently there are 2 left at their facility. But they receive more every 2 weeks. We are in constant communication with a sales rep there to see what the inventory levels are there. We don't see this being a huge problem as we have factored in 3 weeks lead time to process all orders just in case. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share our story with your family, friends, and co-workers. We really believe in the power of community. In fact, we wouldn't be here if we didn't the support of our own family & friends. Look for us on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, or Pinterest and tell people about Sole Stacks.  We appreciate everyone's effort to helping us reach our goal.

 

 

 

About Me

Sole Stacks is the brainchild of Demont Campbell, a Texas Tech alumni, whose degree is in architecture. “I found myself at Gensler, one of the world's top architecture firms, yet I wanted to take my passion for design and combine it with my love for footwear,” says Campbell. 

As an entrepreneur from the age of 16, Campbell learned quickly that it is the customer experience that was crucial to the business process. The pillars of his first company - honesty, trustworthiness and marketable product, live on today with Sole Stacks. Campbell created Sole Stacks to be customer-centric. After Sole Stacks began to increase traction, Campbell noticed trend in consumers getting to the point of purchase but not executing. The pain point seemed to be shipping. That is when Campbell noticed an opportunity to lower costs without sacrificing quality. “I couldn’t do much about the cost of shipping, but I could control the cost of my product. That's what led me into investigating becoming the manufacturer,” states Campbell.
story_txt:
What is Sole Stacks?
Sole Stacks binds the passion for shoes and functionality into a beautifully made product. We design and manufacture shoe display stands and organizers. 

Currently I am running Sole Stacks out of my 600 sqft. apartment. My apartment has become the HQ and warehouse for Sole Stacks. But the strong passion I have in my product, I made it happen with what I have. Every year Sole Stacks has accomplished more than I imagined. Being able to ship internationally was one of them. Last year we shipped our first orders to Canada, and more countries added to the list after that. We plan to grow rapidly across the entire world. 
 

We need your help to get our warehouse open and running with the equipment & machine that's going to be required to make our products. With your backing we will be able to acquire the CNC Machine, Warehouse, and tooling equipment to reach the production capacity necessary to make this a sustainable business.
 

For the past couple of years we have outsourced our manufacturing to local companies in Dallas, Tx. The manufacturing of Sole Stacks has always been done by a 3rd party company, and we think that it would be best if we manufactured it ourselves. The number one reason? Cost. Having our product made by someone else is not cost effective for us or our customers.  By taking on the responsibility of owning our own manufacturing shop with a CNC router we won't take on the burden of having to pay someone else to produce our product. Also, there are times when the machines goes down, or our 3rd party company gets really busy with other jobs. Which then delays getting the product in our hands to deliver to our customers. We want to get rid of all of these issues so our customers have the best experience. 
Thank you for your support!



What We Need & What You Get
To break it down.
We are looking to raise $125,000 which will help purchase:
CNC router (The Machine that cuts and manufacturers our products)
Air compressor, dust collector, packing tables
Software to run the machine
Warehouse space to store the machine, our materials, and work out of. This also includes upgrading the electricity/power to be suitable for the CNC router
Equipment, Forklift, and storage bays for our materials and products to stay on in the warehouse


Supporting this campaign will get you some exclusive discounted prices on our products. 
 

 
Risks & Challenges

Warehouse. We plan to successfully sign a lease at a warehouse in the Dallas area. The only risk we see is there not being a place that fits our needs when we have successful raised our campaign goal. Real estate moves fast and we are aware of that. Currently there are 2 left at their facility. But they receive more every 2 weeks. We are in constant communication with a sales rep there to see what the inventory levels are there. We don't see this being a huge problem as we have factored in 3 weeks lead time to process all orders just in case. 



Other Ways You Can Help
Please share our story with your family, friends, and co-workers. We really believe in the power of community. In fact, we wouldn't be here if we didn't the support of our own family & friends. Look for us on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, or Pinterest and tell people about Sole Stacks.  We appreciate everyone's effort to helping us reach our goal.
