story:
Roshni

Roshni is a noun in Urdu language which literally means Light.

There are currently many companies who are building the lights which are controlled by smartphone apps. But there is one thing they do not provide, portability. They all need some kind of mounts or holders plus a central hub to connect your phone with light.

So we created roshni; a smartphone controlled light that is rechargeable and small enough to be carried anywhere you like.


Roshni has Bluetooth 4.0 (Bluetooth Low Energy) in it. It connect to any device which supports BLE.






In design, its not like other bulbs or lights in your house. It is semi-spherical in shape and its body is made up of translucent white plastic. It is designed in a way to emit light all around so it looks the same from any angle.
Light it emits is not very sharp but smooth. Which makes it even more beautiful when calm colors are used. 
Using roshni is pretty simple. We love Apple (like everyone else) so we wanted to keep the same design philosophy of 'minimalism'.
We did not add any physical button on the device. Instead, it responds to taps. Tap it twice to turn it on and vice versa. All other operations can be performed with our powerful free app.
 

Charging:
Roshni comes with a wireless charger. Just place roshni above it and it will start charging. We've equipped roshni with Qi wireless. Pick and go without any wires.



And now, let's introduce you to the roshni app. We'll be releasing app in 3 platforms initially. iOS, Android and Chrome (browser). For iOS and Android; app will run on all smartphone/tablets with iOS 7+ and Android 4.3+.


For Chrome, we'll release Chrome app that will run on OS X, Windows and Chrome OS as well. But Chrome app will only run if your Laptop/PC supports Bluetooth Low Energy. You can use a BLE adaptor (like this one) if your PC does not support BLE.

Connect roshni with app:

Its pretty simple. Double-tap roshni to turn on. Open app and connect.

Features:

App is packed with pretty amazing features.


Basic ones are to change the color of app.


App can even detect the dominant color from an image. e.g: If you want to change the light to according to an image. Or you can just pick a color from an image with app.

Alarm:

You can set a time for roshni to turn itself on with a color or mode. e.g: Set it to 6 AM with 'Sunrise' mode and it will wake itself up with a beautiful color.

Notifications:

App has an awesome feature in it. You can connect your social network with it and when an update happens, roshni will change its color to notify you.




Party Mode:

Turn on party mode in roshni app. Play some music on your device. See roshni go nuts.




Here are the components that Roshni is made of:


Here are the dimensions. Although, these are not final but these are the ones we have our hearts on:


The nitty gritty of it contains:
- A BLE (Bluetooth Smart) chip from Nordic Semiconductors.
- A 3.6v, 1350 mAh re-chargeable battery.
- A matrix of 24-bit (True Color) RGB LEDs
- A microprocessor.
- Qi wireless charging module



Oh, did we mention its waterproof and it is designed to float?


Use it at night or day. As a night light on your bedside table. Or in your living room. Beautify the scene with roshni in your patio. Change its brightness to your liking. Set any color. Use anywhere.



You might be wondering about the goal we've set. Yes, it is not enough to fund the purchase of electronics, molds & packaging. But instead, this goal represents the support & demand of community. It means if we reach our goal then people like you are in need of a product like this.

Once we reach our goal, i.e. the idea is validated, we would use money from campaign to refine the product on both hardware and software side.

We would not be able to go into production with this goal but we would make sure that all the perks we've promised get delivered to you. We've already contracted with a manufacturer in China that would produce Roshni in small batch, for all the backers who have chosen it as a perk.


We are only two guys in the team. Ahmad & Moin.

I'm Ahmad. I've been working in different companies for 3 years on different posts related to electronics. 4 months ago I resigned from my job to start working full time on roshni. I have handled hardware side of roshni so far. We are now depending on your contribution to take it to the next level. You can find me on Facebook.

I'm Moin. Currently pursuing my bachelors in Computer Science. I have always found software to be fascinating. So I taught myself how to code when I was in college. I have been working as a freelance developer for 4 years. Currently I'm working on software side of roshni (Android, iOS and Chrome app). 
Here is my personal website. My freelance profile. My GitHub profile. My Twitter & my Facebook.



We would like to keep transparency in what we have done and what we still find hard. It is the first time we have decided to create a product for public use. Means we had no experience on how & what kind of components we need for commercial products, what testings are needed etc. But we learned a lot in process of creating roshni and we won't stop at anything else. 

Challenges:

  • We have no experience in working with contractors, manufacturers, suppliers.
  • We have no experience in how things work when it comes to creating a commercial product that is going to be used by thousands.
  • We don't know how international shipping works. Custom clearance, different regulations on different material in different countries. There could be delays in shipping sometimes.
  • It is our first time using BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy). We have not working with this type of small data-rate before. We don't know if it would cause any problems in future.

How can we overcome the challenges.

  • We both have 3 years+ hands-on experience in our fields. Means, our team has both the hardware and software requirements.
  • Arduino and Google have been our friend through-out in project. The four of us have never spent a day without each other for past 18 months.
  • We'll use professional help whenever needed. We will not, ever, compromise on security of users so we will make sure everything we use is of best quality and certified to latest standards.
  • Aside from the online material and professional help, You are whom we are relying on most. We don't just need funds, we need a community that could help us in any step we find difficult.





Q: Why is your goal so small?

A: This goal does not reflect our financial needs. This is set just to validate the idea and market of the market. We need a lot more than this to go into production.


Q: Does that mean I will not receive a roshni if you don't reach the goal.

A: No. We'll fulfil all the perks we have offered regardless of whether we achieve our goal or not.


Q: Why you've set it to 'Flexible Funding'?

A: Because it the only option for us. 'Fixed Funding' only allows PayPal payments and unfortunately, PayPal is not available in Pakistan.


Q: Why can't I pay with PayPal? Credit card seem to be the only option there.

A: See the above answer please.


Q: When will I receive my perk?

A: It depends on the perk you've chosen. For all non-roshni rewards, we'll ship in September as soon as campaign ends. For name on website and social shout-out, we deliver within a few hours. All roshnis will be delivered in December.


Q: Is it compatible with Windows Phone

A: Not yet. But we are working on it. Hopefully we'll be able to release the app when we start shipping in December.


Q: Can I connect multiple roshnis to the app?

A: Yes. You can connect 7 roshnis to your device at once.


Q: Is roshni certified as an electronic device?

A: Absolutely. We are using all the components which are already certified from FCC & CE plus adhere to all environmental standard. Means our product is already certified.


Q: I am still not satisfied.

A: You can add a comment. Or send us an email at team@roshni.me



Don't have a credit card or can't contribute monetarily? This doesn't mean you can't help at all. Here are a few ways to help us:

  • Like, Tweet, +1 this campaign with hashtag #GoRoshni. See all shares here
  • Share our campaign on social and family networks.
  • Got a website or blog? We'd appreciate a line or two about our campaign.

Credits:

  • Icons: Microchip by Ilsur Aptukov, Bluetooth by Pham Thi Dieu Linh, Battery by Lara, LED by Arthur Shlain, Smartphone by Sherrinford, Umbrella by Ema Dimitrova, Hand by Chris Henley. All from the Noun Project.
  • Apple Watch mockup by HackingUI (awesome site, BTW).
  • 3D Modeling is done with SketchUp.
  • Graphics are made with Sketch 3 by Bohemian Coding.

 Don't have a credit card or can't contribute monetarily? This doesn't mean you can't help at all. Here are a few ways to help us:  Like, Tweet, +1 this campaign with hashtag #GoRoshni. See all shares here

Share our campaign on social and family networks. Got a website or blog? We'd appreciate a line or two about our campaign.


Credits:

Icons: Microchip by Ilsur Aptukov, Bluetooth by Pham Thi Dieu Linh, Battery by Lara, LED by Arthur Shlain, Smartphone by Sherrinford, Umbrella by Ema Dimitrova, Hand by Chris Henley. All from the Noun Project.
Apple Watch mockup by HackingUI (awesome site, BTW).
3D Modeling is done with SketchUp.
Graphics are made with Sketch 3 by Bohemian Coding.

story:
HERE COMES

ECOSTOOL, THE ECO-FRIENDLY FURNITURE FOR KIDS AND ADULTS

We put the goal to collect the best things the modern production can offer and to create the unique ideas. So, we have turned it into reality for you!

“What is that, then?” you will ask. Believe!

Here you can see a unique item that combines toy, stool, stand, seat for a picnic and attractive décor. Despite the fact that ECOSTOOL was created for kids it can bear the adult weighing up to 150 kg. It is impressive, isn’t it?

THERE IS MORE TO COME!

We would like to draw your attention that ECOSTOOL is made of special wood fiber material with water-resistant coating. The advantages are evident:

  • The material is much lighter than wood. A kid can move the stool by himself without damaging the floor and with impunity;
  • The assembling requires several minutes. Being assembled ECOSTOOL takes up minimum place. It can be easily placed in the wardrobe or in the corner of the room;
  • There is no contamination unlike the plastic furniture. Of course, the material is eco-friendly and hypoallergenic;
  • Fair value (compared to similar wooden and plastic products).

 

 

And the last, but not the least: just imagine how many forests can be saved if other producers switch to wood fiber even partially. Indeed, it is equal to wood in terms of quality and strength; however its consumption is one order less.

ECOSTOOL is developed and manufactured by PlayToyz, the company that has been developing toys in Estonia since 2015.

 

The goal of the project:

It is very important for us that the product is distributed throughout the world actively and attracts customers that can see other perspectives. It is also very important for us to save the forests and the environment. Even now ECOSTOOL is completely developed, tested and ready for the mass production. We are sure that every one of you will see the true value of our job and efforts we put into the project. Moreover, if we succeed we will expand the product range. So, you will see a lot of ECO furniture for kids and adults soon.

Who we are?

Our company Vipline Ltd. has a 12 years’ experience in printing industry and production of illuminated signs, operating all over Europe since 2004. We registered our PlayToyz trademark in 2015 and our company is the author and manufacturer of all the products under PlayToyz brand name.

 

What we produce?

Toys and children’s products made of special high-strength ecofriendly material – whitewood fiber (birch). PlayToyz and associated trademarks, trade dress and designs are owned by our company. PlayToyz offers you to buy our products at the best price. Our European sales are very active; moreover, our sales geography is increasing month-by-month.

WE WILL NOT TALK STUFF AND NONSENSE!

When you receive your order you will see that you don’t just buy original furniture for your kid, but you invest in the future life, the life without destroying the forests and without dangerous furniture or openly boring interior solutions.

Become the part of the society that values the surrounding world and wants to save it for our children. Choose eco-friendly furniture, choose ECOSTOOL!
              

 

Choose designs from Photo Gallery

The funds go to mass-production and if we don't reach our entire goal, we will deliver you your order anyway, so you can enjoy our product!

Please help us to let more people know about our campaign, please share our campaign using Indiegogo share tools. Thank you!

 

VAT AND TAXES

Products backed and sold inside the EU are covered with Estonian VAT and are subject to no further costs. Please be advised that products shipped outside EU could be subject to local VAT and Taxes. You have to check up with your local regulations in order to get information.

 

DISTRIBUTORS AND WHOLESALERS

If you are keen to distribute or buy ECOSTOOL in bulk, please get in touch with the team at playtoyz@playtoyz.eu and we would be happy to discuss working with you.

 

FAQ

 

Where is ECOSTOOL produced?  

ECOSTOOL is designed and produced in Estonia.

Where can you buy a ECOSTOOL?   

You can buy ECOSTOOL here on Indiegogo. Go to the Perk of your preference in the right hand column.  

What material is it made of?  

We use special 7,5mm wood fiber (of birch) carefully selected after multiple tests and tailored for this particular product (PlayToyz OEM). There are no other similar materials in the market.

Will there be more designs in the future?  

Yes, we are planning to introduce ECOSTOOL in a variety of designs.  

I accidentally chose the wrong design on ECOSTOOL, can I change it?  

Yes, write us an email and we will change your order.

When do you ship? 

We’re aiming to ship ECOSTOOL by the start of November 2017.  

How will ECOSTOOL be shipped?   

ECOSTOOL will be shipped in a bubble envelope or in a cardboard box with secure packaging inside to protect it (depends on perk).

Can I get a refund?  

For a refund please see following articles:

https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526876-Refunds 

https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/213172367 

Can I be a reseller of ECOSTOOL?  

Yes, contact us on playtoyz@playtoyz.eu and let’s have a talk. 

Can I combine my purchases to save on shipping? 

Unfortunately not. The Indiegogo platform does not support this feature.  

If I have any further questions can I contact you?  

Write us an e-mail on: playtoyz@playtoyz.eu we’ll be happy to answer all your questions.  

FAQ regarding claiming perks 

https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526766-How-do-I-claim-a-Perk-

Kısa Özet/Short Summart

Biz liseli ya da çiçeği burnunda mezun gençleriz. Ve biz edebiyata, sanata, okumaya, yazmaya ve düşünmeye dair her şeyi yaşamın en önemli parçası olarak görüyoruz. Bu yüzden bacak kadar boyumuza bakmadan boyumuzdan büyük işlere kalkışıyor, su yerine söze dahil olma savaşı veriyoruz. 

Kendi kendimize okuyup yazdıktan sonra bir yerlerde belki asla görmeyeceğimiz birinin ruhuna biraz olsun değmek ya da sadece elimizden geldiğince köşe yazarcılığı oynamak istiyoruz.


“Bu gençlik nereye gidiyor” sorusuna bir cevap olmak ümidiyle,

TÜNEL

<http://tunelgazete.com/>

--------------------------------

We are either high school students or have just graduated. We see literature, art and everything related to reading, writing and thinking as an integral part of life. Regardless of our young age, we are hoping and aiming to rise up to the challenge and take our part in the current intellectual conversation.

With the joy of excluding ourselves from the selfish aspect of art and with the motivation of reaching out to more people, we dive into a new adventure. After years of individual reading and writing, only sharing our work with others through means of classwork; we are now playing the ‘columnists’ to reach out to more people whom we may have never met or known.


Our hope is when someone asks where the youth is headed, the answer will be;

TUNNEL


Neden Tünel? / Why Tunnel?

Aynı yolun yolcusuyuz.

Hayat ve hayatın evreleri bir tünele benziyor. Bizlerse bu tünelin içinde birbirimizin hayatına dokunarak ilerliyoruz. Hepimizin umuduysa tünelin sonunun aydınlığa çıktığı yerde güzel ve güneşli günler görebilmek; bizler bu yüzden gaz pedalına asıldıkça asılıyoruz. Uzlaşmacı ve çoğul fikir dünyasında, materyalizmden olabildiğince uzakta; her bireyin içindeki farklı kişilikleri gönül rahatlığıyla ortaya koyabilmesini amaçlıyoruz.

---------------------------

We are all on the same road.

Phases of life are like a tunnel. We are progressing in this tunnel, touching each other’s lives. We all hope to see beautiful, sunny days at the end of the tunnel; that is why we push harder and harder on the accelerator. We all hope that in the world of free ideas and compromise, as far from materialism as possible, all individuals will be able to show their true personalities.


Bize Lazım Olan & Sizin Kazanacağınız / What We Need & What You Get

Bir limitimiz olmamasına karşın, gelecek herhangi bir desteğe; maddi veya manevi, açığız. Bizim amacımız, kurduğumuz bu ilham verici topluluğu daha çok insana ulaştırmak, daha çok insana tünellerimizi uzatmak ve onların da sesini duymak. 

Bu kampanyadan gelecek para ile sitemizin reklamını yapıp, aynı zamanda özel sayı olarak birkaç sayı basıp kitapçılarda satmayı düşünüyoruz. Amacımız kar gütmek olmadığı için, herhangi bir yerden gelecek paranın tamamını yine Tünel Gazeteyi geliştirmek ve duyurmak için kullanacağımıza söz veriyoruz.

Eğer amacımıza erişemezsek, buradan gelen paranın yettiği kadarıyla sitemizi yayıp daha fazla insana ulaşıp hem daha çok okuyucu hem de daha çok yazar kazanmayı umuyoruz.

-------------------------------------

Even though we don't have a limit, we are open to all financial or spiritual support from everyone. Our aim is to dig up tunnels to even more people and make sure that their voices are heard as well and that they are a part of this inspiring community we have created.

With the money from this campaign, we will advertise our website and also print special editions of our columns to sell at local bookstores. Because we are non-profit, we promise you that any money that we raise will go to improving and advertising Tunnel Newspaper.

If we don't reach our goal here, we will still use all of the money we have raised to advertise our money to reach out to more people, so that we can gain more readers as well as more writers.


Sizin Etkiniz / Your Impact

Bize yapacağınız herhangi bir bağış, 25 gencin hayallerini bir adım daha ileri taşımasına; edebiyatlarını, sanatlarını, müziklerini, karikatürlerini, kısacası her türlü seslerini dünyaya duyurmalarına yardımcı olacak. 
Şu ana kadar 100'den fazla yazı yayınladığımız sitemizde, sizin de katkınızla okuyucu ve yazar sayımızı arttırıp, gençlerimizin de neler istediğini, nelerle ilgilendiğini ve nelerden kaygılandığını dünyaya duyurabiliriz.
----------------------------
Any funding you provide us will help 25 young minds to take their dreams up a step and to make their voices heard through advertising their literature, art, music and comics.
Up until now, we have posted over a 100 pieces; and with your contribution we can expand our community and have more readers and writers and can share with the world what our youth wants, what they are interested in and what they are worried about.

Riskler ve Zorluklar / Risks & Challenges

Şuana kadarki serüvenimizde karşılaştığımız sorunlardan bazıları kitle analizi yapmak ve etkimizi ölçmekti. Aynı zamanda, tamamiyle liseli veya üniversiteli gençlerden oluşan bir platformda düzeni sağlamak ve bir yazı düzeni oturtmakta zaman zaman zorlandık. Ancak, herkesin istekli ve azimli olması sonucu bu düzeni oturtmayı başardık; gelecek desteklerle de etki ölçme analizlerini ve etki çevremizi iyileştirip genişleteceğimize inanıyoruz.

Aynı zamanda, sesimizi duyurduktan sonra transmedya ve gazetecilik alanında bize yardım edebilecek kişilere de projemizi ulaştırmak istiyor; ve onlardan rehberlik almayı umuyoruz.

---------------------------------

Our adventure so far has involved challenges such as audience analysis and impact measuring. Also, in a platform consisting entirely of high schoolers and college students, we had some trouble with fitting into a schedule. However, with everyone being so excited and determined; we have managed to fit into a schedule and not we believe that with the fundings we get we can be more efficient in our audience analysis and impact measuring.


Yardımcı Olabileceğiniz Başka Yollar / Other Ways You Can Help

Sesimizi duyurmamıza yardımcı olun! 

Sitemize bir göz atın, ve kalbimizi işimize koyduğumuz yazılarımızı okuyup çevrenize de yayın. En büyük hayalimiz daha fazla insana ulaşabilmek; bu yüzden şuanda bunu okuyarak bile bir katkıda bulunuyorsunuz!

----------------------------

Help us reach out to more people!

Have a look at our website, where we put our hearts into our work, and spread the word to your community. Our biggest dream is to reach to more people, therefore even just by reading this, you are contributing to our cause!


Bu gençlik nereye gidiyor sorusuna cevap olmak ümidiyle,

Tünel Gazete Ailesi

---------------------

With hopes to answer the question "where is the youth headed?",

Tunnel Newspaper Family

story:
Do you have a burning desire to make a difference in the world  by blazing a new trail? Are you missing camping under the stars in a glorious mountain setting? Are you passionate about sustainable green buildings? Well here is your chance to manifest a new reality by getting your hands on hemp. You can learn how to build, even with no experience, and have a wonderful time with incredible people in the process. July 16/17 and July 23/24

I know that reintroducing hemp into the U.S. economy can replace the petroleum world we live in with: non-toxic molded plastics, graphite, medicine for a variety of ailments, fibers, protein-rich foods, body products,biofuels,animal feed cakes and bedding, paints, caulk, glue, insulation and 55,000 other patented  items.

What excites me most, is using hemp as a building material. It is 1/6th the weight of cement and easy to work with, has a high R factor, is sound proof, water, fire and earthquake resistant. It also obtains a zero carbon footprint. It can be molded into creative designs that feature embedded objects for lighting and storage.

If you can't come to the workshop, your contribution will help build a unique structure, you will be assisting the process of re-educating people about the importance of hemp, as well as providing a sacred space for gatherings to create community and promote sustainability. 

Your contribution will cover the costs for materials for 3 weekend camp out workshops. Framing the geodesic dome, hemp filling the building and plaster, paint and stucco application.

Lumber     $800

hardware     $75

Miter saw     $350

Mortar mixer rental     $250

Hemp herd     $1,000

Lime for bonding     $3,200

Windows     $1,000

Door     $287

Hardware     $75

Food     $600

Porta-Pody $450

Total $8,000

Working in partnership with  https://www.facebook.com/lovelandhemp, you can be confident that this project will reach completion. They built the first 1,500 square foot  permitted hemp cabin in the state of colorado.

Trained and certified by world famous Steve Allen of Ireland.

This is not simply the construction of a building, this is a leap into the future and an opportunity for people to see and touch a space that is far less toxic than commercially available building materials.

You Will be contributing to a movement that has the potential to change the world for the better.

You will also receive AWESOME perks that are created from original artwork! We have postcards, magnets, posters and hemp t-shirts!

Too far away to participate in the workshop? You can tag along through virtual posts

Unable to contribute financially?

You can help us move forward by sharing the post some of your friends just might light up too by what we are accomplishing.

Thank you, on behalf of future generations, for your generous support.

story:
Project: Welcome Home, Inc. is a 501(c)(3) non-profit that provides disabled, homeless, and Veterans that suffer from Post Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD) and Traumatic Brain Injury (TBI) with environmentally friendly, energy efficient, hi-tech housing specifically designed to address their individual needs, all while, "providing an environment conducive to dignity and independence for our Veterans".

Our mission is to construct tight-knit communities for our disabled and homeless Veterans. These communities would be made up of multi-use commercial/residential buildings. The buildings are designed specifically for disabled Veterans and their caregivers or for homeless Veterans (we have two (2) different floor plans). Each building would be four (4) stories tall, with two (2) commercial retail spaces available on the ground floor and six (6) residential units above (two (2) per floor). Each residential unit is a 1125 square foot two (3) bedroom, two (2) bath unit with kitchen, dining room, living room, and an office/physical therapy area in an open floor plan.

These buildings are built with energy efficient building materials (according to the manufacturer, they provide energy savings of up to 80% of the power consumed by a structure built with traditional materials), they are fire and bullet proof; hurricane, earthquake, and blast resistant; equipped with solar panels to produce clean energy, solar hot water heaters to produce hot water, a two (2) compartment cistern for storing and repurposing rainwater and grey water, a machine that produces water from the humidity of the air, etc.

These buildings shall also offer some semblance of normalcy to disabled veterans, at least while they are at home, by means of offering voice, motion, and push-button activated automation (e.g. motorized doors, windows, and blinds; automated lights, television, radio, phone, etc.), adjustable height countertops and wall cabinets, accessible refrigerator and freezer, under-counter microwave, front-load washer and dryer; voice and visual intercom system, a lift system that carries the occupant from their bed into the bathroom in order to facilitate utilizing the toilet and entering the tub, a toilet with built-in bidet and drying features, a hydrotherapy tub, an adjustable bed, a full set of physical therapy equipment, etc.

All of these systems will enable disabled veterans to live free from monthly power and water bills. This will also enable them to have the freedom from depending on a caregiver for menial tasks (that many of us take for granted until we may no longer perform them on our own) such as: accessing things in the refrigerator, freezer, or microwave, accessing things on the countertops and in cabinets, opening and closing doors, opening and closing windows, opening and closing the blinds, turning on and off lights, controlling the radio, controlling the television. It will also enable disabled veterans to conduct their physical therapy in the privacy of their own homes.

In addition to building housing for our disabled and homeless Veterans, we are creating jobs for our Veterans as well. We only employ Veterans in order to build these communities. All of these buildings are built by paid military Veterans and unpaid volunteers. Veteran owned businesses shall be the preferred vendors and contractors.

Below I have included some pertinent links to our project. Please take a moment to have a look at them

• Our website: http://www.pwhi.org

• Our Facebook page: https://facebook.com/projectwelcomehomeinc

• Our Twitter page: https://twitter.com/projwelcomehome

• The project we did for those that lost their homes in Haiti: https://facebook.com/profile.php?id=14797530521...

• The type of material that these buildings are built with: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YD5kqiDE53w

• Ballistic test that shows that the material is bulletproof: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q4GFdyTCYUw

• Test conducted by The Wind Science & Engineering Research Center, Texas Tech University: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3mBpXcluyWo

• Anti-seismic test that shows the earthquake resistance of the material: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GKzwjsCndGc
story_txt:
Project: Welcome Home, Inc. is a 501(c)(3) non-profit that provides disabled,
homeless, and Veterans that suffer from Post Traumatic Stress Disorder
(PTSD) and Traumatic Brain Injury (TBI) with environmentally friendly, energy
efficient, hi-tech housing specifically designed to address their individual
needs, all while, "providing an environment conducive to dignity and
independence for our Veterans".Our mission is to construct tight-knit communities for our disabled and homeless Veterans. These communities would be made up of multi-use commercial/residential buildings. The buildings are designed specifically for disabled Veterans and their caregivers or for homeless Veterans (we have two (2) different floor plans). Each building would be four (4) stories tall, with two (2) commercial retail spaces available on the ground floor and six (6) residential units above (two (2) per floor). Each residential unit is a 1125 square foot two (3) bedroom, two (2) bath unit with kitchen, dining room, living room, and an office/physical therapy area in an open floor plan.These buildings are built with energy efficient building materials (according to the manufacturer, they provide energy savings of up to 80% of the power consumed by a structure built with traditional materials), they are fire and bullet proof; hurricane, earthquake, and blast resistant; equipped with solar panels to produce clean energy, solar hot water heaters to produce hot water, a two (2) compartment cistern for storing and repurposing rainwater and grey water, a machine that produces water from the humidity of the air, etc.These buildings shall also offer some semblance of normalcy to disabled veterans, at least while they are at home, by means of offering voice, motion, and push-button activated automation (e.g. motorized doors, windows, and blinds; automated lights, television, radio, phone, etc.), adjustable height countertops and wall cabinets, accessible refrigerator and freezer, under-counter microwave, front-load washer and dryer; voice and visual intercom system, a lift system that carries the occupant from their bed into the bathroom in order to facilitate utilizing the toilet and entering the tub, a toilet with built-in bidet and drying features, a hydrotherapy tub, an adjustable bed, a full set of physical therapy equipment, etc.All of these systems will enable disabled veterans to live free from monthly power and water bills. Veteran owned businesses shall be the preferred vendors and contractors.Below I have included some pertinent links to our project. Please take a moment to have a look at them• Our website: http://www.pwhi.org• Our Facebook page: https://facebook.com/projectwelcomehomeinc• Our Twitter page: https://twitter.com/projwelcomehome• The project we did for those that lost their homes in Haiti: https://facebook.com/profile.php?id=14797530521...• The type of material that these buildings are built with: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YD5kqiDE53w• Ballistic test that shows that the material is bulletproof: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q4GFdyTCYUw• Test conducted by The Wind Science & Engineering Research Center, Texas Tech University: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3mBpXcluyWo• Anti-seismic test that shows the earthquake resistance of the material: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GKzwjsCndGc

story:
Short Summary - The Uber of Energy

Hi,

My name is Paul and I am the owner of Big Blue Ventures.

I am here today in front of all of you to ask for your support in helping me build the NEXT BIG THING.


This is the Uber of Energy!

My campaign is based on building an app to help energy consumers take back control of their energy consumption, costs and investments by letting them save huge money on their bills. I have consulted widely in the utilities industry and I want to see people get more value for their solar investment than they currently do. I also want people who do not have solar to benefit. My app will do precisely that.

Your contribution will help us achieve the following:

  • The biggest breakthrough in energy since the solar panel - millions of people around the world can dramatically impact global energy costs right away.
  • Massive energy bill savings - potential for Billions in savings
  • Reduction on environmental impact
  • Positive contribution to the reduction of global warming
  • Control over your solar investment
  • Huge reduction in payback time on your solar investment
  • Your contribution is generational, it simply grows as more people adopt it!
  • You get to be part of a global revolution!

What We Need & What You Get

We will need $ 500 000 AUD to build the free app. This money will be used to pay for: Cloud infrastructure, specialist developers who will code the integration, UX design, SAP HANA in-memory predictive analytics library functions and business procedures. The app will available on Android, iOS, Windows etc. and will be free. The build will be 5-6 months. I will be the project leader and chief designer. I will post updates on our progress against the plan on a weekly basis.


Perks -

You will be able to manage your energy savings/earn money. You will be able to decide with whom you save energy and on what terms. How good is that? No more retailers dictating tariffs.

There is even the potential to save/share energy savings with people in other countries.

Funding -

If we don't reach our funding goal, well, we will just keep trying because we have an utter and unfailing belief in this revolution. The app is designed so that it can be built in stages.

Why?

Because we believe this is such a fundamental benefit to humankind that we feel we cannot stop. Think about it, the ability to actually control your energy costs and not be tied to what your energy provider tells you to do.

The Impact

Your contribution will help unleash a stepchange in the way we manage our energy. The world will benefit from a reduction in energy consumption and costs.


I have multiple designs & projects under my belt where I have successfuly designed and delivered custom solutions for clients. I have consulted to the utility industry for years and know many of the shortcomings as well as the many opportunities.

I hold six world first designs in apps, some of which are patented.

Risks & Challenges

What challenges do we face?

 1: The first challenge is funding of course. But that is why I am here, to ask for your help to overcome that.

2: The second challenge may be the utility companies themselves. This app will cost them millions/billions in revenue, as that money will go back into the pockets of you and I, the hardworking consumer!

Initially I think they will resist the app, but when they see the benefits, they will come around. The app can help them wipe out the solar subsidy in the process.

23 million Australians can benefit, and many more than that internationally. I estimate the global market to be about 450 million users, VERY conservatively, with the value being over $30 Billion/annum in it's first year. I am happy to pledge 10% of the profits back to Indiegogo to you the funder as a thank you for your support. This money can be used to help others build their dream.

I am launching a Facebook/Twitter campaign to lobby for my solution.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute money, I welcome input to the prototype, UX and features you want to see once it's ready. 


Use the lovely Indiegogo share tools folks!

story:
We chose Home Assistant software to make this all happen. This software is the IT for techy home automation lovers. We chose it because it is: 

    • Open-source software that you can customize to your liking
    • Integrated with over 2000 devices
    • Super easy to use, once set up

    We see this as the best option on the market.  Unfortunately, it was not accessible to non-geeks.  So we’re making it accessible to you.

     

     

     

    Yes, absolutely! But here are some things to consider... 

     

       

     

    • Save money by optimizing your lighting,  heating, and air-conditioning with schedules or connecting them to sensors for automatic home / away mode changes.
    • Help the environment by monitoring your usage to discover options for greater energy savings.

     

           

     

     

    Residential-Grade Box

    • Allwinner H2+ Cortex-A7 processor 
    • Residential grade parts - for heated indoor locations only
    • Barrel jack power connector 
    • DIN rail available as an add-on

    Commercial-Grade Box

    • Freescale i.MX6 Cortex-A7 processor 
    • Commercial grade parts - for heated or unheated indoor locations
    • More reliable storage (soldered-down flash memory) 
    • 2-part power connector (more secure power connection) 
    • DIN rail included 

     

     

     

    The BaHa Box is the missing link between home-built devices (neither FCC approved nor safety compliant) and Cloud-based home automation (not local & secure) for smart homes.

    We know how to make high-value, reliable, embedded solutions.

     

     

     

    Compliance for "Intentional Radiator" (a wireless device) to FCC Class B levels (residential standard -- the harder one to obtain) is always risky, challenging, and expensive.

    Fortunately, zPoint Products (makers of the BaHa Box) has been making FCC certified wireless controls products (with Zigbee radios, etc.) for more than a dozen years.  

    It's always a lot easier when you've already "Been there, Done that". 

     

     

     

    We envision a world that is more collaborative. With your support, we will be able to turn any building into a smart building, and also connect them to each other. Here are some stretch goals:

    • Neighbourhood eBlock Watch: improve community safety. Share alerts with your neighbours. Smart homes make smart neighbourhoods.
    • Family eHome Watch: protect your family. Share alerts with your family, across town or across the planet.
    • Franchise eWatch: collaborate with other business locations. Share optimized energy strategies.  Plus, automatically send alerts to other franchises, or to the people who maintain your buildings: plumbers, electricians, security and so many more.

     

     

    We've been here for a while. zPoint Products Company makes building automation and home automation accessible for all by creating low cost smart computing devices that cost-effectively enable smart rooms, smart buildings and smart grid.

    We were "spun out" of Technical Solutions Inc, an engineering company with 2 dozen years experience developing Commercial, Industrial, Automotive, Medical, and Defense products, way back in 2006. 

    When the recession hit, we were totally invested into new wireless products for clients in the USA that would cut energy consumption dramatically!  But the USA practically shut down.  As did zPoint Products Company. 

    This product represents the resurrection of a pioneer in wireless building controls, and will be the first of many new products.  Some of those products will be complementary to the BaHa Box.

    We have wirelessly enabled products for many startups, small businesses, and also worked with Honeywell and Johnson Controls on commercial energy efficiency projects. 

     

     

    zPoint Products was the first company to successfully demonstrate wireless lighting control using ZigBee.  The demonstration occurred in the Zigbee Alliance booth in May of 2006, at LightFair International in Las Vegas, Nevada.

    We're purveyors of "Zigbee connected End-points" (AKA z-points) since 2006.

     

      

     

                                         

           

      The BaHa Box is going through extensive testing so that it is perfect for production in October and shipping in November.  Right now, we're in the process of finalizing the design for its circuit boards (the brain of the Box).

       

       

      The BaHa Box does everything a smart hub does. But we are taking it to the next level.

      Backing this campaign means you'll be helping us launch the BaHa Box commercially and continue developing the hub to meet the potential we see becoming. 

       

       

      When we raise $8,900, we'll be able to fund the compliance testing for FCC Class-B certification. The Baha Box will also be UL and CSA Class-2 device compliant. 

      Anything beyond would mean:

      • $20,000: Remote access utility. Access your server from outside of your home.
      • $30,000: Peer-to-peer (decentralized) settings backup. Backup your data to a directory on another machine.
      • $50,000: Electronic block watch; Family eHome Watch, Franchise eWatch, Neighbourhood eBlock Watch. Share alerts with family members, neighbours, other franchises (and the people hired to maintain them: plumbers, electricians, solar-panel people, security etc).

       

       

       

      The data on our product are theoretical values. The product may be subjected to changes during and after the campaign, including but not limited to product characteristics, software versions, specifications, parts and other information.

      Our team may make adjustments to this page throughout the campaign and any related resources during and after the campaign to match the up-to-date data about the product. Due to the fact that changes can be made anytime, we will not be notifying you at real-time in the event that the product is modified in any way possible.

       

       

      We’re planning to ship the first batch in November. The BaHa Box is only available in USA and Canada for now but we’re excited to launch worldwide in the near future. Please note, the price listed in perks do not include additional fees like duty and taxes.

      Need help with your order? We’re here to help! Give us a shout at indiegogo@bahabox.com.

       

       

      Choosing to “back” our product means you’re helping us continue its development and launch. We’ll be using these funds to produce a product that we know our backers will love. This is why based on Indiegogo’s Terms of Use, there will be no refunds or returns for items that are not defective. If you are not fully satisfied, please let us know what the issue is so that we may do our best to help you out.

story:
Hello, I am Stephanie Perry.

I created Purify Products, which are uniquely designed dispensers, paper towels, and accessories, for families.

 

Covid-19 has made Better Hygiene the New Normal. Purify Products are the first of its kind that offers families 99.9% protection against colds, flu, covid-19, other viruses, bacteria, mold, and fungi. It promotes hygiene and cleanliness, reduces disease transfer, and provides a sanitary environment for the home.

Because of covid-19, we all spend more time on our hand hygiene, making sure our hands and especially our kids' hands were washed and dried properly. We infused our dispensers with antimicrobial technology, so diseases cannot be transferred from one per to another when touched. Also paper towels are dispensed one-at-a time to reduce consumption and waste.

 

Our Purify Products can be used in any room!

 

 
I was inspired to create the Purify Products line as a result of PTSD while serving in the military. I developed a case of severe OCD; I felt compelled to wash my hands several times while in the bathroom, and wash all the bathroom sinks in any restroom I entered, whether it was a restaurant, business, or someone’s home!
 

One day, while using the restroom of a friend’s home, I found–to my dismay–that there were no paper towels available. I began to panic, the cloth hand towel was wet and dirty, and the decorative cloth towel display dry and crusty. In a frenzy, I ended up running to their kitchen for the paper towels roll, then went back the their restroom to clean the sink. It was here that I said to myself, “why doesn’t someone make a paper towel dispenser that can be used in the home?”

This was the beginning of the Purify Products line.

 

No more mess, no more waste, no more paper wars with traditional paper towel rolls.

 

I was Inspired by Dad's Habit

Dad had OCD with paper towel rolls. Every day he would grab paper towels from the paper towel roll and neatly fold them into small rectangle shapes and stack them on his bedroom dresser. When we ran low on paper towel rolls, we would go to Dad’s bedroom and grab a few.

Dad passed away from Covid-19 on April 30, 2020 - 11 days shy of his 86th birthday. He would have loved the Purify Products custom made paper towels I designed - they are folded just like his.

I am Encouraged By Mom's Support

Mom is my best friend, confidant, advisor, and woman of wisdom and faith. She advised me through this whole process of starting a business. Together we'd watch Shark Tank every Friday and binge watch reruns every Saturday. She is quick to point out tips from the Sharks or the inventors that support our Purify Products.

I love you Mom for your continuous and endless support to push me tirelessly to bring real added value to the homes of families seeking to promote hygiene and cleanliness, reduce disease transfer, and provide a sanitary environment for their home.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need your support to bring to life our Purify Products to leverage the current hygiene urgency!

Get our products just in time for the New Year, and reunite with family and friends in a safer environment with our products~

Be the first to get Purify Products Packages, which consist of:

     - Dispenser - Model T-Triangle (corner wall) or Model R-Rectangle (flat wall)

     - Paper Towel Package - Model T or R (4 paper towels bundles per package)

     - Accessory Cover (to go with the selected dispenser model)

     - Musical Push Button Module

Also get our company merchandise:

     - Oh So BETTER Water Bottle     

     - Oh So BETTER T-shirt

Once we receive your Perk selection, you will be sent a link to select the products listed in that Perk!

 

Product Details

Dispenser (Model T-Triangle and Model R-Rectangle)

Our dispenser is your first step to providing our family a sanitized routine.

* The 1st hygienic paper towel dispensers creatively designed to fit in small or tight places in your home!
* Infused with antimicrobial protection that is 99.9% effective against colds, flu, covid-19, viruses, bacteria, mold, and fungi.
* Limits cross-contamination – providing a more sanitary way for you to dry your hands and surfaces.
* One-at-a time dispensing reduces consumption and waste.
* Removable door makes refilling towels quick and easy.
* Hidden metal plate on door provides the option of interchanging Accessory Covers
* Holds up to 150 sheets of our multifold interlocking paper towels.
* Dispenser is sold as a manual or motion sensor unit.
* Dispenses our custom made multifold interlocking paper towels.
* 3-inch sight windows on each side to monitor paper towel fill level.
* Dimensions in inches:
     - Rectangle shape: 1 lb, 16" H in x 4.25" W x 2.25" D
     - Triangle shape: 1.3 lb, 16" H in x 7" W x 4.25" D

Paper Towel Package (4 paper towels per package)

Our paper towel package is equivalent to 6 2/3 rolls of the average paper towel roll. They are good for nature, and provide less clutter in your pantry.

* Premium multifold interlocking compact triangle shape paper towels.
* Unlike cloth towels, paper towels help reduce the spread of germs.
* 300 count: 75 paper towels per bundle, 4 bundles per package for easy install and refill.
* Unique emboss enhances appearance and hand-feel. Design provides softness, strength and absorption for pleasant, thorough hand-drying and other tasks.
* Made from 100% recycled fiber, with a minimum of 40% post-consumer fibers, providing environmental benefits and a positive image builder.
* ECOLOGO Certified and EPA Compliant.
* Use with our custom made dispenser, Model R and T.
* Sheet dimensions in inches:
     - Open: 11.5 x 7.5
     - Final Fold: Triangle - 3.75 x 3.75 x 5.7; Rectangle - 4.00 x 2.00

 

Accessory Cover (Model T and Model R)

To personalized your dispenser even more, choose from a large selection of accessory  covers that easily fit on the front of the dispenser.  To get your kids to wash and dry their hands by purchasing one of the 3D designs, or a picture of a cartoon hero. And for you, consider purchasing a beautiful photo of nature or abstract art to adorn a room in your home.

* Accessory cover attaches to the front of the dispenser. 
* Choose the simple neutral colors of the dispenser or, take it to the next level and select accessory covers to adorn your home!
* Infused with antimicrobial protection that is 99.9% effective against colds, flu, covid-19, viruses, bacteria, mold, and fungi. 
* 3D design covers encourage children to perform good hygiene by washing and drying their hands.
* 12 Categories to chose from:
       3D                                     Abstract                        Acrylic Mirror               Animals       
       Food & Drinks               Fun & Games               Illumination                  Informational       
       Inspirational                  Musical                          Nature                            Seasonal          
* Dimensions in inches:
     - Rectangle shape: 1 lb., 16" H in x 4.25" W x 2.25" D
     - Triangle shape: 1.3 lb., 16" H in x 7" W x 4.25" D

Musical Push Button Module

Play our jingles to get your kids attention on the importance of washing and drying their hands.

* Just press the button and wash to the beat of the music!
* Great inspiration in training kids to effectively wash and dry their hands.
*  White plastic waterproof casing.
* Plays up to 100x jingle with AG10 cell batteries (included).
* Magnetic back to easily place on front of our dispenser, or used the enclosed double-sided tape.
* Dimensions in inches: 2.00 round, 1.50 Height.

The Impact

One of the greatest contributing factors to the spread of the coronavirus pandemic stemmed from consumers washing their hands improperly, or not washing or drying their hands at all.  

Through the loss of many lives, covid-19 has given us a greater understanding of the importance of washing and drying our hands to reduce disease transfer and the spread of germs.

Parents have a vested interest in reducing disease transfer amongst their children and creating a sanitary environment for their home; thus, making Better Hygiene the New Normal. Purify Products are the first of its kind that offers families 99.9% protection against the cold, flu, covid-19, other viruses, bacteria, mold, and fungi.

The caliber of the dispenser, paper towels and accessory covers will be the first ever produced worldwide. Moreover, the dispensers will be the first 99.9% germ free residential dispensers infused with Antimicrobial Protection. Consumers can interchange accessory covers to adorn their home. 3D and informational designs are made to encourage children to wash and dry their hands.

 

Roadmap

We have been working very hard for the past 2 years to source and identify industrial partners for tooling (as our products is not common), and for production to emphasize quality and safety. We are very ambitious on our roadmap, but the current situation of covid-19 and the high demand of personal hygiene has urged us to work even harder to bring real added value from our products. We want to prevent the spread of colds, flu, covid-19 or other new viruses now; thus, we need your support to bring our Purify Products to the masses.

 

Risks & Challenges

Issues concerning barriers to entry include high start-up costs for inventory and equipment. High digital advertising and marketing cost to get consumers to buy Purify Products in the short term, with the long-term aim of creating brand loyalty. Patent protection in China and abroad. Licensing.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

A 2020 Nielsen study stated that since the onset of Covid-19, Americans have become more obsessed with hygiene, and are seeking hygienic products for the protection of their families.

Purify Products meets this need by providing unique dispensers that are sanitary, compact, creative, and stylish for any room in their home.

 

Please help us get Purify Products to the masses by purchasing our products and spreading the word!

Thank you and Stay Safe!
story_txt:
Hello, I am Stephanie Perry.
I created Purify Products, which are uniquely designed dispensers, paper towels, and accessories, for families.

 

Covid-19 has made Better Hygiene the New Normal. Purify Products are the first of its kind that offers families 99.9% protection against colds, flu, covid-19, other viruses, bacteria, mold, and fungi. It promotes hygiene and cleanliness, reduces disease transfer, and provides a sanitary environment for the home.

Because of covid-19, we all spend more time on our hand hygiene, making sure our hands and especially our kids' hands were washed and dried properly. We infused our dispensers with antimicrobial technology, so diseases cannot be transferred from one per to another when touched. Also paper towels are dispensed one-at-a time to reduce consumption and waste.

 
Our Purify Products can be used in any room!
 




 
I was inspired to create the Purify Products line as a result of PTSD while serving in the military. I developed a case of severe OCD; I felt compelled to wash my hands several times while in the bathroom, and wash all the bathroom sinks in any restroom I entered, whether it was a restaurant, business, or someone’s home!

 
One day, while using the restroom of a friend’s home, I found–to my dismay–that there were no paper towels available. I began to panic, the cloth hand towel was wet and dirty, and the decorative cloth towel display dry and crusty. In a frenzy, I ended up running to their kitchen for the paper towels roll, then went back the their restroom to clean the sink. It was here that I said to myself, “why doesn’t someone make a paper towel dispenser that can be used in the home?”
This was the beginning of the Purify Products line.

 
No more mess, no more waste, no more paper wars with traditional paper towel rolls.

 
I was Inspired by Dad's Habit
Dad had OCD with paper towel rolls. Every day he would grab paper towels from the paper towel roll and neatly fold them into small rectangle shapes and stack them on his bedroom dresser. When we ran low on paper towel rolls, we would go to Dad’s bedroom and grab a few.
Dad passed away from Covid-19 on April 30, 2020 - 11 days shy of his 86th birthday. He would have loved the Purify Products custom made paper towels I designed - they are folded just like his.
I am Encouraged By Mom's Support
Mom is my best friend, confidant, advisor, and woman of wisdom and faith. She advised me through this whole process of starting a business. Together we'd watch Shark Tank every Friday and binge watch reruns every Saturday. She is quick to point out tips from the Sharks or the inventors that support our Purify Products.
I love you Mom for your continuous and endless support to push me tirelessly to bring real added value to the homes of families seeking to promote hygiene and cleanliness, reduce disease transfer, and provide a sanitary environment for their home.

 

What We Need & What You Get
We need your support to bring to life our Purify Products to leverage the current hygiene urgency!
Get our products just in time for the New Year, and reunite with family and friends in a safer environment with our products~
Be the first to get Purify Products Packages, which consist of:
     - Dispenser - Model T-Triangle (corner wall) or Model R-Rectangle (flat wall)
     - Paper Towel Package - Model T or R (4 paper towels bundles per package)
     - Accessory Cover (to go with the selected dispenser model)
     - Musical Push Button Module
Also get our company merchandise:
     - Oh So BETTER Water Bottle     
     - Oh So BETTER T-shirt
Once we receive your Perk selection, you will be sent a link to select the products listed in that Perk!
 

Product Details
Dispenser (Model T-Triangle and Model R-Rectangle)
Our dispenser is your first step to providing our family a sanitized routine.
* The 1st hygienic paper towel dispensers creatively designed to fit in small or tight places in your home!* Infused with antimicrobial protection that is 99.9% effective against colds, flu, covid-19, viruses, bacteria, mold, and fungi.* Limits cross-contamination – providing a more sanitary way for you to dry your hands and surfaces.* One-at-a time dispensing reduces consumption and waste.* Removable door makes refilling towels quick and easy.* Hidden metal plate on door provides the option of interchanging Accessory Covers* Holds up to 150 sheets of our multifold interlocking paper towels.* Dispenser is sold as a manual or motion sensor unit.* Dispenses our custom made multifold interlocking paper towels.* 3-inch sight windows on each side to monitor paper towel fill level.* Dimensions in inches:     - Rectangle shape: 1 lb, 16" H in x 4.25" W x 2.25" D     - Triangle shape: 1.3 lb, 16" H in x 7" W x 4.25" D

Paper Towel Package (4 paper towels per package)
Our paper towel package is equivalent to 6 2/3 rolls of the average paper towel roll. They are good for nature, and provide less clutter in your pantry.
* Premium multifold interlocking compact triangle shape paper towels.* Unlike cloth towels, paper towels help reduce the spread of germs.* 300 count: 75 paper towels per bundle, 4 bundles per package for easy install and refill.* Unique emboss enhances appearance and hand-feel. Design provides softness, strength and absorption for pleasant, thorough hand-drying and other tasks.* Made from 100% recycled fiber, with a minimum of 40% post-consumer fibers, providing environmental benefits and a positive image builder.* ECOLOGO Certified and EPA Compliant.* Use with our custom made dispenser, Model R and T.* Sheet dimensions in inches:     - Open: 11.5 x 7.5     - Final Fold: Triangle - 3.75 x 3.75 x 5.7; Rectangle - 4.00 x 2.00

 

Accessory Cover (Model T and Model R)
To personalized your dispenser even more, choose from a large selection of accessory  covers that easily fit on the front of the dispenser.  To get your kids to wash and dry their hands by purchasing one of the 3D designs, or a picture of a cartoon hero. And for you, consider purchasing a beautiful photo of nature or abstract art to adorn a room in your home.
* Accessory cover attaches to the front of the dispenser. * Choose the simple neutral colors of the dispenser or, take it to the next level and select accessory covers to adorn your home!* Infused with antimicrobial protection that is 99.9% effective against colds, flu, covid-19, viruses, bacteria, mold, and fungi. * 3D design covers encourage children to perform good hygiene by washing and drying their hands.* 12 Categories to chose from:       3D                                     Abstract                        Acrylic Mirror               Animals              Food & Drinks               Fun & Games               Illumination                  Informational              Inspirational                  Musical                          Nature                            Seasonal          * Dimensions in inches:     - Rectangle shape: 1 lb., 16" H in x 4.25" W x 2.25" D     - Triangle shape: 1.3 lb., 16" H in x 7" W x 4.25" D

Musical Push Button Module
Play our jingles to get your kids attention on the importance of washing and drying their hands.
* Just press the button and wash to the beat of the music!* Great inspiration in training kids to effectively wash and dry their hands.*  White plastic waterproof casing.* Plays up to 100x jingle with AG10 cell batteries (included).* Magnetic back to easily place on front of our dispenser, or used the enclosed double-sided tape.* Dimensions in inches: 2.00 round, 1.50 Height.

story:
Meet the Runmecy

 

 

It’s time you experienced the most advanced and cutting-edge fabrication tool to ever be made. The Runmecy is a laser engraver and cutter that bundles more power, speed, and safety into a sleek and compact design than any other engraver. It gives you the room you need to get creative on any project, whether it’s art, business, or just making something fun.

What Everyone’s Saying About Runmecy？

 

Empowers Your Metal Engraving

Unleash your creativity onto any metal. Whether you want to engrave a flask for a friend, a plaque for a trophy, or a piece of art to hang up, the powerful laser housed in the Runmecy is up for the task.

We’ve pushed laser technology forward by compressing the previous 5w laser from 0.2mm in diameter to 0.08mm, allowing our 5W semiconductor laser to engrave most metal surfaces.

 

The Cutting Edge of Laser Engraving Tech

The Runmecy is at the cutting edge of laser engraving tech. Built with a 5W German-engineered OSRAM laser chip, efficient heat dissipation, and finely tuned precision glass lens, its powerful laser is built to help you unleash your creativity on any surface.

Thanks to our advances, the Runmecy can cut through thick wood (up to 1.5mm). It’s guaranteed to get every engraving cut, on the first cut. 

 

Limitless Choice For Engraving

The Runmecy can engrave on almost everything you could think of. Stainless steel, anodized aluminum alloy, iron, glass, ceramic, wood, bamboo, paper, acrylic, leather, stone, cement, or fruit (just to name a few). Let your imagination run wild with possibilities.

Engraving Simplified 

 And getting your design to be engraved is a simple 3 step process:

Edit On The Fly

We made it simple to edit your designs on the fly throughout the app. We’ve included every useful tool and customization option to let your engraving creativity flow.

Enjoy everything from:

Original cutting puzzle material library

Black and white contrast ratio adjustment

Gray image adjustment

Reverse color

Type in characters

Mask and erase functions

Outline mode

And so much more!

Support JPG，BMP（24bit），TIFF，PNG（32bit and below），PCX（8bit & 24bit），PCD，type characters in the App

Connect Across Devices

To start engraving just connect your Runmecy to your computer or smartphone! Connect via Bluetooth or cable, and then select your design in the app to start engraving. 

Use Bluetooth to connect your phone and use the app to edit designs from the palm of your hand.

Connect via USB to your Windows or Mac computer and edit your designs through our easy-to-use software. Transform your images into creative designs you can engrave. 

At The Cutting Edge

How We Improved From Our First-Gen Models

  • Laser Module: The 5W laser module uses Japan's Nichia 440nm 5000mW laser diode. The target spot is compressed by a special process to make the spot size a square of up to 0.08mm. And the engraving pattern is way more delicate and clearer, with more focused power, and a stronger engraving ability, allowing it to engrave glossy metal.
  • Software: A new dedicated app was created for the new 5-watt model. The download path and the software auto recognize your device. And if you have a 1.6-watt and a 5-watt running at the same time, it won’t conflict with their operation on the same app. The working frame of the 5-watt model is appropriately reduced.
  • Structure: The main structure has not changed, because the actual verification of the first generation provided a stable structure. It was only optimized in the structure of the laser module to create stronger accuracy.
  • Appearance: The color and surface treatment process have been changed to make the product more aesthetically pleasing and beautiful.
  • Working hours: Increased to 1.5 hours of continuous work without interruption.

Fast Engraving

The Runmecy’s rapid engraving mode is 3-5 times faster than print engraving. It’s perfect for more casual designs that don’t need a lot of finesse (sketches, signatures, and pictures with more complex images and thin lines won’t be able to be engraved fast).

 

Fast engraving uses a point-to-point method (optimized by our advanced algorithm) to reduce motor operation in blank areas, effectively increasing engraving speed. It adopts a CNC working mode, where each step is an effective stroke doubling the overall engraving speed.

Clear and Stable

Enjoy clear designs and images as our engraver outputs at a resolution of 508 DPI or 0.05 mm. That means every design will have a clear focus and resolution when being engraved. 

 

Small and Easy to Carry

Small, foldable, powerful, and easy to carry anywhere. Runmecy gives you smart portability so you can always keep your engraver handy. 

 

Manual Focus

Go deeper or get better engravings with manual focus. The best engraving distance is 3-5cm. And manually rotating the focal length lets you control the accuracy of the blue light laser and get the best position.

Engraving Preview

Know where your engraver will cut with an engraving preview area. See exactly where the laser will cut and adjust on the fly if you need to. 

The power of the preview light for adjusting focus and the engraving area is less than 50mW,  which falls well within the margins of safety to ensure you stay protected.

 

Built For Safety

The Runmecy was built with user safety in mind. It does house a powerful laser after all. That’s why we built it with various features to ensure user safety at all times.

G-sensor

Suspends laser engraving in case of movement. The device will still be on, even if the power is off (so don’t worry, your device isn’t broken – it’s a safety feature) and after G-sensor stops detecting movement it will turn back on. 

 

Protective Shields

There are protective shields to keep the laser contained when the engraver is on. 

Big or Small, You Can Engrave On It

With a baseless design, the Runmecy can engrave objects of any size (as long as they are horizontally stable under the laser).

Made To Last

The Runmecy is made to work hard and keep working hard. 

It can run continuously for 90 minutes. And if the laser becomes overheated, its power output will reduce slightly until it can shut down and cool off. You can keep engraving as Runmecy can continue running at 80% power and below without stopping the process.

Tech Specs

Runmecy has registered with the FDA (Accession Number: 2120061-000). Runmecy is a Class 4 Laser product with CE, FCC, and other certifications. This means we are experts in laser requirements.

What You’ll Get

We offer standard outlets used in the region of your choice, including the UK, UE, US.
We will work hard to match you with the standard plug of your corresponding region based on the delivery address you provide.

Our Production Process 

About Our Team

DoubleNew Technology Co.was established in September 2018 by a group of friends with a shared passion. Each of us was a DIY type person who loved exploring artificial intelligence and smart product development in our own time. And together, we realized we had not just a shared love but had more than 15 years of experience in smart products and tool development. Each of us was a specialist in our fields, from appearance design, structural design, cloud computing, and artificial intelligence – and together we had a rich accumulation of skills. This project was inspired by our desire to leave a mark in the world, and to let others do the same simply, easily, and in their own way.

Now, after 3 years of design polishing, product testing, endless app optimization, consumer surveys, we’re proud to announce the Runmecy laser engraver. A smart tool that sits at the cutting edge of laser engraving and gives DIY enthusiasts like us the opportunity to leave their mark on the world.

story:
What is PastedPaper?

Gorgeous, easy-to-use, organic sheets of removable high-quality wallpaper.

      . 

       

Available in an assortment of historic designs based on antique artwork

 Allowing you to easily bring timeless, unique, and affordable elegance into your home.

 

 

                                                             

Everything you need, you already have in your home. 

There is no need to bring anyone into your house

to install wallcovering.

You've got this!

 

PastedPaper solves two main problems found with traditional wallpaper.

1.  Make it easy to put up. We figured out a way to make our designs fit beautifully on each sheet. 

2. We worked closely with our paper mills in applying a special paste on the back of our high-quality paper. All you need to do is wet the back by submerging it in water. Then apply to the wall and wipe off any excess water. The paste will be wet with water for about 15 minutes, giving you ample time to line each sheet up perfectly with the next. 

 

                                       

                                      

                                     

PastedPaper® is NEW. Innovative. Worry-Free Wallpaper.

 

• PastedPaper® is easy for anyone to put up. 

• It’s sold in individual sheets – not rolls.

• Each sheet has been designed to line up perfectly with the next.

• Strips off easily. No scraping. You’ll never be afraid of wallpaper again.

• Available in historical patterns from incredible designers such as William Morris, C.F.A. Voysey, and William Kilburn – allowing you to bring timeless, unique, and affordable elegance into your home.
 

If you need to custom fit a sheet, all you need to do is trim with a straight edge and sharp blade. We have even used scissors in a pinch! Some customers have custom-cut PastedPaper sheets to hug an irregular stone wall and make circular areas for a dynamic look. 

 

PastedPaper will stay up forever. But, if you are ready to take it down and change up your space, PastedPaper sheets are easily removed and will not harm walls.

 

 

Our custom calculator makes it easy to choose the right amount of wallpaper for your project.

                                       

                             

  

There are many ways to use any extra sheets you may have! 

Line your kitchen drawers • Spruce up a serving tray • Make a special pencil holder • Cover a small tabletop • Embellish a trashcan • Make a desktop blotter • Use as a photo frame border. 

 

Victoria and Albert Museum

PastedPaper® collaborated with the Victoria and Albert Museum in London to bring these beautiful patterns inspired by designs held in the museum’s archives right to your home. 

 

 

 

       

Many of us are working from home these days. And many of us need a space dedicated to our work, schooling, and home offices. PastedPaper is MADE for this era! Because the sheets are so effortless to install, you can apply these yourselves and never have to worry about bringing anyone into your home for installation.

 

 

What is a DIE•CUT?

We have another fantastic product here at PastedPaper! It is DIE•CUTS. You can use these beautiful die-cut elements to embellish just about anything with a smooth surface. Our DIE•CUT products use a more aggressive paste so that it will stay adhered to your surfaces and give you an heirloom-quality project. 

 

 

 

We have created one of 4 booklets for our DIE•CUT product line. Each Booklet is dedicated to a specific design, showing many uses for the product, including 2 sheets of DIE•CUTS.

* If we go beyond our initial fundraiser goal, we will dedicate a percentage of the earnings to developing the next 3 booklets and get them printed for distribution in Museum Bookstores, brick & mortar stores, and our website.        

                    

 
 

         

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

           

      

 

Our goal of $30,000 is real! We need these to go to the next steps and grow. 

Funding will go towards:

• Hiring Staff

• New Products

• More Beautiful Designs   

•  Global Distribution

The more funds we raise, the more designs we can make

and the more distribution accomplish.

 

 

          

I’m an entrepreneur, designer, product developer, and mother.

 I love creating redesigning spaces. After 25 years of industry experience in the international home decor market, I’ve returned to my roots to make beautiful spaces with you.

                                               

 

The concept came to me years ago while working in the wallpaper market. There were so many problems with the traditional materials and methods of installation. I came up with a solution that was not only beautiful but easy for my consumer to install and takedown.

In addition to wallpaper, I have created PastedPaper® DIE•CUTS.

Through DIE•CUTS, I've made high-end crafting accessible to everyone. The collection of patterns you see here are all lovingly designed to help you elevate your space and make every room in your home a reflection of you. I've designed products that have catered to many different kinds of homemakers over the years, but I've never been more connected to a product than I am to PastedPaper®. PastedPaper is my passion, and I am so thrilled to share this with you. 

                                                                                                

 

                                                                   

We work closely with an environmentally responsible paper mill here in the USA. Lots of attention and care has gone into every detail. Together, the mill and PastedPaper have developed the perfect product.

 

Starting a business in the Covid Era

We are spending much more time at home. The need to reenvision our living/office space has become more important than ever—PastedPaper created a direct-to-customer relationship, where the customer is empowered to be the designer. You pick your design, enter the room dimensions into our website calculator, and with common household tools, you can install your new wallpaper in an afternoon. Now sit back and enjoy your new space.

 

 

What surface can I put PastedPaper on?

Answer: Plaster Walls, Lightly Stuccoed Walls, Glass Ceramic, and Wood. 

Can you clean PastedPaper?

Answer: Yes! There is a very thin protective coating on the surface of all PastedPaper products that makes it easy to wipe down with just a damp sponge. Perfect for even kitchens and bathrooms!

 

How do I know how much product to order?

Answer: Go to our handy calculator on the pastedpaper.com site and enter the dimensions of the room you want to redesign. 

 

 

Happy Wallpapering &

Happy Crafting!
story_txt:
What is PastedPaper?
Gorgeous, easy-to-use, organic sheets of removable high-quality wallpaper.
      . 
       
Available in an assortment of historic designs based on antique artwork
 Allowing you to easily bring timeless, unique, and affordable elegance into your home.
 
 
                                                             
Everything you need, you already have in your home. 
There is no need to bring anyone into your house 
to install wallcovering.
You've got this!
 

PastedPaper solves two main problems found with traditional wallpaper.
1.  Make it easy to put up. We figured out a way to make our designs fit beautifully on each sheet. 
2. We worked closely with our paper mills in applying a special paste on the back of our high-quality paper. All you need to do is wet the back by submerging it in water. Then apply to the wall and wipe off any excess water. The paste will be wet with water for about 15 minutes, giving you ample time to line each sheet up perfectly with the next. 
 
                                       

                                      

                                      

PastedPaper® is NEW. Innovative. Worry-Free Wallpaper. 
 
• PastedPaper® is easy for anyone to put up. 
• It’s sold in individual sheets – not rolls.
• Each sheet has been designed to line up perfectly with the next. 
• Strips off easily. No scraping. You’ll never be afraid of wallpaper again.
• Available in historical patterns from incredible designers such as William Morris, C.F.A. Voysey, and William Kilburn – allowing you to bring timeless, unique, and affordable elegance into your home. 

If you need to custom fit a sheet, all you need to do is trim with a straight edge and sharp blade. We have even used scissors in a pinch! Some customers have custom-cut PastedPaper sheets to hug an irregular stone wall and make circular areas for a dynamic look. 

 

PastedPaper will stay up forever. But, if you are ready to take it down and change up your space, PastedPaper sheets are easily removed and will not harm walls.
 
 

Our custom calculator makes it easy to choose the right amount of wallpaper for your project.

The more funds we raise, the more designs we can make 
and the more distribution accomplish.
